
 
<div class="main_content">
   
   <div class="front">
      
      
      <p>It is hard to imagine a world without Shakespeare. Since their composition four hundred
         years ago, Shakespeare’s plays and poems have traveled the globe, inviting those who
         see
         and read his works to make them their own.
      </p>
      
      <p>Readers of the New Folger Editions are part of this ongoing process of “taking up
         Shakespeare,” finding our own thoughts and feelings in language that strikes us as
         old or
         unusual and, for that very reason, new. We still struggle to keep up with a writer
         who
         could think a mile a minute, whose words paint pictures that shift like clouds. These
         expertly edited texts are presented to the public as a resource for study, artistic
         adaptation, and enjoyment. By making the classic texts of the New Folger Editions
         available in electronic form as Folger Digital Texts, we place a trusted resource
         in the
         hands of anyone who wants them.
      </p>
      
      <p>The New Folger Editions of Shakespeare’s plays, which are the basis for the texts
         realized here in digital form, are special because of their origin. The Folger Shakespeare
         Library in Washington, DC, is the single greatest documentary source of Shakespeare’s
         works. An unparalleled collection of early modern books, manuscripts, and artwork
         connected to Shakespeare, the Folger’s holdings have been consulted extensively in
         the
         preparation of these texts. The Editions also reflect the expertise gained through
         the
         regular performance of Shakespeare’s works in the Folger’s Elizabethan Theater.
      </p>
      
      <p>I want to express my deep thanks to editors Barbara Mowat and Paul Werstine for creating
         these indispensable editions of Shakespeare’s works, which incorporate the best of
         textual
         scholarship with a richness of commentary that is both inspired and engaging. Readers
         who
         want to know more about Shakespeare and his plays can follow the paths these distinguished
         scholars have tread by visiting the Folger either in-person or online, where a range
         of
         physical and digital resources exist to supplement the material in these texts. I
         commend
         to you these words, and hope that they inspire.
      </p>
      
      <div class="closer">
         <br></br>Michael Witmore
         <br></br>Director, Folger Shakespeare
         Library 
      </div>
      
      <br></br>
      
      
      
      <p>Until now, with the release of the Folger Digital Texts, readers in search of a free
         online text of Shakespeare’s plays had to be content primarily with using the Moby™
         Text,
         which reproduces a late-nineteenth century version of the plays. What is the difference?
         Many ordinary readers assume that there is a single text for the plays: what Shakespeare
         wrote. But Shakespeare’s plays were not published the way modern novels or plays are
         published today: as a single, authoritative text. In some cases, the plays have come
         down
         to us in multiple published versions, represented by various Quartos (Qq) and by the
         great
         collection put together by his colleagues in 1623, called the First Folio (F). There
         are,
         for example, three very different versions of 
         <em>Hamlet</em>, two of 
         <em>King
            Lear
         </em>, 
         <em>Henry V</em>, 
         <em>Romeo and Juliet</em>, and others.
         Editors choose which version to use as their base text, and then amend that text with
         words, lines or speech prefixes from the other versions that, in their judgment, make
         for
         a better or more accurate text.
      </p>
      
      <p>Other editorial decisions involve choices about whether an unfamiliar word could be
         understood in light of other writings of the period or whether it should be changed;
         decisions about words that made it into Shakespeare’s text by accident through four
         hundred years of printings and misprinting; and even decisions based on cultural
         preference and taste. When the Moby™ Text was created, for example, it was deemed
         “improper” and “indecent” for Miranda to chastise Caliban for having attempted to
         rape
         her. (See 
         <em>The Tempest</em>, 1.2: “Abhorred slave,/Which any print of goodness
         wilt not take,/Being capable of all ill! I pitied thee…”). All Shakespeare editors
         at the
         time took the speech away from her and gave it to her father, Prospero.
      </p>
      
      <p>The editors of the Moby™ Shakespeare produced their text long before scholars fully
         understood the proper grounds on which to make the thousands of decisions that Shakespeare
         editors face. The Folger Library Shakespeare Editions, on which the Folger Digital
         Texts
         depend, make this editorial process as nearly transparent as is possible, in contrast
         to
         older texts, like the Moby™, which hide editorial interventions. The reader of the
         Folger
         Shakespeare knows where the text has been altered because editorial interventions
         are
         signaled by square brackets (for example, from 
         <em>Othello</em>: “
         square bracket
         If she in chains of magic were not bound,
         square bracket
         ”), half-square brackets (for example, from 
         <em>Henry V</em>: “With 
         half-square bracket
         blood
         half-square bracket
          and sword and fire to win your right,”), or angle brackets (for
         example, from 
         <em>Hamlet</em>: “O farewell, honest 
         angle bracket
         soldier.
         angle bracket
          Who hath relieved/you?”). At any point in the text, you can hover your
         cursor over a bracket for more information.
      </p>
      
      <p>Because the Folger Digital Texts are edited in accord with twenty-first century knowledge
         about Shakespeare’s texts, the Folger here provides them to readers, scholars, teachers,
         actors, directors, and students, free of charge, confident of their quality as texts
         of
         the plays and pleased to be able to make this contribution to the study and enjoyment
         of
         Shakespeare.
      </p>
      
      
      
      <p>Caesar’s assassination is just the halfway point of 
         <em>Julius Caesar</em>. The
         first part of the play leads to his death; the second portrays the consequences. As
         the
         action begins, Rome prepares for Caesar’s triumphal entrance. Brutus, Caesar’s friend
         and
         ally, fears that Caesar will become king, destroying the republic. Cassius and others
         convince Brutus to join a conspiracy to kill Caesar.
      </p>
      
      <p>On the day of the assassination, Caesar plans to stay home at the urging of his wife,
         Calphurnia. A conspirator, Decius Brutus, persuades him to go to the Senate with the
         other
         conspirators and his friend, Mark Antony. At the Senate, the conspirators stab Caesar
         to
         death. Antony uses a funeral oration to turn the citizens of Rome against them. Brutus
         and
         Cassius escape as Antony joins forces with Octavius Caesar.
      </p>
      
      <p>Encamped with their armies, Brutus and Cassius quarrel, then agree to march on Antony
         and
         Octavius. In the battle which follows, Cassius, misled by erroneous reports of loss,
         persuades a slave to kill him; Brutus’s army is defeated. Brutus commits suicide,
         praised
         by Antony as “the noblest Roman of them all.”
      </p>
      
       
   </div>
   
   
   <span class="hr"> </span>

         <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-007.jpg" class="display"></img>
      </a>
   </span>
   
   <div class="act ">
      
      <h4>
         ACT
          
         1
         
      </h4>
      
      <div class="scene ">
         
         <h4>
            Scene
             
            1
            
         </h4>
         
         
         <br></br>
         Enter
          
         Flavius
         ,
          
         Marullus
         ,
          
         and
          
         certain
          
         Commoners
         ,
         
         <br></br>
         including
          
         a
          
         Carpenter
          
         and
          
         a
          
         Cobbler
         ,
          
         over
          
         the
          
         stage
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FLAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hence
               !
                
               Home
               ,
                
               you
                
               idle
                
               creatures
               ,
                
               get
                
               you
                
               home
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Is
                
               this
                
               a
                
               holiday
               ?
                
               What
               ,
                
               know
                
               you
                
               not
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Being
                
               mechanical
               ,
                
               you
                
               ought
                
               not
                
               walk
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Upon
                
               a
                
               laboring
                
               day
                
               without
                
               the
                
               sign
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Of
                
               your
                
               profession
               ?
               —
               Speak
               ,
                
               what
                
               trade
                
               art
                
               thou
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CARPENTER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
               ,
                
               sir
               ,
                
               a
                
               carpenter
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MARULLUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Where
                
               is
                
               thy
                
               leather
                
               apron
                
               and
                
               thy
                
               rule
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               dost
                
               thou
                
               with
                
               thy
                
               best
                
               apparel
                
               on
               ?
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
               ,
                
               sir
               ,
                
               what
                
               trade
                
               are
                
               you
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               COBBLER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Truly
               ,
                
               sir
               ,
                
               in
                
               respect
                
               of
                
               a
                
               fine
                
               workman
               ,
                
               I
                
               am
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               but
               ,
                
               as
                
               you
                
               would
                
               say
               ,
                
               a
                
               cobbler
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MARULLUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               what
                
               trade
                
               art
                
               thou
               ?
                
               Answer
                
               me
                
               directly
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               COBBLER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               A
                
               trade
               ,
                
               sir
               ,
                
               that
                
               I
                
               hope
                
               I
                
               may
                
               use
                
               with
                
               a
                
               safe
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               conscience
               ,
                
               which
                
               is
                
               indeed
               ,
                
               sir
               ,
                
               a
                
               mender
                
               of
                
               bad
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               soles
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FLAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               trade
               ,
                
               thou
                
               knave
               ?
                
               Thou
                
               naughty
                
               knave
               ,
                
               what
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               trade
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>

         <h6 class="fw">ACT 1. SC. 1</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               COBBLER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Nay
               ,
                
               I
                
               beseech
                
               you
               ,
                
               sir
               ,
                
               be
                
               not
                
               out
                
               with
                
               me
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yet
                
               if
                
               you
                
               be
                
               out
               ,
                
               sir
               ,
                
               I
                
               can
                
               mend
                
               you
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MARULLUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               mean’st
                
               thou
                
               by
                
               that
               ?
                
               Mend
                
               me
               ,
                
               thou
                
               saucy
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               fellow
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               COBBLER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
               ,
                
               sir
               ,
                
               cobble
                
               you
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FLAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thou
                
               art
                
               a
                
               cobbler
               ,
                
               art
                
               thou
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               COBBLER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Truly
               ,
                
               sir
               ,
                
               all
                
               that
                
               I
                
               live
                
               by
                
               is
                
               with
                
               the
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               awl
               .
                
               I
                
               meddle
                
               with
                
               no
                
               tradesman’s
                
               matters
                
               nor
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               women’s
                
               matters
               ,
                
               but
                
               withal
                
               I
                
               am
                
               indeed
               ,
                
               sir
               ,
                
               a
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               surgeon
                
               to
                
               old
                
               shoes
               :
                
               when
                
               they
                
               are
                
               in
                
               great
                
               danger
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               recover
                
               them
               .
                
               As
                
               proper
                
               men
                
               as
                
               ever
                
               trod
                
               upon
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               neat’s
                
               leather
                
               have
                
               gone
                
               upon
                
               my
                
               handiwork
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FLAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               wherefore
                
               art
                
               not
                
               in
                
               thy
                
               shop
                
               today
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
                
               dost
                
               thou
                
               lead
                
               these
                
               men
                
               about
                
               the
                
               streets
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               COBBLER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Truly
               ,
                
               sir
               ,
                
               to
                
               wear
                
               out
                
               their
                
               shoes
               ,
                
               to
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               get
                
               myself
                
               into
                
               more
                
               work
               .
                
               But
                
               indeed
               ,
                
               sir
               ,
                
               we
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               make
                
               holiday
                
               to
                
               see
                
               Caesar
                
               and
                
               to
                
               rejoice
                
               in
                
               his
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               triumph
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MARULLUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Wherefore
                
               rejoice
               ?
                
               What
                
               conquest
                
               brings
                
               he
                
               home
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               tributaries
                
               follow
                
               him
                
               to
                
               Rome
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               grace
                
               in
                
               captive
                
               bonds
                
               his
                
               chariot
                
               wheels
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               blocks
               ,
                
               you
                
               stones
               ,
                
               you
                
               worse
                
               than
                
               senseless
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               things
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               you
                
               hard
                
               hearts
               ,
                
               you
                
               cruel
                
               men
                
               of
                
               Rome
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Knew
                
               you
                
               not
                
               Pompey
               ?
                
               Many
                
               a
                
               time
                
               and
                
               oft
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Have
                
               you
                
               climbed
                
               up
                
               to
                
               walls
                
               and
                
               battlements
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               towers
                
               and
                
               windows
               ,
                
               yea
               ,
                
               to
                
               chimney
                
               tops
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Your
                
               infants
                
               in
                
               your
                
               arms
               ,
                
               and
                
               there
                
               have
                
               sat
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               livelong
                
               day
               ,
                
               with
                
               patient
                
               expectation
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               see
                
               great
                
               Pompey
                
               pass
                
               the
                
               streets
                
               of
                
               Rome
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               when
                
               you
                
               saw
                
               his
                
               chariot
                
               but
                
               appear
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Have
                
               you
                
               not
                
               made
                
               an
                
               universal
                
               shout
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               Tiber
                
               trembled
                
               underneath
                
               her
                
               banks
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-011.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-011.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-011.jpg" class="display"></img>

               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 1. SC. 1</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               hear
                
               the
                
               replication
                
               of
                
               your
                
               sounds
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Made
                
               in
                
               her
                
               concave
                
               shores
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               do
                
               you
                
               now
                
               put
                
               on
                
               your
                
               best
                
               attire
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               do
                
               you
                
               now
                
               cull
                
               out
                
               a
                
               holiday
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               do
                
               you
                
               now
                
               strew
                
               flowers
                
               in
                
               his
                
               way
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               comes
                
               in
                
               triumph
                
               over
                
               Pompey’s
                
               blood
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Be
                
               gone
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Run
                
               to
                
               your
                
               houses
               ,
                
               fall
                
               upon
                
               your
                
               knees
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Pray
                
               to
                
               the
                
               gods
                
               to
                
               intermit
                
               the
                
               plague
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               needs
                
               must
                
               light
                
               on
                
               this
                
               ingratitude
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FLAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Go
               ,
                
               go
               ,
                
               good
                
               countrymen
               ,
                
               and
                
               for
                
               this
                
               fault
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Assemble
                
               all
                
               the
                
               poor
                
               men
                
               of
                
               your
                
               sort
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Draw
                
               them
                
               to
                
               Tiber
                
               banks
               ,
                
               and
                
               weep
                
               your
                
               tears
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Into
                
               the
                
               channel
               ,
                
               till
                
               the
                
               lowest
                
               stream
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Do
                
               kiss
                
               the
                
               most
                
               exalted
                
               shores
                
               of
                
               all
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               All
                
               the
                
               Commoners
                
               exit
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               See
                
               whe’er
                
               their
                
               basest
                
               mettle
                
               be
                
               not
                
               moved
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               They
                
               vanish
                
               tongue-tied
                
               in
                
               their
                
               guiltiness
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Go
                
               you
                
               down
                
               that
                
               way
                
               towards
                
               the
                
               Capitol
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               This
                
               way
                
               will
                
               I
               .
                
               Disrobe
                
               the
                
               images
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               you
                
               do
                
               find
                
               them
                
               decked
                
               with
                
               ceremonies
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MARULLUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               May
                
               we
                
               do
                
               so
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               know
                
               it
                
               is
                
               the
                
               feast
                
               of
                
               Lupercal
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FLAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               is
                
               no
                
               matter
               .
                
               Let
                
               no
                
               images
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Be
                
               hung
                
               with
                
               Caesar’s
                
               trophies
               .
                
               I’ll
                
               about
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               drive
                
               away
                
               the
                
               vulgar
                
               from
                
               the
                
               streets
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               do
                
               you
                
               too
               ,
                
               where
                
               you
                
               perceive
                
               them
                
               thick
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               These
                
               growing
                
               feathers
                
               plucked
                
               from
                
               Caesar’s
                
               wing
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Will
                
               make
                
               him
                
               fly
                
               an
                
               ordinary
                
               pitch
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Who
                
               else
                
               would
                
               soar
                
               above
                
               the
                
               view
                
               of
                
               men
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               keep
                
               us
                
               all
                
               in
                
               servile
                
               fearfulness
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         They
          
         exit
          
         in
          
         different
          
         directions
         .
         
         
      </div>
      
      <br></br>
      
      <div class="milestone page"> </div>

      <h6 class="fw">ACT 1. SC. 2</h6>
      
      <div class="scene ">
         
         <h4>
            Scene
             
            2
            
         </h4>
         
         
         <br></br>
         Enter
          
         Caesar
         ,
          
         Antony
          
         for
          
         the
          
         course
         ,
          
         Calphurnia
         ,
          
         Portia
         ,
         
         <br></br>
         Decius
         ,
          
         Cicero
         ,
          
         Brutus
         ,
          
         Cassius
         ,
          
         Casca
         ,
          
         a
          
         Soothsayer
         ;
         
         <br></br>
         after
          
         them
          
         Marullus
          
         and
          
         Flavius
          
         and
          
         Commoners
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Calphurnia
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Peace
               ,
                
               ho
               !
                
               Caesar
                
               speaks
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Calphurnia
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CALPHURNIA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Here
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Stand
                
               you
                
               directly
                
               in
                
               Antonius’
                
               way
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               When
                
               he
                
               doth
                
               run
                
               his
                
               course
               .
               —
               Antonius
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caesar
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Forget
                
               not
                
               in
                
               your
                
               speed
               ,
                
               Antonius
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               touch
                
               Calphurnia
               ,
                
               for
                
               our
                
               elders
                
               say
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               barren
               ,
                
               touchèd
                
               in
                
               this
                
               holy
                
               chase
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Shake
                
               off
                
               their
                
               sterile
                
               curse
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               shall
                
               remember
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               When
                
               Caesar
                
               says
                
               
               <span class="inline_quote">
                  Do
                   
                  this
                  ,
                  
               </span>
                
               it
                
               is
                
               performed
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Set
                
               on
                
               and
                
               leave
                
               no
                
               ceremony
                
               out
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         
         Sennet
         .
         
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SOOTHSAYER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caesar
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ha
               !
                
               Who
                
               calls
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Bid
                
               every
                
               noise
                
               be
                
               still
               .
                
               Peace
               ,
                
               yet
                
               again
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Who
                
               is
                
               it
                
               in
                
               the
                
               press
                
               that
                
               calls
                
               on
                
               me
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               hear
                
               a
                
               tongue
                
               shriller
                
               than
                
               all
                
               the
                
               music
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Cry
                
               
               <span class="inline_quote">
                  Caesar
                  .
                  
               </span>
                
               Speak
               .
                
               Caesar
                
               is
                
               turned
                
               to
                
               hear
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SOOTHSAYER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Beware
                
               the
                
               ides
                
               of
                
               March
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               man
                
               is
                
               that
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               A
                
               soothsayer
                
               bids
                
               you
                
               beware
                
               the
                
               ides
                
               of
                
               March
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-015.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-015.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-015.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 1. SC. 2</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Set
                
               him
                
               before
                
               me
               .
                
               Let
                
               me
                
               see
                
               his
                
               face
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Fellow
               ,
                
               come
                
               from
                
               the
                
               throng
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               The
                
               Soothsayer
                
               comes
                
               forward
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Look
                
               upon
                
               Caesar
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               sayst
                
               thou
                
               to
                
               me
                
               now
               ?
                
               Speak
                
               once
                
               again
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SOOTHSAYER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Beware
                
               the
                
               ides
                
               of
                
               March
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               is
                
               a
                
               dreamer
               .
                
               Let
                
               us
                
               leave
                
               him
               .
                
               Pass
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         
         Sennet
         .
         
          
         All
          
         but
          
         Brutus
          
         and
          
         Cassius
          
         exit
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Will
                
               you
                
               go
                
               see
                
               the
                
               order
                
               of
                
               the
                
               course
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Not
                
               I
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               pray
                
               you
               ,
                
               do
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               am
                
               not
                
               gamesome
               .
                
               I
                
               do
                
               lack
                
               some
                
               part
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Of
                
               that
                
               quick
                
               spirit
                
               that
                
               is
                
               in
                
               Antony
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let
                
               me
                
               not
                
               hinder
               ,
                
               Cassius
               ,
                
               your
                
               desires
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I’ll
                
               leave
                
               you
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Brutus
               ,
                
               I
                
               do
                
               observe
                
               you
                
               now
                
               of
                
               late
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               have
                
               not
                
               from
                
               your
                
               eyes
                
               that
                
               gentleness
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               show
                
               of
                
               love
                
               as
                
               I
                
               was
                
               wont
                
               to
                
               have
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               bear
                
               too
                
               stubborn
                
               and
                
               too
                
               strange
                
               a
                
               hand
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Over
                
               your
                
               friend
                
               that
                
               loves
                
               you
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Cassius
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Be
                
               not
                
               deceived
               .
                
               If
                
               I
                
               have
                
               veiled
                
               my
                
               look
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               turn
                
               the
                
               trouble
                
               of
                
               my
                
               countenance
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Merely
                
               upon
                
               myself
               .
                
               Vexèd
                
               I
                
               am
               
               <br></br>

               ’Tis

               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               His

               did
                
               from
                
               their
                
               color

               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               that
