               whose
                
               bend
                
               doth
                
               awe
                
               the
                
               world
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Did
                
               lose
                
               his
                
               luster
               .
                
               I
                
               did
                
               hear
                
               him
                
               groan
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ay
               ,
                
               and
                
               that
                
               tongue
                
               of
                
               his
                
               that
                
               bade
                
               the
                
               Romans
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Mark
                
               him
                
               and
                
               write
                
               his
                
               speeches
                
               in
                
               their
                
               books
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               
               <span class="inline_quote">
                  Alas
                  ,
                  
               </span>
                
               it
                
               cried
                
               
               <span class="inline_quote">
                  Give
                   
                  me
                   
                  some
                   
                  drink
                  ,
                   
                  Titinius
                  
               </span>
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               a
                
               sick
                
               girl
               .
                
               You
                
               gods
               ,
                
               it
                
               doth
                
               amaze
                
               me
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               A
                
               man
                
               of
                
               such
                
               a
                
               feeble
                
               temper
                
               should
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               get
                
               the
                
               start
                
               of
                
               the
                
               majestic
                
               world
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               bear
                
               the
                
               palm
                
               alone
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Shout
         .
          
         
         Flourish
         .
         
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Another
                
               general
                
               shout
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               do
                
               believe
                
               that
                
               these
                
               applauses
                
               are
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               some
                
               new
                
               honors
                
               that
                
               are
                
               heaped
                
               on
                
               Caesar
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
               ,
                
               man
               ,
                
               he
                
               doth
                
               bestride
                
               the
                
               narrow
                
               world
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Like
                
               a
                
               Colossus
               ,
                
               and
                
               we
                
               petty
                
               men
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Walk
                
               under
                
               his
                
               huge
                
               legs
                
               and
                
               peep
                
               about
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               find
                
               ourselves
                
               dishonorable
                
               graves
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Men
                
               at
                
               some
                
               time
                
               are
                
               masters
                
               of
                
               their
                
               fates
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               fault
               ,
                
               dear
                
               Brutus
               ,
                
               is
                
               not
                
               in
                
               our
                
               stars
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               in
                
               ourselves
               ,
                
               that
                
               we
                
               are
                
               underlings
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-023.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-023.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-023.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 1. SC. 2</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               
               <span class="inline_quote">
                  Brutus
                  
               </span>
                
               and
                
               
               <span class="inline_quote">
                  Caesar
                  
               </span>
               —
               what
                
               should
                
               be
                
               in
                
               that
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               
               <span class="inline_quote">
                  Caesar
                  
               </span>
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
                
               should
                
               that
                
               name
                
               be
                
               sounded
                
               more
                
               than
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               yours
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Write
                
               them
                
               together
               ,
                
               yours
                
               is
                
               as
                
               fair
                
               a
                
               name
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Sound
                
               them
               ,
                
               it
                
               doth
                
               become
                
               the
                
               mouth
                
               as
                
               well
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Weigh
                
               them
               ,
                
               it
                
               is
                
               as
                
               heavy
               ;
                
               conjure
                
               with
                
               ’em
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               
               <span class="inline_quote">
                  Brutus
                  
               </span>
                
               will
                
               start
                
               a
                
               spirit
                
               as
                
               soon
                
               as
                
               
               <span class="inline_quote">
                  Caesar
                  .
                  
               </span>
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Now
               ,
                
               in
                
               the
                
               names
                
               of
                
               all
                
               the
                
               gods
                
               at
                
               once
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Upon
                
               what
                
               meat
                
               doth
                
               this
                
               our
                
               Caesar
                
               feed
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               he
                
               is
                
               grown
                
               so
                
               great
               ?
                
               Age
               ,
                
               thou
                
               art
                
               shamed
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Rome
               ,
                
               thou
                
               hast
                
               lost
                
               the
                
               breed
                
               of
                
               noble
                
               bloods
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               When
                
               went
                
               there
                
               by
                
               an
                
               age
               ,
                
               since
                
               the
                
               great
                
               flood
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               it
                
               was
                
               famed
                
               with
                
               more
                
               than
                
               with
                
               one
                
               man
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               When
                
               could
                
               they
                
               say
               ,
                
               till
                
               now
               ,
                
               that
                
               talked
                
               of
                
               Rome
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               her
                
               wide
                
               walks
                
               encompassed
                
               but
                
               one
                
               man
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Now
                
               is
                
               it
                
               Rome
                
               indeed
               ,
                
               and
                
               room
                
               enough
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               When
                
               there
                
               is
                
               in
                
               it
                
               but
                
               one
                
               only
                
               man
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
               ,
                
               you
                
               and
                
               I
                
               have
                
               heard
                
               our
                
               fathers
                
               say
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               There
                
               was
                
               a
                
               Brutus
                
               once
                
               that
                
               would
                
               have
                
               brooked
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Th’
                
               eternal
                
               devil
                
               to
                
               keep
                
               his
                
               state
                
               in
                
               Rome
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               easily
                
               as
                
               a
                
               king
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               you
                
               do
                
               love
                
               me
               ,
                
               I
                
               am
                
               nothing
                
               jealous
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               you
                
               would
                
               work
                
               me
                
               to
               ,
                
               I
                
               have
                
               some
                
               aim
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               How
                
               I
                
               have
                
               thought
                
               of
                
               this
               ,
                
               and
                
               of
                
               these
                
               times
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               shall
                
               recount
                
               hereafter
               .
                
               For
                
               this
                
               present
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               would
                
               not
               ,
                
               so
                
               with
                
               love
                
               I
                
               might
                
               entreat
                
               you
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Be
                
               any
                
               further
                
               moved
               .
                
               What
                
               you
                
               have
                
               said
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               will
                
               consider
               ;
                
               what
                
               you
                
               have
                
               to
                
               say
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               will
                
               with
                
               patience
                
               hear
               ,
                
               and
                
               find
                
               a
                
               time
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Both
                
               meet
                
               to
                
               hear
                
               and
                
               answer
                
               such
                
               high
                
               things
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Till
                
               then
               ,
                
               my
                
               noble
                
               friend
               ,
                
               chew
                
               upon
                
               this
               :
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Brutus
                
               had
                
               rather
                
               be
                
               a
                
               villager
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Than
                
               to
                
               repute
                
               himself
                
               a
                
               son
                
               of
                
               Rome
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-025.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-025.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-025.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 1. SC. 2</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Under
                
               these
                
               hard
                
               conditions
                
               as
                
               this
                
               time
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Is
                
               like
                
               to
                
               lay
                
               upon
                
               us
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               am
                
               glad
                
               that
                
               my
                
               weak
                
               words
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Have
                
               struck
                
               but
                
               thus
                
               much
                
               show
                
               of
                
               fire
                
               from
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Brutus
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Caesar
          
         and
          
         his
          
         train
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               games
                
               are
                
               done
               ,
                
               and
                
               Caesar
                
               is
                
               returning
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               they
                
               pass
                
               by
               ,
                
               pluck
                
               Casca
                
               by
                
               the
                
               sleeve
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               he
                
               will
               ,
                
               after
                
               his
                
               sour
                
               fashion
               ,
                
               tell
                
               you
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               hath
                
               proceeded
                
               worthy
                
               note
                
               today
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               will
                
               do
                
               so
               .
                
               But
                
               look
                
               you
               ,
                
               Cassius
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               angry
                
               spot
                
               doth
                
               glow
                
               on
                
               Caesar’s
                
               brow
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               all
                
               the
                
               rest
                
               look
                
               like
                
               a
                
               chidden
                
               train
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Calphurnia’s
                
               cheek
                
               is
                
               pale
               ,
                
               and
                
               Cicero
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Looks
                
               with
                
               such
                
               ferret
                
               and
                
               such
                
               fiery
                
               eyes
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               we
                
               have
                
               seen
                
               him
                
               in
                
               the
                
               Capitol
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Being
                
               crossed
                
               in
                
               conference
                
               by
                
               some
                
               senators
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Casca
                
               will
                
               tell
                
               us
                
               what
                
               the
                
               matter
                
               is
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Antonius
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caesar
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let
                
               me
                
               have
                
               men
                
               about
                
               me
                
               that
                
               are
                
               fat
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Sleek-headed
                
               men
               ,
                
               and
                
               such
                
               as
                
               sleep
                
               a-nights
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yond
                
               Cassius
                
               has
                
               a
                
               lean
                
               and
                
               hungry
                
               look
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               thinks
                
               too
                
               much
               .
                
               Such
                
               men
                
               are
                
               dangerous
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Fear
                
               him
                
               not
               ,
                
               Caesar
               ;
                
               he’s
                
               not
                
               dangerous
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               is
                
               a
                
               noble
                
               Roman
               ,
                
               and
                
               well
                
               given
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Would
                
               he
                
               were
                
               fatter
               !
                
               But
                
               I
                
               fear
                
               him
                
               not
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yet
                
               if
                
               my
                
               name
                
               were
                
               liable
                
               to
                
               fear
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-027.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-027.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-027.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 1. SC. 2</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               do
                
               not
                
               know
                
               the
                
               man
                
               I
                
               should
                
               avoid
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               soon
                
               as
                
               that
                
               spare
                
               Cassius
               .
                
               He
                
               reads
                
               much
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               is
                
               a
                
               great
                
               observer
               ,
                
               and
                
               he
                
               looks
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Quite
                
               through
                
               the
                
               deeds
                
               of
                
               men
               .
                
               He
                
               loves
                
               no
                
               plays
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               thou
                
               dost
               ,
                
               Antony
               ;
                
               he
                
               hears
                
               no
                
               music
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Seldom
                
               he
                
               smiles
               ,
                
               and
                
               smiles
                
               in
                
               such
                
               a
                
               sort
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               if
                
               he
                
               mocked
                
               himself
                
               and
                
               scorned
                
               his
                
               spirit
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               could
                
               be
                
               moved
                
               to
                
               smile
                
               at
                
               anything
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Such
                
               men
                
               as
                
               he
                
               be
                
               never
                
               at
                
               heart’s
                
               ease
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Whiles
                
               they
                
               behold
                
               a
                
               greater
                
               than
                
               themselves
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               therefore
                
               are
                
               they
                
               very
                
               dangerous
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               rather
                
               tell
                
               thee
                
               what
                
               is
                
               to
                
               be
                
               feared
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Than
                
               what
                
               I
                
               fear
               ;
                
               for
                
               always
                
               I
                
               am
                
               Caesar
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Come
                
               on
                
               my
                
               right
                
               hand
               ,
                
               for
                
               this
                
               ear
                
               is
                
               deaf
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               tell
                
               me
                
               truly
                
               what
                
               thou
                
               think’st
                
               of
                
               him
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         
         Sennet
         .
         
          
         Caesar
          
         and
          
         his
          
         train
          
         exit
         
         <br></br>
         but
          
         Casca
          
         remains
          
         behind
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               pulled
                
               me
                
               by
                
               the
                
               cloak
               .
                
               Would
                
               you
                
               speak
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               with
                
               me
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ay
               ,
                
               Casca
               .
                
               Tell
                
               us
                
               what
                
               hath
                
               chanced
                
               today
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               Caesar
                
               looks
                
               so
                
               sad
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
               ,
                
               you
                
               were
                
               with
                
               him
               ,
                
               were
                
               you
                
               not
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               should
                
               not
                
               then
                
               ask
                
               Casca
                
               what
                
               had
                
               chanced
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
               ,
                
               there
                
               was
                
               a
                
               crown
                
               offered
                
               him
               ;
                
               and
               ,
                
               being
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               offered
                
               him
               ,
                
               he
                
               put
                
               it
                
               by
                
               with
                
               the
                
               back
                
               of
                
               his
                
               hand
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               thus
               ,
                
               and
                
               then
                
               the
                
               people
                
               fell
                
               a-shouting
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">

               What
                
               was
                
               the

               for
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
               ,
                
               for
                
               that
                
               too
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               They
                
               shouted
                
               thrice
               .
                
               What
                
               was
                
               the
                
               last
                
               cry
                
               for
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
               ,
                
               for
                
               that
                
               too
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Was
                
               the
                
               crown
                
               offered
                
               him
                
               thrice
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ay
               ,
                
               marry
               ,
                
               was
                
               ’t
               ,
                
               and
                
               he
                
               put

               ,
                
               every
               
               <br></br>

               <br></br>

         <h6 class="fw">ACT 1. SC. 2</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Who
                
               offered
                
               him
                
               the
                
               crown
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
               ,
                
               Antony
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Tell
                
               us
                
               the
                
               manner
                
               of
                
               it
               ,
                
               gentle
                
               Casca
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               can
                
               as
                
               well
                
               be
                
               hanged
                
               as
                
               tell
                
               the
                
               manner
                
               of
                
               it
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               was
                
               mere
                
               foolery
               ;
                
               I
                
               did
                
               not
                
               mark
                
               it
               .
                
               I
                
               saw
                
               Mark
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Antony
                
               offer
                
               him
                
               a
                
               crown
                
               (
               yet
                
               ’twas
                
               not
                
               a
                
               crown
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               neither
               ;
                
               ’twas
                
               one
                
               of
                
               these
                
               coronets
               )
               ,
                
               and
               ,
                
               as
                
               I
                
               told
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               you
               ,
                
               he
                
               put
                
               it
                
               by
                
               once
               ;
                
               but
                
               for
                
               all
                
               that
               ,
                
               to
                
               my
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               thinking
               ,
                
               he
                
               would
                
               fain
                
               have
                
               had
                
               it
               .
                
               Then
                
               he
                
               offered
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               it
                
               to
                
               him
                
               again
               ;
                
               then
                
               he
                
               put
                
               it
                
               by
                
               again
               ;
                
               but
                
               to
                
               my
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               thinking
               ,
                
               he
                
               was
                
               very
                
               loath
                
               to
                
               lay
                
               his
                
               fingers
                
               off
                
               it
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               then
                
               he
                
               offered
                
               it
                
               the
                
               third
                
               time
               .
                
               He
                
               put
                
               it
                
               the
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               third
                
               time
                
               by
               ,
                
               and
                
               still
                
               as
                
               he
                
               refused
                
               it
                
               the
                
               rabblement
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               hooted
                
               and
                
               clapped
                
               their
                
               chopped
                
               hands
                
               and
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               threw
                
               up
                
               their
                
               sweaty
                
               nightcaps
                
               and
                
               uttered
                
               such
                
               a
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               deal
                
               of
                
               stinking
                
               breath
                
               because
                
               Caesar
                
               refused
                
               the
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               crown
                
               that
                
               it
                
               had
                
               almost
                
               choked
                
               Caesar
               ,
                
               for
                
               he
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               swooned
                
               and
                
               fell
                
               down
                
               at
                
               it
               .
                
               And
                
               for
                
               mine
                
               own
                
               part
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               durst
                
               not
                
               laugh
                
               for
                
               fear
                
               of
                
               opening
                
               my
                
               lips
                
               and
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               receiving
                
               the
                
               bad
                
               air
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               soft
               ,
                
               I
                
               pray
                
               you
               .
                
               What
               ,
                
               did
                
               Caesar
                
               swoon
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               fell
                
               down
                
               in
                
               the
                
               marketplace
                
               and
                
               foamed
                
               at
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               mouth
                
               and
                
               was
                
               speechless
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               ’Tis
                
               very
                
               like
               ;
                
               he
                
               hath
                
               the
                
               falling
                
               sickness
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               No
               ,
                
               Caesar
                
               hath
                
               it
                
               not
               ;
                
               but
                
               you
                
               and
                
               I
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               honest
                
               Casca
               ,
                
               we
                
               have
                
               the
                
               falling
                
               sickness
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               know
                
               not
                
               what
                
               you
                
               mean
                
               by
                
               that
               ,
                
               but
                
               I
                
               am
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               sure
                
               Caesar
                
               fell
                
               down
               .
                
               If
                
               the
                
               tag-rag
                
               people
                
               did
                
               not
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               clap
                
               him
                
               and
                
               hiss
                
               him
               ,
                
               according
                
               as
                
               he
                
               pleased
                
               and
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               displeased
                
               them
               ,
                
               as
                
               they
                
               use
                
               to
                
               do
                
               the
                
               players
                
               in
                
               the
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               theater
               ,
                
               I
                
               am
                
               no
                
               true
                
               man
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-031.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-031.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
