         <h6 class="fw">ACT 1. SC. 2</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               said
                
               he
                
               when
                
               he
                
               came
                
               unto
                
               himself
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Marry
               ,
                
               before
                
               he
                
               fell
                
               down
               ,
                
               when
                
               he
                
               perceived
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               the
                
               common
                
               herd
                
               was
                
               glad
                
               he
                
               refused
                
               the
                
               crown
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               he
                
               plucked
                
               me
                
               ope
                
               his
                
               doublet
                
               and
                
               offered
                
               them
                
               his
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               throat
                
               to
                
               cut
               .
                
               An
                
               I
                
               had
                
               been
                
               a
                
               man
                
               of
                
               any
                
               occupation
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               if
                
               I
                
               would
                
               not
                
               have
                
               taken
                
               him
                
               at
                
               a
                
               word
               ,
                
               I
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               would
                
               I
                
               might
                
               go
                
               to
                
               hell
                
               among
                
               the
                
               rogues
               .
                
               And
                
               so
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               he
                
               fell
               .
                
               When
                
               he
                
               came
                
               to
                
               himself
                
               again
               ,
                
               he
                
               said
                
               if
                
               he
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               had
                
               done
                
               or
                
               said
                
               anything
                
               amiss
               ,
                
               he
                
               desired
                
               their
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Worships
                
               to
                
               think
                
               it
                
               was
                
               his
                
               infirmity
               .
                
               Three
                
               or
                
               four
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               wenches
                
               where
                
               I
                
               stood
                
               cried
                
               
               <span class="inline_quote">
                  Alas
                  ,
                   
                  good
                   
                  soul
                  !
                  
               </span>
                
               and
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               forgave
                
               him
                
               with
                
               all
                
               their
                
               hearts
               .
                
               But
                
               there’s
                
               no
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               heed
                
               to
                
               be
                
               taken
                
               of
                
               them
               ;
                
               if
                
               Caesar
                
               had
                
               stabbed
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               their
                
               mothers
               ,
                
               they
                
               would
                
               have
                
               done
                
               no
                
               less
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
               ,
                
               after
                
               that
               ,
                
               he
                
               came
                
               thus
                
               sad
                
               away
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ay
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Did
                
               Cicero
                
               say
                
               anything
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ay
               ,
                
               he
                
               spoke
                
               Greek
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               what
                
               effect
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Nay
               ,
                
               an
                
               I
                
               tell
                
               you
                
               that
               ,
                
               I’ll
                
               ne’er
                
               look
                
               you
                
               i’
                
               th’
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               face
                
               again
               .
                
               But
                
               those
                
               that
                
               understood
                
               him
                
               smiled
                
               at
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               one
                
               another
                
               and
                
               shook
                
               their
                
               heads
               .
                
               But
                
               for
                
               mine
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               own
                
               part
               ,
                
               it
                
               was
                
               Greek
                
               to
                
               me
               .
                
               I
                
               could
                
               tell
                
               you
                
               more
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               news
                
               too
               :
                
               Marullus
                
               and
                
               Flavius
               ,
                
               for
                
               pulling
                
               scarves
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               off
                
               Caesar’s
                
               images
               ,
                
               are
                
               put
                
               to
                
               silence
               .
                
               Fare
                
               you
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               well
               .
                
               There
                
               was
                
               more
                
               foolery
                
               yet
               ,
                
               if
                
               I
                
               could
                
               remember
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               it
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Will
                
               you
                
               sup
                
               with
                
               me
                
               tonight
               ,
                
               Casca
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               No
               ,
                
               I
                
               am
                
               promised
                
               forth
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Will
                
               you
                
               dine
                
               with
                
               me
                
               tomorrow
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ay
               ,
                
               if
                
               I
                
               be
                
               alive
               ,
                
               and
                
               your
                
               mind
                
               hold
               ,
                
               and
                
               your
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               dinner
                
               worth
                
               the
                
               eating
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Good
               .
                
               I
                
               will
                
               expect
                
               you
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Do
                
               so
               .
                
               Farewell
                
               both
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         He
          
         exits
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-033.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-033.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-033.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 1. SC. 2</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               a
                
               blunt
                
               fellow
                
               is
                
               this
                
               grown
                
               to
                
               be
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               was
                
               quick
                
               mettle
                
               when
                
               he
                
               went
                
               to
                
               school
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               is
                
               he
                
               now
                
               in
                
               execution
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Of
                
               any
                
               bold
                
               or
                
               noble
                
               enterprise
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               However
                
               he
                
               puts
                
               on
                
               this
                
               tardy
                
               form
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               This
                
               rudeness
                
               is
                
               a
                
               sauce
                
               to
                
               his
                
               good
                
               wit
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Which
                
               gives
                
               men
                
               stomach
                
               to
                
               digest
                
               his
                
               words
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               With
                
               better
                
               appetite
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               so
                
               it
                
               is
               .
                
               For
                
               this
                
               time
                
               I
                
               will
                
               leave
                
               you
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Tomorrow
               ,
                
               if
                
               you
                
               please
                
               to
                
               speak
                
               with
                
               me
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               will
                
               come
                
               home
                
               to
                
               you
               ;
                
               or
               ,
                
               if
                
               you
                
               will
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Come
                
               home
                
               to
                
               me
               ,
                
               and
                
               I
                
               will
                
               wait
                
               for
                
               you
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               will
                
               do
                
               so
               .
                
               Till
                
               then
               ,
                
               think
                
               of
                
               the
                
               world
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               Brutus
                
               exits
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Well
               ,
                
               Brutus
               ,
                
               thou
                
               art
                
               noble
               .
                
               Yet
                
               I
                
               see
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thy
                
               honorable
                
               mettle
                
               may
                
               be
                
               wrought
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               From
                
               that
                
               it
                
               is
                
               disposed
               .
                
               Therefore
                
               it
                
               is
                
               meet
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               noble
                
               minds
                
               keep
                
               ever
                
               with
                
               their
                
               likes
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               who
                
               so
                
               firm
                
               that
                
               cannot
                
               be
                
               seduced
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caesar
                
               doth
                
               bear
                
               me
                
               hard
               ,
                
               but
                
               he
                
               loves
                
               Brutus
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               I
                
               were
                
               Brutus
                
               now
               ,
                
               and
                
               he
                
               were
                
               Cassius
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               should
                
               not
                
               humor
                
               me
               .
                
               I
                
               will
                
               this
                
               night
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               In
                
               several
                
               hands
                
               in
                
               at
                
               his
                
               windows
                
               throw
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               if
                
               they
                
               came
                
               from
                
               several
                
               citizens
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Writings
               ,
                
               all
                
               tending
                
               to
                
               the
                
               great
                
               opinion
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               Rome
                
               holds
                
               of
                
               his
                
               name
               ,
                
               wherein
                
               obscurely
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caesar’s
                
               ambition
                
               shall
                
               be
                
               glancèd
                
               at
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               after
                
               this
               ,
                
               let
                
               Caesar
                
               seat
                
               him
                
               sure
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               we
                
               will
                
               shake
                
               him
               ,
                
               or
                
               worse
                
               days
                
               endure
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         He
          
         exits
         .
         
         
      </div>
      
      <br></br>
      
      <div class="milestone page"> </div>
      
      <span class="hr"> </span>
      <span class="pageimage">
         <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-035.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-035.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
            <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-035.jpg" class="display"></img>
         </a>
      </span>
      
      <h6 class="fw">ACT 1. SC. 3</h6>
      
      <div class="scene ">
         
         <h4>
            Scene
             
            3
            
         </h4>
         
         <br></br>
         
         
         
         Thunder
         
          
         and
          
         lightning
         .
         
          
         
         Enter
          
         Casca
          
         and
          
         Cicero
         .
         
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CICERO
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Good
                
               even
               ,
                
               Casca
               .
                
               Brought
                
               you
                
               Caesar
                
               home
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
                
               are
                
               you
                
               breathless
               ?
                
               And
                
               why
                
               stare
                
               you
                
               so
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Are
                
               not
                
               you
                
               moved
               ,
                
               when
                
               all
                
               the
                
               sway
                
               of
                
               earth
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Shakes
                
               like
                
               a
                
               thing
                
               unfirm
               ?
                
               O
                
               Cicero
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               have
                
               seen
                
               tempests
                
               when
                
               the
                
               scolding
                
               winds
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Have
                
               rived
                
               the
                
               knotty
                
               oaks
               ,
                
               and
                
               I
                
               have
                
               seen
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Th’
                
               ambitious
                
               ocean
                
               swell
                
               and
                
               rage
                
               and
                
               foam
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               be
                
               exalted
                
               with
                
               the
                
               threat’ning
                
               clouds
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               never
                
               till
                
               tonight
               ,
                
               never
                
               till
                
               now
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Did
                
               I
                
               go
                
               through
                
               a
                
               tempest
                
               dropping
                
               fire
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Either
                
               there
                
               is
                
               a
                
               civil
                
               strife
                
               in
                
               heaven
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Or
                
               else
                
               the
                
               world
               ,
                
               too
                
               saucy
                
               with
                
               the
                
               gods
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Incenses
                
               them
                
               to
                
               send
                
               destruction
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CICERO
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
               ,
                
               saw
                
               you
                
               anything
                
               more
                
               wonderful
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               A
                
               common
                
               slave
                
               (
               you
                
               know
                
               him
                
               well
                
               by
                
               sight
               )
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Held
                
               up
                
               his
                
               left
                
               hand
               ,
                
               which
                
               did
                
               flame
                
               and
                
               burn
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Like
                
               twenty
                
               torches
                
               joined
               ;
                
               and
                
               yet
                
               his
                
               hand
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Not
                
               sensible
                
               of
                
               fire
               ,
                
               remained
                
               unscorched
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Besides
                
               (
               I
                
               ha’
                
               not
                
               since
                
               put
                
               up
                
               my
                
               sword
               )
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Against
                
               the
                
               Capitol
                
               I
                
               met
                
               a
                
               lion
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Who
                
               glazed
                
               upon
                
               me
                
               and
                
               went
                
               surly
                
               by
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Without
                
               annoying
                
               me
               .
                
               And
                
               there
                
               were
                
               drawn
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Upon
                
               a
                
               heap
                
               a
                
               hundred
                
               ghastly
                
               women
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Transformèd
                
               with
                
               their
                
               fear
               ,
                
               who
                
               swore
                
               they
                
               saw
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Men
                
               all
                
               in
                
               fire
                
               walk
                
               up
                
               and
                
               down
                
               the
                
               streets
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               yesterday
                
               the
                
               bird
                
               of
                
               night
                
               did
                
               sit
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Even
                
               at
                
               noonday
                
               upon
                
               the
                
               marketplace
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hooting
                
               and
                
               shrieking
               .
                
               When
                
               these
                
               prodigies
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Do
                
               so
                
               conjointly
                
               meet
               ,
                
               let
                
               not
                
               men
                
               say
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-037.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-037.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-037.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 1. SC. 3</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               
               <span class="inline_quote">
                  These
                   
                  are
                   
                  their
                   
                  reasons
                  ,
                   
                  they
                   
                  are
                   
                  natural
                  ,
                  
               </span>
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               I
                
               believe
                
               they
                
               are
                
               portentous
                
               things
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Unto
                
               the
                
               climate
                
               that
                
               they
                
               point
                
               upon
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CICERO
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Indeed
               ,
                
               it
                
               is
                
               a
                
               strange-disposèd
                
               time
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               men
                
               may
                
               construe
                
               things
                
               after
                
               their
                
               fashion
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Clean
                
               from
                
               the
                
               purpose
                
               of
                
               the
                
               things
                
               themselves
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Comes
                
               Caesar
                
               to
                
               the
                
               Capitol
                
               tomorrow
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               doth
               ,
                
               for
                
               he
                
               did
                
               bid
                
               Antonius
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Send
                
               word
                
               to
                
               you
                
               he
                
               would
                
               be
                
               there
                
               tomorrow
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CICERO
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Good
                
               night
                
               then
               ,
                
               Casca
               .
                
               This
                
               disturbèd
                
               sky
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Is
                
               not
                
               to
                
               walk
                
               in
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Farewell
               ,
                
               Cicero
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         Cicero
          
         exits
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Cassius
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Who’s
                
               there
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               A
                
               Roman
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Casca
               ,
                
               by
                
               your
                
               voice
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Your
                
               ear
                
               is
                
               good
               .
                
               Cassius
               ,
                
               what
                
               night
                
               is
                
               this
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               A
                
               very
                
               pleasing
                
               night
                
               to
                
               honest
                
               men
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Who
                
               ever
                
               knew
                
               the
                
               heavens
                
               menace
                
               so
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Those
                
               that
                
               have
                
               known
                
               the
                
               earth
                
               so
                
               full
                
               of
                
               faults
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               my
                
               part
               ,
                
               I
                
               have
                
               walked
                
               about
                
               the
                
               streets
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Submitting
                
               me
                
               unto
                
               the
                
               perilous
                
               night
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               thus
                
               unbracèd
               ,
                
               Casca
               ,
                
               as
                
               you
                
               see
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Have
                
               bared
                
               my
                
               bosom
                
               to
                
               the
                
               thunder-stone
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               when
                
               the
                
               cross
                
               blue
                
               lightning
                
               seemed
                
               to
                
               open
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               breast
                
               of
                
               heaven
               ,
                
               I
                
               did
                
               present
                
               myself
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Even
                
               in
                
               the
                
               aim
                
               and
                
               very
                
               flash
                
               of
                
               it
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>

         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
