         <h6 class="fw">ACT 1. SC. 3</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               wherefore
                
               did
                
               you
                
               so
                
               much
                
               tempt
                
               the
                
               heavens
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               is
                
               the
                
               part
                
               of
                
               men
                
               to
                
               fear
                
               and
                
               tremble
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               When
                
               the
                
               most
                
               mighty
                
               gods
                
               by
                
               tokens
                
               send
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Such
                
               dreadful
                
               heralds
                
               to
                
               astonish
                
               us
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               are
                
               dull
               ,
                
               Casca
               ,
                
               and
                
               those
                
               sparks
                
               of
                
               life
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               should
                
               be
                
               in
                
               a
                
               Roman
                
               you
                
               do
                
               want
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Or
                
               else
                
               you
                
               use
                
               not
               .
                
               You
                
               look
                
               pale
               ,
                
               and
                
               gaze
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               put
                
               on
                
               fear
               ,
                
               and
                
               cast
                
               yourself
                
               in
                
               wonder
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               see
                
               the
                
               strange
                
               impatience
                
               of
                
               the
                
               heavens
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               if
                
               you
                
               would
                
               consider
                
               the
                
               true
                
               cause
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
                
               all
                
               these
                
               fires
               ,
                
               why
                
               all
                
               these
                
               gliding
                
               ghosts
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
                
               birds
                
               and
                
               beasts
                
               from
                
               quality
                
               and
                
               kind
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
                
               old
                
               men
               ,
                
               fools
               ,
                
               and
                
               children
                
               calculate
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
                
               all
                
               these
                
               things
                
               change
                
               from
                
               their
                
               ordinance
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Their
                
               natures
               ,
                
               and
                
               preformèd
                
               faculties
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               monstrous
                
               quality
               —
               why
               ,
                
               you
                
               shall
                
               find
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               heaven
                
               hath
                
               infused
                
               them
                
               with
                
               these
                
               spirits
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               make
                
               them
                
               instruments
                
               of
                
               fear
                
               and
                
               warning
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Unto
                
               some
                
               monstrous
                
               state
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Now
                
               could
                
               I
               ,
                
               Casca
               ,
                
               name
                
               to
                
               thee
                
               a
                
               man
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Most
                
               like
                
               this
                
               dreadful
                
               night
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               thunders
               ,
                
               lightens
               ,
                
               opens
                
               graves
               ,
                
               and
                
               roars
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               doth
                
               the
                
               lion
                
               in
                
               the
                
               Capitol
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               A
                
               man
                
               no
                
               mightier
                
               than
                
               thyself
                
               or
                
               me
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               In
                
               personal
                
               action
               ,
                
               yet
                
               prodigious
                
               grown
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               fearful
               ,
                
               as
                
               these
                
               strange
                
               eruptions
                
               are
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               ’Tis
                
               Caesar
                
               that
                
               you
                
               mean
               ,
                
               is
                
               it
                
               not
               ,
                
               Cassius
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let
                
               it
                
               be
                
               who
                
               it
                
               is
               .
                
               For
                
               Romans
                
               now
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Have
                
               thews
                
               and
                
               limbs
                
               like
                
               to
                
               their
                
               ancestors
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
               ,
                
               woe
                
               the
                
               while
               ,
                
               our
                
               fathers’
                
               minds
                
               are
                
               dead
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               we
                
               are
                
               governed
                
               with
                
               our
                
               mothers’
                
               spirits
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Our
                
               yoke
                
               and
                
               sufferance
                
               show
                
               us
                
               womanish
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-041.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-041.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-041.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 1. SC. 3</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Indeed
               ,
                
               they
                
               say
                
               the
                
               Senators
                
               tomorrow
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Mean
                
               to
                
               establish
                
               Caesar
                
               as
                
               a
                
               king
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               he
                
               shall
                
               wear
                
               his
                
               crown
                
               by
                
               sea
                
               and
                
               land
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               In
                
               every
                
               place
                
               save
                
               here
                
               in
                
               Italy
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               know
                
               where
                
               I
                
               will
                
               wear
                
               this
                
               dagger
                
               then
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Cassius
                
               from
                
               bondage
                
               will
                
               deliver
                
               Cassius
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Therein
               ,
                
               you
                
               gods
               ,
                
               you
                
               make
                
               the
                
               weak
                
               most
                
               strong
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Therein
               ,
                
               you
                
               gods
               ,
                
               you
                
               tyrants
                
               do
                
               defeat
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Nor
                
               stony
                
               tower
               ,
                
               nor
                
               walls
                
               of
                
               beaten
                
               brass
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Nor
                
               airless
                
               dungeon
               ,
                
               nor
                
               strong
                
               links
                
               of
                
               iron
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Can
                
               be
                
               retentive
                
               to
                
               the
                
               strength
                
               of
                
               spirit
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               life
               ,
                
               being
                
               weary
                
               of
                
               these
                
               worldly
                
               bars
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Never
                
               lacks
                
               power
                
               to
                
               dismiss
                
               itself
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               I
                
               know
                
               this
               ,
                
               know
                
               all
                
               the
                
               world
                
               besides
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               part
                
               of
                
               tyranny
                
               that
                
               I
                
               do
                
               bear
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               can
                
               shake
                
               off
                
               at
                
               pleasure
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         
         Thunder
          
         still
         .
         
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               can
                
               I
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               every
                
               bondman
                
               in
                
               his
                
               own
                
               hand
                
               bears
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               power
                
               to
                
               cancel
                
               his
                
               captivity
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               why
                
               should
                
               Caesar
                
               be
                
               a
                
               tyrant
               ,
                
               then
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Poor
                
               man
               ,
                
               I
                
               know
                
               he
                
               would
                
               not
                
               be
                
               a
                
               wolf
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               that
                
               he
                
               sees
                
               the
                
               Romans
                
               are
                
               but
                
               sheep
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               were
                
               no
                
               lion
               ,
                
               were
                
               not
                
               Romans
                
               hinds
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Those
                
               that
                
               with
                
               haste
                
               will
                
               make
                
               a
                
               mighty
                
               fire
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Begin
                
               it
                
               with
                
               weak
                
               straws
               .
                
               What
                
               trash
                
               is
                
               Rome
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               rubbish
               ,
                
               and
                
               what
                
               offal
                
               when
                
               it
                
               serves
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               the
                
               base
                
               matter
                
               to
                
               illuminate
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               vile
                
               a
                
               thing
                
               as
                
               Caesar
               !
                
               But
               ,
                
               O
                
               grief
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Where
                
               hast
                
               thou
                
               led
                
               me
               ?
                
               I
                
               perhaps
                
               speak
                
               this
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Before
                
               a
                
               willing
                
               bondman
               ;
                
               then
               ,
                
               I
                
               know
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               My
                
               answer
                
               must
                
               be
                
               made
               .
                
               But
                
               I
                
               am
                
               armed
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               dangers
                
               are
                
               to
                
               me
                
               indifferent
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-043.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-043.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-043.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 1. SC. 3</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               speak
                
               to
                
               Casca
               ,
                
               and
                
               to
                
               such
                
               a
                
               man
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               is
                
               no
                
               fleering
                
               telltale
               .
                
               Hold
               .
                
               My
                
               hand
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               They
                
               shake
                
               hands
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Be
                
               factious
                
               for
                
               redress
                
               of
                
               all
                
               these
                
               griefs
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               I
                
               will
                
               set
                
               this
                
               foot
                
               of
                
               mine
                
               as
                
               far
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               who
                
               goes
                
               farthest
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               There’s
                
               a
                
               bargain
                
               made
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Now
                
               know
                
               you
               ,
                
               Casca
               ,
                
               I
                
               have
                
               moved
                
               already
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Some
                
               certain
                
               of
                
               the
                
               noblest-minded
                
               Romans
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               undergo
                
               with
                
               me
                
               an
                
               enterprise
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Of
                
               honorable-dangerous
                
               consequence
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               I
                
               do
                
               know
                
               by
                
               this
                
               they
                
               stay
                
               for
                
               me
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               In
                
               Pompey’s
                
               Porch
               .
                
               For
                
               now
               ,
                
               this
                
               fearful
                
               night
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               There
                
               is
                
               no
                
               stir
                
               or
                
               walking
                
               in
                
               the
                
               streets
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               the
                
               complexion
                
               of
                
               the
                
               element
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               In
                
               favor
                
               ’s
                
               like
                
               the
                
               work
                
               we
                
               have
                
               in
                
               hand
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Most
                
               bloody
               ,
                
               fiery
               ,
                
               and
                
               most
                
               terrible
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Cinna
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Stand
                
               close
                
               awhile
               ,
                
               for
                
               here
                
               comes
                
               one
                
               in
                
               haste
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               ’Tis
                
               Cinna
               ;
                
               I
                
               do
                
               know
                
               him
                
               by
                
               his
                
               gait
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               is
                
               a
                
               friend
               .
               —
               Cinna
               ,
                
               where
                
               haste
                
               you
                
               so
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CINNA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               find
                
               out
                
               you
               .
                
               Who’s
                
               that
               ?
                
               Metellus
                
               Cimber
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               No
               ,
                
               it
                
               is
                
               Casca
               ,
                
               one
                
               incorporate
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               our
                
               attempts
               .
                
               Am
                
               I
                
               not
                
               stayed
                
               for
               ,
                
               Cinna
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CINNA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               am
                
               glad
                
               on
                
               ’t
               .
                
               What
                
               a
                
               fearful
                
               night
                
               is
                
               this
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               There’s
                
               two
                
               or
                
               three
                
               of
                
               us
                
               have
                
               seen
                
               strange
                
               sights
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Am
                
               I
                
               not
                
               stayed
                
               for
               ?
                
               Tell
                
               me
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CINNA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yes
               ,
                
               you
                
               are
               .
                
               O
                
               Cassius
               ,
                
               if
                
               you
                
               could
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               win
                
               the
                
               noble
                
               Brutus
                
               to
                
               our
                
               party
               —
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-045.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-045.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-045.jpg" class="display"></img>

         <h6 class="fw">ACT 1. SC. 3</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            ,
             
            handing
             
            him
             
            papers
            
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Be
                
               you
                
               content
               .
                
               Good
                
               Cinna
               ,
                
               take
                
               this
                
               paper
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               look
                
               you
                
               lay
                
               it
                
               in
                
               the
                
               Praetor’s
                
               chair
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Where
                
               Brutus
                
               may
                
               but
                
               find
                
               it
               ;
                
               and
                
               throw
                
               this
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               In
                
               at
                
               his
                
               window
               ;
                
               set
                
               this
                
               up
                
               with
                
               wax
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Upon
                
               old
                
               Brutus’
                
               statue
               .
                
               All
                
               this
                
               done
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Repair
                
               to
                
               Pompey’s
                
               Porch
               ,
                
               where
                
               you
                
               shall
                
               find
                
               us
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Is
                
               Decius
                
               Brutus
                
               and
                
               Trebonius
                
               there
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CINNA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               All
                
               but
                
               Metellus
                
               Cimber
               ,
                
               and
                
               he’s
                
               gone
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               seek
                
               you
                
               at
                
               your
                
               house
               .
                
               Well
               ,
                
               I
                
               will
                
               hie
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               so
                
               bestow
                
               these
                
               papers
                
               as
                
               you
                
               bade
                
               me
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               done
               ,
                
               repair
                
               to
                
               Pompey’s
                
               Theater
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               Cinna
                
               exits
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Come
               ,
                
               Casca
               ,
                
               you
                
               and
                
               I
                
               will
                
               yet
                
               ere
                
               day
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               See
                
               Brutus
                
               at
                
               his
                
               house
               .
                
               Three
                
               parts
                
               of
                
               him
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Is
                
               ours
                
               already
               ,
                
               and
                
               the
                
               man
                
               entire
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Upon
                
               the
                
               next
                
               encounter
                
               yields
                
               him
                
               ours
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
               ,
                
               he
                
               sits
                
               high
                
               in
                
               all
                
               the
                
               people’s
                
               hearts
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               that
                
               which
                
               would
                
               appear
                
               offense
                
               in
                
               us
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               His
                
               countenance
               ,
                
               like
                
               richest
                
               alchemy
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Will
                
               change
                
               to
                
               virtue
                
               and
                
               to
                
               worthiness
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Him
                
               and
                
               his
                
               worth
                
               and
                
               our
                
               great
                
               need
                
               of
                
               him
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               have
                
               right
                
               well
                
               conceited
               .
                
               Let
                
               us
                
               go
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               it
                
               is
                
               after
                
               midnight
               ,
                
               and
                
               ere
                
               day
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               We
                
               will
                
               awake
                
               him
                
               and
                
               be
                
               sure
                
               of
                
               him
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         They
          
         exit
         .
         
         
      </div>
      
   </div>
   
   <br></br>
   
   <div class="milestone page"> </div>
   
   <span class="hr"> </span>
   <span class="pageimage">
      <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-049.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-049.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">

      </a>

   <div class="act doublespace ">
      
      <h4>
         ACT
          
         2
         
      </h4>
      
      <div class="scene ">
         
         <h4>
            Scene
             
            1
            
         </h4>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Brutus
          
         in
          
         his
          
         orchard
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
               ,
                
               Lucius
               ,
                
               ho
               !
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               cannot
                
               by
                
               the
                
               progress
                
               of
                
               the
                
               stars
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Give
                
               guess
                
               how
                
               near
                
               to
                
               day
               .
               —
               Lucius
               ,
                
               I
                
               say
               !
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               would
                
               it
                
               were
                
               my
                
               fault
                
               to
                
               sleep
                
               so
                
               soundly
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               When
               ,
                
               Lucius
               ,
                
               when
               ?
                
               Awake
               ,
                
               I
                
               say
               !
                
               What
               ,
                
               Lucius
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Lucius
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Called
                
               you
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Get
                
               me
                
               a
                
               taper
                
               in
                
               my
                
               study
               ,
                
               Lucius
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               When
                
               it
                
               is
                
               lighted
               ,
                
               come
                
               and
                
               call
                
               me
                
               here
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               will
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         He
          
         exits
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               must
                
               be
                
               by
                
               his
                
               death
               .
                
               And
                
               for
                
               my
                
               part
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               know
                
               no
                
               personal
                
               cause
                
               to
                
               spurn
                
               at
                
               him
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               for
                
               the
                
               general
               .
                
               He
                
               would
                
               be
                
               crowned
               :
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               How
                
               that
                
               might
                
               change
                
               his
                
               nature
               ,
                
               there’s
                
               the
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               question
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               is
                
               the
                
               bright
                
               day
                
               that
                
               brings
                
               forth
                
               the
                
               adder
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               that
                
               craves
                
               wary
                
               walking
               .
                
               Crown
                
               him
                
               that
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               then
                
               I
                
               grant
                
               we
                
               put
                
               a
                
               sting
                
               in
                
               him
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               at
                
               his
                
               will
                
               he
                
               may
                
               do
                
               danger
                
               with
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Th’
                
               abuse
                
               of
                
               greatness
                
               is
                
               when
                
               it
                
               disjoins
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-051.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-051.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-051.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 2. SC. 1</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Remorse
                
               from
                
               power
               .
                
               And
               ,
                
               to
                
               speak
                
               truth
                
               of
                
               Caesar
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               have
                
               not
                
               known
                
               when
                
               his
                
               affections
                
               swayed
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               More
                
               than
                
               his
                
               reason
               .
                
               But
                
               ’tis
                
               a
                
               common
                
               proof
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               lowliness
                
               is
                
               young
                
               ambition’s
                
               ladder
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Whereto
                
               the
                
               climber-upward
                
               turns
                
               his
                
               face
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
               ,
                
               when
                
               he
                
               once
                
               attains
                
               the
                
               upmost
                
               round
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               then
                
               unto
                
               the
                
               ladder
                
               turns
                
               his
                
               back
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Looks
                
               in
                
               the
                
               clouds
               ,
                
               scorning
                
               the
                
               base
                
               degrees
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               By
                
               which
                
               he
                
               did
                
               ascend
               .
                
               So
                
               Caesar
                
               may
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Then
               ,
                
               lest
                
               he
                
               may
               ,
                
               prevent
               .
                
               And
                
               since
                
               the
                
               quarrel
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Will
                
               bear
                
               no
                
               color
                
               for
                
               the
                
               thing
                
               he
                
               is
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Fashion
                
               it
                
               thus
               :
                
               that
                
               what
                
               he
                
               is
               ,
                
               augmented
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Would
                
               run
                
               to
                
               these
                
               and
                
               these
                
               extremities
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               therefore
                
               think
                
               him
                
               as
                
               a
                
               serpent’s
                
               egg
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Which
               ,
                
               hatched
               ,
                
               would
               ,
                
               as
                
               his
                
               kind
               ,
                
               grow
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               mischievous
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               kill
                
               him
                
               in
                
               the
                
               shell
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Lucius
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               taper
                
               burneth
                
               in
                
               your
                
               closet
               ,
                
               sir
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Searching
                
               the
                
               window
                
               for
                
               a
                
               flint
               ,
                
               I
                
               found
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               This
                
               paper
               ,
                
               thus
                
               sealed
                
               up
               ,
                
               and
                
               I
                
               am
                
               sure
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               did
                
               not
                
               lie
                
               there
                
               when
                
               I
                
               went
                
               to
                
               bed
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Gives
          
         him
          
         the
          
         letter
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Get
                
               you
                
               to
                
               bed
                
               again
               .
                
               It
                
               is
                
               not
                
               day
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Is
                
               not
                
               tomorrow
               ,
                
               boy
               ,
                
               the
                
               ides
                
               of
                
               March
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               know
                
               not
               ,
                
               sir
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Look
                
               in
                
               the
                
               calendar
               ,
                
               and
                
               bring
                
               me
                
               word
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               will
               ,
                
               sir
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         He
          
         exits
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               exhalations
               ,
                
               whizzing
                
               in
                
               the
                
               air
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Give
                
               so
                
               much
                
               light
                
               that
                
               I
                
               may
                
               read
                
               by
                
               them
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               Opens
                
               the
                
               letter
                
               and
                
               reads
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-053.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-053.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">

               <h6 class="fw">ACT 2. SC. 1</h6>
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Brutus
               ,
                
               thou
                
               sleep’st
               .
                
               Awake
               ,
                
               and
                
               see
                
               thyself
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Shall
                
               Rome
               ,
                
               etc.
                
               Speak
               ,
                
               strike
               ,
                
               redress
