               !
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               
               <span class="inline_quote">
                  Brutus
                  ,
                   
                  thou
                   
                  sleep’st
                  .
                   
                  Awake
                  .
                  
               </span>
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Such
                
               instigations
                
               have
                
               been
                
               often
                
               dropped
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Where
                
               I
                
               have
                
               took
                
               them
                
               up
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               
               <span class="inline_quote">
                  Shall
                   
                  Rome
                  ,
                   
                  etc.
                  
               </span>
                
               Thus
                
               must
                
               I
                
               piece
                
               it
                
               out
               :
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Shall
                
               Rome
                
               stand
                
               under
                
               one
                
               man’s
                
               awe
               ?
                
               What
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Rome
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               My
                
               ancestors
                
               did
                
               from
                
               the
                
               streets
                
               of
                
               Rome
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               Tarquin
                
               drive
                
               when
                
               he
                
               was
                
               called
                
               a
                
               king
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               
               <span class="inline_quote">
                  Speak
                  ,
                   
                  strike
                  ,
                   
                  redress
                  !
                  
               </span>
                
               Am
                
               I
                
               entreated
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               speak
                
               and
                
               strike
               ?
                
               O
                
               Rome
               ,
                
               I
                
               make
                
               thee
                
               promise
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               the
                
               redress
                
               will
                
               follow
               ,
                
               thou
                
               receivest
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thy
                
               full
                
               petition
                
               at
                
               the
                
               hand
                
               of
                
               Brutus
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Lucius
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Sir
               ,
                
               March
                
               is
                
               wasted
                
               fifteen
                
               days
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Knock
          
         within
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               ’Tis
                
               good
               .
                
               Go
                
               to
                
               the
                
               gate
               ;
                
               somebody
                
               knocks
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               Lucius
                
               exits
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Since
                
               Cassius
                
               first
                
               did
                
               whet
                
               me
                
               against
                
               Caesar
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               have
                
               not
                
               slept
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Between
                
               the
                
               acting
                
               of
                
               a
                
               dreadful
                
               thing
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               the
                
               first
                
               motion
               ,
                
               all
                
               the
                
               interim
                
               is
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Like
                
               a
                
               phantasma
                
               or
                
               a
                
               hideous
                
               dream
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               genius
                
               and
                
               the
                
               mortal
                
               instruments
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Are
                
               then
                
               in
                
               council
               ,
                
               and
                
               the
                
               state
                
               of
                
               man
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Like
                
               to
                
               a
                
               little
                
               kingdom
               ,
                
               suffers
                
               then
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               nature
                
               of
                
               an
                
               insurrection
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Lucius
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Sir
               ,
                
               ’tis
                
               your
                
               brother
                
               Cassius
                
               at
                
               the
                
               door
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Who
                
               doth
                
               desire
                
               to
                
               see
                
               you
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-055.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-055.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-055.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 2. SC. 1</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Is
                
               he
                
               alone
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               No
               ,
                
               sir
               .
                
               There
                
               are
                
               more
                
               with
                
               him
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Do
                
               you
                
               know
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               them
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               No
               ,
                
               sir
               .
                
               Their
                
               hats
                
               are
                
               plucked
                
               about
                
               their
                
               ears
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               half
                
               their
                
               faces
                
               buried
                
               in
                
               their
                
               cloaks
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               by
                
               no
                
               means
                
               I
                
               may
                
               discover
                
               them
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               By
                
               any
                
               mark
                
               of
                
               favor
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let
                
               ’em
                
               enter
               .
               
               Lucius
                
               exits
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               They
                
               are
                
               the
                
               faction
               .
                
               O
                
               conspiracy
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Sham’st
                
               thou
                
               to
                
               show
                
               thy
                
               dang’rous
                
               brow
                
               by
                
               night
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               When
                
               evils
                
               are
                
               most
                
               free
               ?
                
               O
               ,
                
               then
               ,
                
               by
                
               day
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Where
                
               wilt
                
               thou
                
               find
                
               a
                
               cavern
                
               dark
                
               enough
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               mask
                
               thy
                
               monstrous
                
               visage
               ?
                
               Seek
                
               none
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               conspiracy
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hide
                
               it
                
               in
                
               smiles
                
               and
                
               affability
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               if
                
               thou
                
               path
               ,
                
               thy
                
               native
                
               semblance
                
               on
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Not
                
               Erebus
                
               itself
                
               were
                
               dim
                
               enough
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               hide
                
               thee
                
               from
                
               prevention
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         the
          
         conspirators
         ,
          
         Cassius
         ,
          
         Casca
         ,
          
         Decius
         ,
          
         Cinna
         ,
         
         <br></br>
         Metellus
         ,
          
         and
          
         Trebonius
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               think
                
               we
                
               are
                
               too
                
               bold
                
               upon
                
               your
                
               rest
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Good
                
               morrow
               ,
                
               Brutus
               .
                
               Do
                
               we
                
               trouble
                
               you
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               have
                
               been
                
               up
                
               this
                
               hour
               ,
                
               awake
                
               all
                
               night
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Know
                
               I
                
               these
                
               men
                
               that
                
               come
                
               along
                
               with
                
               you
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yes
               ,
                
               every
                
               man
                
               of
                
               them
               ;
                
               and
                
               no
                
               man
                
               here
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               honors
                
               you
               ,
                
               and
                
               every
                
               one
                
               doth
                
               wish
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               had
                
               but
                
               that
                
               opinion
                
               of
                
               yourself
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Which
                
               every
                
               noble
                
               Roman
                
               bears
                
               of
                
               you
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               This
                
               is
                
               Trebonius
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-057.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-057.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-057.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 2. SC. 1</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               is
                
               welcome
                
               hither
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               This
               ,
                
               Decius
                
               Brutus
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               is
                
               welcome
                
               too
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               This
               ,
                
               Casca
               ;
                
               this
               ,
                
               Cinna
               ;
                
               and
                
               this
               ,
                
               Metellus
                
               Cimber
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               They
                
               are
                
               all
                
               welcome
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               watchful
                
               cares
                
               do
                
               interpose
                
               themselves
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Betwixt
                
               your
                
               eyes
                
               and
                
               night
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Shall
                
               I
                
               entreat
                
               a
                
               word
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Brutus
          
         and
          
         Cassius
          
         whisper
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               DECIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Here
                
               lies
                
               the
                
               east
               ;
                
               doth
                
               not
                
               the
                
               day
                
               break
                
               here
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               No
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CINNA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               pardon
               ,
                
               sir
               ,
                
               it
                
               doth
               ;
                
               and
                
               yon
                
               gray
                
               lines
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               fret
                
               the
                
               clouds
                
               are
                
               messengers
                
               of
                
               day
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               shall
                
               confess
                
               that
                
               you
                
               are
                
               both
                
               deceived
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Here
               ,
                
               as
                
               I
                
               point
                
               my
                
               sword
               ,
                
               the
                
               sun
                
               arises
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Which
                
               is
                
               a
                
               great
                
               way
                
               growing
                
               on
                
               the
                
               south
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Weighing
                
               the
                
               youthful
                
               season
                
               of
                
               the
                
               year
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Some
                
               two
                
               months
                
               hence
               ,
                
               up
                
               higher
                
               toward
                
               the
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               north
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               first
                
               presents
                
               his
                
               fire
               ,
                
               and
                
               the
                
               high
                
               east
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Stands
               ,
                
               as
                
               the
                
               Capitol
               ,
                
               directly
                
               here
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            ,
             
            coming
             
            forward
             
            with
             
            Cassius
            
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Give
                
               me
                
               your
                
               hands
                
               all
                
               over
               ,
                
               one
                
               by
                
               one
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               let
                
               us
                
               swear
                
               our
                
               resolution
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               No
               ,
                
               not
                
               an
                
               oath
               .
                
               If
                
               not
                
               the
                
               face
                
               of
                
               men
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               sufferance
                
               of
                
               our
                
               souls
               ,
                
               the
                
               time’s
                
               abuse
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               these
                
               be
                
               motives
                
               weak
               ,
                
               break
                
               off
                
               betimes
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               every
                
               man
                
               hence
                
               to
                
               his
                
               idle
                
               bed
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               let
                
               high-sighted
                
               tyranny
                
               range
                
               on
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-059.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-059.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-059.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 2. SC. 1</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Till
                
               each
                
               man
                
               drop
                
               by
                
               lottery
               .
                
               But
                
               if
                
               these
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               I
                
               am
                
               sure
                
               they
                
               do
               —
               bear
                
               fire
                
               enough
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               kindle
                
               cowards
                
               and
                
               to
                
               steel
                
               with
                
               valor
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               melting
                
               spirits
                
               of
                
               women
               ,
                
               then
               ,
                
               countrymen
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               need
                
               we
                
               any
                
               spur
                
               but
                
               our
                
               own
                
               cause
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               prick
                
               us
                
               to
                
               redress
               ?
                
               What
                
               other
                
               bond
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Than
                
               secret
                
               Romans
                
               that
                
               have
                
               spoke
                
               the
                
               word
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               will
                
               not
                
               palter
               ?
                
               And
                
               what
                
               other
                
               oath
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Than
                
               honesty
                
               to
                
               honesty
                
               engaged
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               this
                
               shall
                
               be
                
               or
                
               we
                
               will
                
               fall
                
               for
                
               it
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Swear
                
               priests
                
               and
                
               cowards
                
               and
                
               men
                
               cautelous
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Old
                
               feeble
                
               carrions
               ,
                
               and
                
               such
                
               suffering
                
               souls
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               welcome
                
               wrongs
               ;
                
               unto
                
               bad
                
               causes
                
               swear
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Such
                
               creatures
                
               as
                
               men
                
               doubt
               ;
                
               but
                
               do
                
               not
                
               stain
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               even
                
               virtue
                
               of
                
               our
                
               enterprise
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Nor
                
               th’
                
               insuppressive
                
               mettle
                
               of
                
               our
                
               spirits
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               think
                
               that
                
               or
                
               our
                
               cause
                
               or
                
               our
                
               performance
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Did
                
               need
                
               an
                
               oath
               ,
                
               when
                
               every
                
               drop
                
               of
                
               blood
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               every
                
               Roman
                
               bears
               ,
                
               and
                
               nobly
                
               bears
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Is
                
               guilty
                
               of
                
               a
                
               several
                
               bastardy
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               he
                
               do
                
               break
                
               the
                
               smallest
                
               particle
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Of
                
               any
                
               promise
                
               that
                
               hath
                
               passed
                
               from
                
               him
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               what
                
               of
                
               Cicero
               ?
                
               Shall
                
               we
                
               sound
                
               him
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               think
                
               he
                
               will
                
               stand
                
               very
                
               strong
                
               with
                
               us
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let
                
               us
                
               not
                
               leave
                
               him
                
               out
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CINNA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               No
               ,
                
               by
                
               no
                
               means
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               METELLUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
               ,
                
               let
                
               us
                
               have
                
               him
               ,
                
               for
                
               his
                
               silver
                
               hairs
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Will
                
               purchase
                
               us
                
               a
                
               good
                
               opinion
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               buy
                
               men’s
                
               voices
                
               to
                
               commend
                
               our
                
               deeds
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               shall
                
               be
                
               said
                
               his
                
               judgment
                
               ruled
                
               our
                
               hands
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Our
                
               youths
                
               and
                
               wildness
                
               shall
                
               no
                
               whit
                
               appear
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               all
                
               be
                
               buried
                
               in
                
               his
                
               gravity
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-061.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-061.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-061.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 2. SC. 1</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
               ,
                
               name
                
               him
                
               not
               !
                
               Let
                
               us
                
               not
                
               break
                
               with
                
               him
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               he
                
               will
                
               never
                
               follow
                
               anything
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               other
                
               men
                
               begin
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Then
                
               leave
                
               him
                
               out
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Indeed
               ,
                
               he
                
               is
                
               not
                
               fit
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               DECIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Shall
                
               no
                
               man
                
               else
                
               be
                
               touched
               ,
                
               but
                
               only
                
               Caesar
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Decius
               ,
                
               well
                
               urged
               .
                
               I
                
               think
                
               it
                
               is
                
               not
                
               meet
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Mark
                
               Antony
               ,
                
               so
                
               well
                
               beloved
                
               of
                
               Caesar
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Should
                
               outlive
                
               Caesar
               .
                
               We
                
               shall
                
               find
                
               of
                
               him
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               A
                
               shrewd
                
               contriver
               ;
                
               and
               ,
                
               you
                
               know
               ,
                
               his
                
               means
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               he
                
               improve
                
               them
               ,
                
               may
                
               well
                
               stretch
                
               so
                
               far
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               to
                
               annoy
                
               us
                
               all
               ;
                
               which
                
               to
                
               prevent
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let
                
               Antony
                
               and
                
               Caesar
                
               fall
                
               together
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Our
                
               course
                
               will
                
               seem
                
               too
                
               bloody
               ,
                
               Caius
                
               Cassius
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               cut
                
               the
                
               head
                
               off
                
               and
                
               then
                
               hack
                
               the
                
               limbs
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Like
                
               wrath
                
               in
                
               death
                
               and
                
               envy
                
               afterwards
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               Antony
                
               is
                
               but
                
               a
                
               limb
                
               of
                
               Caesar
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let’s
                
               be
                
               sacrificers
               ,
                
               but
                
               not
                
               butchers
               ,
                
               Caius
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               We
                
               all
                
               stand
                
               up
                
               against
                
               the
                
               spirit
                
               of
                
               Caesar
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               in
                
               the
                
               spirit
                
               of
                
               men
                
               there
                
               is
                
               no
                
               blood
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
               ,
                
               that
                
               we
                
               then
                
               could
                
               come
                
               by
                
               Caesar’s
                
               spirit
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               not
                
               dismember
                
               Caesar
               !
                
               But
               ,
                
               alas
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caesar
                
               must
                
               bleed
                
               for
                
               it
               .
                
               And
               ,
                
               gentle
                
               friends
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let’s
                
               kill
                
               him
                
               boldly
               ,
                
               but
                
               not
                
               wrathfully
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let’s
                
               carve
                
               him
                
               as
                
               a
                
               dish
                
               fit
                
               for
                
               the
                
               gods
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Not
                
               hew
                
               him
                
               as
                
               a
                
               carcass
                
               fit
                
               for
                
               hounds
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               let
                
               our
                
               hearts
               ,
                
               as
                
               subtle
                
               masters
                
               do
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Stir
                
               up
                
               their
                
               servants
                
               to
                
               an
                
               act
                
               of
                
               rage
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               after
                
               seem
                
               to
                
               chide
                
               ’em
               .
                
               This
                
               shall
                
               make
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Our
                
               purpose
                
               necessary
                
               and
                
               not
                
               envious
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Which
                
               so
                
               appearing
                
               to
                
               the
                
               common
                
               eyes
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               We
                
               shall
                
               be
                
               called
                
               purgers
               ,
                
               not
                
               murderers
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-063.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-063.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-063.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 2. SC. 1</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               for
                
               Mark
                
               Antony
               ,
                
               think
                
               not
                
               of
                
               him
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               he
                
               can
                
               do
                
               no
                
               more
                
               than
                
               Caesar’s
                
               arm
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               When
                
               Caesar’s
                
               head
                
               is
                
               off
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yet
                
               I
                
               fear
                
               him
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               in
                
               the
                
               engrafted
                
               love
                
               he
                
               bears
                
               to
                
               Caesar
               —
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Alas
               ,
                
               good
                
               Cassius
               ,
                
               do
                
               not
                
               think
                
               of
                
               him
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               he
                
               love
                
               Caesar
               ,
                
               all
                
               that
                
               he
                
               can
                
               do
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Is
                
               to
                
               himself
               :
                
               take
                
               thought
                
               and
                
               die
                
               for
                
               Caesar
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               that
                
               were
                
               much
                
               he
                
               should
               ,
                
               for
                
               he
                
               is
                
               given
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               sports
               ,
                
               to
                
               wildness
               ,
                
               and
                
               much
                
               company
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               TREBONIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               There
                
               is
                
               no
                
               fear
                
               in
                
               him
               .
                
               Let
                
               him
                
               not
                
               die
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               he
                
               will
                
               live
                
               and
                
               laugh
                
               at
                
               this
                
               hereafter
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Clock
          
         strikes
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Peace
               ,
                
               count
                
               the
                
               clock
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               clock
                
               hath
                
               stricken
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               three
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               TREBONIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               ’Tis
                
               time
                
               to
                
               part
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               it
                
               is
                
               doubtful
                
               yet
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Whether
                
               Caesar
                
               will
                
               come
                
               forth
                
               today
                
               or
                
               no
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               he
                
               is
                
               superstitious
                
               grown
                
               of
                
               late
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Quite
                
               from
                
               the
                
               main
                
               opinion
                
               he
                
               held
                
               once
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Of
                
               fantasy
               ,
                
               of
                
               dreams
               ,
                
               and
                
               ceremonies
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               may
                
               be
                
               these
                
               apparent
                
               prodigies
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               unaccustomed
                
               terror
                
               of
                
               this
                
               night
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               the
                
               persuasion
                
               of
                
               his
                
               augurers
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               May
                
               hold
                
               him
                
               from
                
               the
                
               Capitol
                
               today
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               DECIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Never
                
               fear
                
               that
               .
                
               If
