               he
                
               be
                
               so
                
               resolved
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               can
                
               o’ersway
                
               him
               ,
                
               for
                
               he
                
               loves
                
               to
                
               hear
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               unicorns
                
               may
                
               be
                
               betrayed
                
               with
                
               trees
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               bears
                
               with
                
               glasses
               ,
                
               elephants
                
               with
                
               holes
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Lions
                
               with
                
               toils
               ,
                
               and
                
               men
                
               with
                
               flatterers
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-065.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-065.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-065.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 2. SC. 1</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               when
                
               I
                
               tell
                
               him
                
               he
                
               hates
                
               flatterers
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               says
                
               he
                
               does
               ,
                
               being
                
               then
                
               most
                
               flatterèd
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let
                
               me
                
               work
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               I
                
               can
                
               give
                
               his
                
               humor
                
               the
                
               true
                
               bent
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               I
                
               will
                
               bring
                
               him
                
               to
                
               the
                
               Capitol
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Nay
               ,
                
               we
                
               will
                
               all
                
               of
                
               us
                
               be
                
               there
                
               to
                
               fetch
                
               him
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               By
                
               the
                
               eighth
                
               hour
               ,
                
               is
                
               that
                
               the
                
               uttermost
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CINNA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Be
                
               that
                
               the
                
               uttermost
               ,
                
               and
                
               fail
                
               not
                
               then
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               METELLUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caius
                
               Ligarius
                
               doth
                
               bear
                
               Caesar
                
               hard
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Who
                
               rated
                
               him
                
               for
                
               speaking
                
               well
                
               of
                
               Pompey
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               wonder
                
               none
                
               of
                
               you
                
               have
                
               thought
                
               of
                
               him
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Now
               ,
                
               good
                
               Metellus
               ,
                
               go
                
               along
                
               by
                
               him
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               loves
                
               me
                
               well
               ,
                
               and
                
               I
                
               have
                
               given
                
               him
                
               reasons
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Send
                
               him
                
               but
                
               hither
               ,
                
               and
                
               I’ll
                
               fashion
                
               him
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               morning
                
               comes
                
               upon
                
               ’s
               .
                
               We’ll
                
               leave
                
               you
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Brutus
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
               ,
                
               friends
               ,
                
               disperse
                
               yourselves
               ,
                
               but
                
               all
                
               remember
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               you
                
               have
                
               said
               ,
                
               and
                
               show
                
               yourselves
                
               true
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Romans
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Good
                
               gentlemen
               ,
                
               look
                
               fresh
                
               and
                
               merrily
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let
                
               not
                
               our
                
               looks
                
               put
                
               on
                
               our
                
               purposes
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               bear
                
               it
               ,
                
               as
                
               our
                
               Roman
                
               actors
                
               do
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               With
                
               untired
                
               spirits
                
               and
                
               formal
                
               constancy
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               so
                
               good
                
               morrow
                
               to
                
               you
                
               every
                
               one
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               All
                
               but
                
               Brutus
                
               exit
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Boy
               !
                
               Lucius
               !
               —
               Fast
                
               asleep
               ?
                
               It
                
               is
                
               no
                
               matter
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Enjoy
                
               the
                
               honey-heavy
                
               dew
                
               of
                
               slumber
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thou
                
               hast
                
               no
                
               figures
                
               nor
                
               no
                
               fantasies
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-067.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-067.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-067.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 2. SC. 1</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Which
                
               busy
                
               care
                
               draws
                
               in
                
               the
                
               brains
                
               of
                
               men
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Therefore
                
               thou
                
               sleep’st
                
               so
                
               sound
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Portia
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PORTIA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Brutus
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Portia
               !
                
               What
                
               mean
                
               you
               ?
                
               Wherefore
                
               rise
                
               you
                
               now
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               is
                
               not
                
               for
                
               your
                
               health
                
               thus
                
               to
                
               commit
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Your
                
               weak
                
               condition
                
               to
                
               the
                
               raw
                
               cold
                
               morning
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PORTIA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Nor
                
               for
                
               yours
                
               neither
               .
                
               You’ve
                
               ungently
               ,
                
               Brutus
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Stole
                
               from
                
               my
                
               bed
               .
                
               And
                
               yesternight
                
               at
                
               supper
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               suddenly
                
               arose
                
               and
                
               walked
                
               about
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Musing
                
               and
                
               sighing
               ,
                
               with
                
               your
                
               arms
                
               across
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               when
                
               I
                
               asked
                
               you
                
               what
                
               the
                
               matter
                
               was
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               stared
                
               upon
                
               me
                
               with
                
               ungentle
                
               looks
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               urged
                
               you
                
               further
               ;
                
               then
                
               you
                
               scratched
                
               your
                
               head
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               too
                
               impatiently
                
               stamped
                
               with
                
               your
                
               foot
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yet
                
               I
                
               insisted
               ;
                
               yet
                
               you
                
               answered
                
               not
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               with
                
               an
                
               angry
                
               wafture
                
               of
                
               your
                
               hand
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Gave
                
               sign
                
               for
                
               me
                
               to
                
               leave
                
               you
               .
                
               So
                
               I
                
               did
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Fearing
                
               to
                
               strengthen
                
               that
                
               impatience
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Which
                
               seemed
                
               too
                
               much
                
               enkindled
               ,
                
               and
                
               withal
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hoping
                
               it
                
               was
                
               but
                
               an
                
               effect
                
               of
                
               humor
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Which
                
               sometime
                
               hath
                
               his
                
               hour
                
               with
                
               every
                
               man
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               will
                
               not
                
               let
                
               you
                
               eat
                
               nor
                
               talk
                
               nor
                
               sleep
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               could
                
               it
                
               work
                
               so
                
               much
                
               upon
                
               your
                
               shape
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               it
                
               hath
                
               much
                
               prevailed
                
               on
                
               your
                
               condition
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               should
                
               not
                
               know
                
               you
                
               Brutus
               .
                
               Dear
                
               my
                
               lord
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Make
                
               me
                
               acquainted
                
               with
                
               your
                
               cause
                
               of
                
               grief
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               am
                
               not
                
               well
                
               in
                
               health
               ,
                
               and
                
               that
                
               is
                
               all
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PORTIA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Brutus
                
               is
                
               wise
                
               and
               ,
                
               were
                
               he
                
               not
                
               in
                
               health
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               would
                
               embrace
                
               the
                
               means
                
               to
                
               come
                
               by
                
               it
               .
                
            </div>
