         <h6 class="fw">ACT 2. SC. 1</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
                
               so
                
               I
                
               do
               .
                
               Good
                
               Portia
               ,
                
               go
                
               to
                
               bed
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PORTIA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Is
                
               Brutus
                
               sick
               ?
                
               And
                
               is
                
               it
                
               physical
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               walk
                
               unbracèd
                
               and
                
               suck
                
               up
                
               the
                
               humors
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Of
                
               the
                
               dank
                
               morning
               ?
                
               What
               ,
                
               is
                
               Brutus
                
               sick
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               will
                
               he
                
               steal
                
               out
                
               of
                
               his
                
               wholesome
                
               bed
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               dare
                
               the
                
               vile
                
               contagion
                
               of
                
               the
                
               night
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               tempt
                
               the
                
               rheumy
                
               and
                
               unpurgèd
                
               air
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               add
                
               unto
                
               his
                
               sickness
               ?
                
               No
               ,
                
               my
                
               Brutus
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               have
                
               some
                
               sick
                
               offense
                
               within
                
               your
                
               mind
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Which
                
               by
                
               the
                
               right
                
               and
                
               virtue
                
               of
                
               my
                
               place
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               ought
                
               to
                
               know
                
               of
               .
               
                
               She
                
               kneels
               .
               
                
               And
                
               upon
                
               my
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               knees
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               charm
                
               you
               ,
                
               by
                
               my
                
               once
                
               commended
                
               beauty
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               By
                
               all
                
               your
                
               vows
                
               of
                
               love
               ,
                
               and
                
               that
                
               great
                
               vow
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Which
                
               did
                
               incorporate
                
               and
                
               make
                
               us
                
               one
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               you
                
               unfold
                
               to
                
               me
               ,
                
               your
                
               self
               ,
                
               your
                
               half
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
                
               you
                
               are
                
               heavy
               ,
                
               and
                
               what
                
               men
                
               tonight
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Have
                
               had
                
               resort
                
               to
                
               you
               ;
                
               for
                
               here
                
               have
                
               been
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Some
                
               six
                
               or
                
               seven
                
               who
                
               did
                
               hide
                
               their
                
               faces
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Even
                
               from
                
               darkness
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Kneel
                
               not
               ,
                
               gentle
                
               Portia
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         He
          
         lifts
          
         her
          
         up
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PORTIA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               should
                
               not
                
               need
               ,
                
               if
                
               you
                
               were
                
               gentle
                
               Brutus
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Within
                
               the
                
               bond
                
               of
                
               marriage
               ,
                
               tell
                
               me
               ,
                
               Brutus
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Is
                
               it
                
               excepted
                
               I
                
               should
                
               know
                
               no
                
               secrets
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               appertain
                
               to
                
               you
               ?
                
               Am
                
               I
                
               your
                
               self
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
               ,
                
               as
                
               it
                
               were
               ,
                
               in
                
               sort
                
               or
                
               limitation
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               keep
                
               with
                
               you
                
               at
                
               meals
               ,
                
               comfort
                
               your
                
               bed
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               talk
                
               to
                
               you
                
               sometimes
               ?
                
               Dwell
                
               I
                
               but
                
               in
                
               the
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               suburbs
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Of
                
               your
                
               good
                
               pleasure
               ?
                
               If
                
               it
                
               be
                
               no
                
               more
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Portia
                
               is
                
               Brutus’
                
               harlot
               ,
                
               not
                
               his
                
               wife
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-071.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-071.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-071.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 2. SC. 1</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               are
                
               my
                
               true
                
               and
                
               honorable
                
               wife
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               dear
                
               to
                
               me
                
               as
                
               are
                
               the
                
               ruddy
                
               drops
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               visit
                
               my
                
               sad
                
               heart
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PORTIA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               this
                
               were
                
               true
               ,
                
               then
                
               should
                
               I
                
               know
                
               this
                
               secret
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               grant
                
               I
                
               am
                
               a
                
               woman
               ,
                
               but
                
               withal
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               A
                
               woman
                
               that
                
               Lord
                
               Brutus
                
               took
                
               to
                
               wife
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               grant
                
               I
                
               am
                
               a
                
               woman
               ,
                
               but
                
               withal
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               A
                
               woman
                
               well-reputed
               ,
                
               Cato’s
                
               daughter
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Think
                
               you
                
               I
                
               am
                
               no
                
               stronger
                
               than
                
               my
                
               sex
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Being
                
               so
                
               fathered
                
               and
                
               so
                
               husbanded
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Tell
                
               me
                
               your
                
               counsels
               ;
                
               I
                
               will
                
               not
                
               disclose
                
               ’em
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               have
                
               made
                
               strong
                
               proof
                
               of
                
               my
                
               constancy
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Giving
                
               myself
                
               a
                
               voluntary
                
               wound
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Here
               ,
                
               in
                
               the
                
               thigh
               .
                
               Can
                
               I
                
               bear
                
               that
                
               with
                
               patience
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               not
                
               my
                
               husband’s
                
               secrets
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               you
                
               gods
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Render
                
               me
                
               worthy
                
               of
                
               this
                
               noble
                
               wife
               !
               
               Knock
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hark
               ,
                
               hark
               ,
                
               one
                
               knocks
               .
                
               Portia
               ,
                
               go
                
               in
                
               awhile
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               by
                
               and
                
               by
                
               thy
                
               bosom
                
               shall
                
               partake
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               secrets
                
               of
                
               my
                
               heart
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               All
                
               my
                
               engagements
                
               I
                
               will
                
               construe
                
               to
                
               thee
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               All
                
               the
                
               charactery
                
               of
                
               my
                
               sad
                
               brows
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Leave
                
               me
                
               with
                
               haste
               .
               
               Portia
                
               exits
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Lucius
               ,
                
               who
                
               ’s
                
               that
                
               knocks
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Lucius
          
         and
          
         Ligarius
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Here
                
               is
                
               a
                
               sick
                
               man
                
               that
                
               would
                
               speak
                
               with
                
               you
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caius
                
               Ligarius
               ,
                
               that
                
               Metellus
                
               spoke
                
               of
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Boy
               ,
                
               stand
                
               aside
               .
               
               Lucius
                
               exits
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caius
                
               Ligarius
               ,
                
               how
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LIGARIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Vouchsafe
                
               good
                
               morrow
                
               from
                
               a
                
               feeble
                
               tongue
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-073.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-073.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-073.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 2. SC. 1</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
               ,
                
               what
                
               a
                
               time
                
               have
                
               you
                
               chose
                
               out
               ,
                
               brave
                
               Caius
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               wear
                
               a
                
               kerchief
               !
                
               Would
                
               you
                
               were
                
               not
                
               sick
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LIGARIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               am
                
               not
                
               sick
               ,
                
               if
                
               Brutus
                
               have
                
               in
                
               hand
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Any
                
               exploit
                
               worthy
                
               the
                
               name
                
               of
                
               honor
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Such
                
               an
                
               exploit
                
               have
                
               I
                
               in
                
               hand
               ,
                
               Ligarius
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Had
                
               you
                
               a
                
               healthful
                
               ear
                
               to
                
               hear
                
               of
                
               it
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LIGARIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               By
                
               all
                
               the
                
               gods
                
               that
                
               Romans
                
               bow
                
               before
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               here
                
               discard
                
               my
                
               sickness
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               He
                
               takes
                
               off
                
               his
                
               kerchief
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Soul
                
               of
                
               Rome
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Brave
                
               son
                
               derived
                
               from
                
               honorable
                
               loins
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thou
                
               like
                
               an
                
               exorcist
                
               hast
                
               conjured
                
               up
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               My
                
               mortifièd
                
               spirit
               .
                
               Now
                
               bid
                
               me
                
               run
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               I
                
               will
                
               strive
                
               with
                
               things
                
               impossible
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yea
               ,
                
               get
                
               the
                
               better
                
               of
                
               them
               .
                
               What’s
                
               to
                
               do
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               A
                
               piece
                
               of
                
               work
                
               that
                
               will
                
               make
                
               sick
                
               men
                
               whole
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LIGARIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               are
                
               not
                
               some
                
               whole
                
               that
                
               we
                
               must
                
               make
                
               sick
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               must
                
               we
                
               also
               .
                
               What
                
               it
                
               is
               ,
                
               my
                
               Caius
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               shall
                
               unfold
                
               to
                
               thee
                
               as
                
               we
                
               are
                
               going
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               whom
                
               it
                
               must
                
               be
                
               done
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LIGARIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Set
                
               on
                
               your
                
               foot
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               with
                
               a
                
               heart
                
               new-fired
                
               I
                
               follow
                
               you
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               do
                
               I
                
               know
                
               not
                
               what
               ;
                
               but
                
               it
                
               sufficeth
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               Brutus
                
               leads
                
               me
                
               on
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         
         Thunder
         .
         
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Follow
                
               me
                
               then
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         They
          
         exit
         .
         
         
      </div>
      
      <br></br>
      
      <div class="milestone page"> </div>
      
      <span class="hr"> </span>
      <span class="pageimage">
         <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-075.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-075.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
            <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-075.jpg" class="display"></img>
         </a>
      </span>
      
      <h6 class="fw">ACT 2. SC. 2</h6>
      
      <div class="scene ">
         
         <h4>
            Scene
             
            2
            
         </h4>
         
         <br></br>
         
         
         
         Thunder
         
          
         and
          
         lightning
         .
         
          
         
         Enter
          
         Julius
          
         Caesar
          
         in
          
         his
         
         <br></br>
         nightgown
         .
         
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Nor
                
               heaven
                
               nor
                
               earth
                
               have
                
               been
                
               at
                
               peace
                
               tonight
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thrice
                
               hath
                
               Calphurnia
                
               in
                
               her
                
               sleep
                
               cried
                
               out
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               
               <span class="inline_quote">
                  Help
                   
                  ho
                  ,
                   
                  they
                   
                  murder
                   
                  Caesar
                  !
                  
               </span>
               —
               Who’s
                
               within
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         a
          
         Servant
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SERVANT
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               My
                
               lord
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Go
                
               bid
                
               the
                
               priests
                
               do
                
               present
                
               sacrifice
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               bring
                
               me
                
               their
                
               opinions
                
               of
                
               success
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SERVANT
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               will
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         He
          
         exits
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Calphurnia
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CALPHURNIA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               mean
                
               you
               ,
                
               Caesar
               ?
                
               Think
                
               you
                
               to
                
               walk
                
               forth
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               shall
                
               not
                
               stir
                
               out
                
               of
                
               your
                
               house
                
               today
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caesar
                
               shall
                
               forth
               .
                
               The
                
               things
                
               that
                
               threatened
                
               me
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ne’er
                
               looked
                
               but
                
               on
                
               my
                
               back
               .
                
               When
                
               they
                
               shall
                
               see
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               face
                
               of
                
               Caesar
               ,
                
               they
                
               are
                
               vanishèd
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CALPHURNIA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caesar
               ,
                
               I
                
               never
                
               stood
                
               on
                
               ceremonies
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yet
                
               now
                
               they
                
               fright
                
               me
               .
                
               There
                
               is
                
               one
                
               within
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Besides
                
               the
                
               things
                
               that
                
               we
                
               have
                
               heard
                
               and
                
               seen
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Recounts
                
               most
                
               horrid
                
               sights
                
               seen
                
               by
                
               the
                
               watch
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               A
                
               lioness
                
               hath
                
               whelpèd
                
               in
                
               the
                
               streets
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               graves
                
               have
                
               yawned
                
               and
                
               yielded
                
               up
                
               their
                
               dead
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Fierce
                
               fiery
                
               warriors
                
               fought
                
               upon
                
               the
                
               clouds
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               In
                
               ranks
                
               and
                
               squadrons
                
               and
                
               right
                
               form
                
               of
                
               war
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Which
                
               drizzled
                
               blood
                
               upon
                
               the
                
               Capitol
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               noise
                
               of
                
               battle
                
               hurtled
                
               in
                
               the
                
               air
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Horses
                
               did
                
               neigh
               ,
                
               and
                
               dying
                
               men
                
               did
                
               groan
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-077.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-077.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-077.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 2. SC. 2</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               ghosts
                
               did
                
               shriek
                
               and
                
               squeal
                
               about
                
               the
                
               streets
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               Caesar
               ,
                
               these
                
               things
                
               are
                
               beyond
                
               all
                
               use
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               I
                
               do
                
               fear
                
               them
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               can
                
               be
                
               avoided
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Whose
                
               end
                
               is
                
               purposed
                
               by
                
               the
                
               mighty
                
               gods
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yet
                
               Caesar
                
               shall
                
               go
                
               forth
               ,
                
               for
                
               these
                
               predictions
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Are
                
               to
                
               the
                
               world
                
               in
                
               general
                
               as
                
               to
                
               Caesar
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CALPHURNIA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               When
                
               beggars
                
               die
                
               there
                
               are
                
               no
                
               comets
                
               seen
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               heavens
                
               themselves
                
               blaze
                
               forth
                
               the
                
               death
                
               of
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               princes
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Cowards
                
               die
                
               many
                
               times
                
               before
                
               their
                
               deaths
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               valiant
                
               never
                
               taste
                
               of
                
               death
                
               but
                
               once
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Of
                
               all
                
               the
                
               wonders
                
               that
                
               I
                
               yet
                
               have
                
               heard
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               seems
                
               to
                
               me
                
               most
                
               strange
                
               that
                
               men
                
               should
                
               fear
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Seeing
                
               that
                
               death
               ,
                
               a
                
               necessary
                
               end
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Will
                
               come
                
               when
                
               it
                
               will
                
               come
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <br></br>

               a
                
               Servant
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               say
                
               the
                
               augurers
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SERVANT
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               They
                
               would
                
               not

               you
                
               to

               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Plucking
                
               the
                
               entrails
                
               of
                
               an
                
               offering
                
               forth
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               They
                
               could
                
               not
                
               find
                
               a

               the
                
               beast

         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR

            <div class="ab">

               The

               <br></br>

               Caesar

               a

               for
                
               fear

               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               No
               ,
                
               Caesar
                
               shall

               .
                
               Danger
                
               knows
                
               full

               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               Caesar
                
               is
                
               more

               than
                
               he

               <br></br>

               are
                
               two

               in
                
               one
                
               day

               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>

               I
                
               the
                
               elder

               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               Caesar
                
               shall
                
               go
                
               forth

               <h6 class="fw">ACT 2. SC. 2</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               She
                
               dreamt
                
               tonight
                
               she
                
               saw
                
               my
                
               statue
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Which
               ,
                
               like
                
               a
                
               fountain
                
               with
                
               an
                
               hundred
                
               spouts
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Did
                
               run
                
               pure
                
               blood
               ;
                
               and
                
               many
                
               lusty
                
               Romans
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Came
                
               smiling
                
               and
                
               did
                
               bathe
                
               their
                
               hands
                
               in
                
               it
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               these
                
               does
                
               she
                
               apply
                
               for
                
               warnings
                
               and
                
               portents
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               evils
                
               imminent
               ,
                
               and
                
               on
                
               her
                
               knee
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hath
                
               begged
                
               that
                
               I
                
               will

               at

               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>

            <div class="speaker">
               DECIUS

               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Reviving
                
               blood
               ,

               great

               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For

               Calphurnia’s

            </div>

               </span>

               And

            </div>

         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>

               <h6 class="fw">ACT 2. SC. 2</h6>
               
               Enter
                
               Brutus
               ,
                
               Ligarius
               ,
                
               Metellus
               ,
                
               Casca
               ,
                
               Trebonius
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               Cinna
               ,
                
               and
                
               Publius
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               look
                
               where
                
               Publius
                
               is
                
               come
                
               to
                
               fetch
                
               me
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PUBLIUS
                
            </div>

               morrow

               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>

            <div class="speaker">

            </div>

               Welcome
               ,
                
               Publius
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
               ,
                
               Brutus
               ,
                
               are
                
               you
                
               stirred
                
               so
                
               early
                
               too
               ?
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Good
                
               morrow
               ,
                
               Casca
               .
               —
               Caius
                
               Ligarius
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caesar
                
               was
                
               ne’er
                
               so
                
               much
                
               your
                
               enemy
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               that
                
               same
                
               ague
                
               which
                
               hath
                
               made
                
               you
                
               lean
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               is
                
               ’t
                
               o’clock
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caesar
               ,
                
               ’tis
                
               strucken
                
               eight
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               thank
                
               you
                
               for
                
               your
                
               pains
                
               and
                
               courtesy
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <br></br>
               
               Enter
                
               Antony
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               See
               ,
                
               Antony
                
               that
                
               revels
                
               long
                
               a-nights
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Is
                
               notwithstanding
                
               up
               .
               —
               Good
                
               morrow
               ,
                
               Antony
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               to
                
               most
                
               noble
                
               Caesar
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            ,
             
            to
             
            Servant
            
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Bid
                
               them
                
               prepare
                
               within
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               am
                
               to
                
               blame
                
               to
                
               be
                
               thus
                
               waited
                
               for
               .
               
               Servant
                
               exits
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Now
               ,
                
               Cinna
               .
               —
               Now
               ,
                
               Metellus
               .
               —
               What
               ,
                
               Trebonius
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               have
                
               an
                
               hour’s
                
               talk
                
               in
                
               store
                
               for
                
               you
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Remember
                
               that
                
               you
                
               call
                
               on
                
               me
                
               today
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Be
                
               near
                
               me
                
               that
                
               I
                
               may
                
               remember
                
               you
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               TREBONIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caesar
               ,
                
               I
                
               will
               .
               
                
               Aside
               .
               
                
               And
                
               so
                
               near
                
               will
                
               I
                
               be
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               your
                
               best
                
               friends
                
               shall
                
               wish
                
               I
                
               had
                
               been
                
               further
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Good
                
               friends
               ,
                
               go
                
               in
                
               and
                
               taste
                
               some
                
               wine
                
               with
                
               me
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               we
               ,
                
               like
                
               friends
               ,
                
               will
                
               straightway
                
               go
                
               together
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            ,
             
            aside
            
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               every
                
               like
                
               is
                
               not
                
               the
                
               same
               ,
                
               O
                
               Caesar
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               heart
                
               of
                
               Brutus
                
               earns
                
               to
                
               think
                
               upon
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         They
          
         exit
         .
         
         
      </div>
      
      <br></br>
      
      <div class="milestone page"> </div>
      
      <span class="hr"> </span>
      <span class="pageimage">
         <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-085.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-085.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
