            <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-085.jpg" class="display"></img>
         </a>
      </span>
      
      <h6 class="fw">ACT 2. SC. 4</h6>
      
      <div class="scene ">
         
         <h4>
            Scene
             
            3
            
         </h4>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Artemidorus
          
         reading
          
         a
          
         paper
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ARTEMIDORUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caesar
               ,
                
               beware
                
               of
                
               Brutus
               ,
                
               take
                
               heed
                
               of
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Cassius
               ,
                
               come
                
               not
                
               near
                
               Casca
               ,
                
               have
                
               an
                
               eye
                
               to
                
               Cinna
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               trust
                
               not
                
               Trebonius
               ,
                
               mark
                
               well
                
               Metellus
                
               Cimber
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Decius
                
               Brutus
                
               loves
                
               thee
                
               not
               .
                
               Thou
                
               hast
                
               wronged
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caius
                
               Ligarius
               .
                
               There
                
               is
                
               but
                
               one
                
               mind
                
               in
                
               all
                
               these
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               men
               ,
                
               and
                
               it
                
               is
                
               bent
                
               against
                
               Caesar
               .
                
               If
                
               thou
                
               beest
                
               not
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               immortal
               ,
                
               look
                
               about
                
               you
               .
                
               Security
                
               gives
                
               way
                
               to
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               conspiracy
               .
                
               The
                
               mighty
                
               gods
                
               defend
                
               thee
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thy
                
               lover
               ,
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Artemidorus
               
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Here
                
               will
                
               I
                
               stand
                
               till
                
               Caesar
                
               pass
                
               along
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               as
                
               a
                
               suitor
                
               will
                
               I
                
               give
                
               him
                
               this
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               My
                
               heart
                
               laments
                
               that
                
               virtue
                
               cannot
                
               live
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Out
                
               of
                
               the
                
               teeth
                
               of
                
               emulation
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               thou
                
               read
                
               this
               ,
                
               O
                
               Caesar
               ,
                
               thou
                
               mayest
                
               live
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               not
               ,
                
               the
                
               Fates
                
               with
                
               traitors
                
               do
                
               contrive
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         He
          
         exits
         .
         
         
      </div>
      
      <div class="scene ">
         
         <h4>
            Scene
             
            4
            
         </h4>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Portia
          
         and
          
         Lucius
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PORTIA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               prithee
               ,
                
               boy
               ,
                
               run
                
               to
                
               the
                
               Senate
                
               House
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Stay
                
               not
                
               to
                
               answer
                
               me
               ,
                
               but
                
               get
                
               thee
                
               gone
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
                
               dost
                
               thou
                
               stay
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               know
                
               my
                
               errand
               ,
                
               madam
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PORTIA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               would
                
               have
                
               had
                
               thee
                
               there
                
               and
                
               here
                
               again
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ere
                
               I
                
               can
                
               tell
                
               thee
                
               what
                
               thou
                
               shouldst
                
               do
                
               there
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               
               Aside
               .
                
               
               O
                
               constancy
               ,
                
               be
                
               strong
                
               upon
                
               my
                
               side
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Set
                
               a
                
               huge
                
               mountain
                
               ’tween
                
               my
                
               heart
                
               and
                
               tongue
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               have
                
               a
                
               man’s
                
               mind
                
               but
                
               a
                
               woman’s
                
               might
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-087.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-087.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-087.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 2. SC. 4</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               How
                
               hard
                
               it
                
               is
                
               for
                
               women
                
               to
                
               keep
                
               counsel
               !
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Art
                
               thou
                
               here
                
               yet
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Madam
               ,
                
               what
                
               should
                
               I
                
               do
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Run
                
               to
                
               the
                
               Capitol
               ,
                
               and
                
               nothing
                
               else
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               so
                
               return
                
               to
                
               you
               ,
                
               and
                
               nothing
                
               else
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PORTIA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yes
               ,
                
               bring
                
               me
                
               word
               ,
                
               boy
               ,
                
               if
                
               thy
                
               lord
                
               look
                
               well
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               he
                
               went
                
               sickly
                
               forth
               .
                
               And
                
               take
                
               good
                
               note
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               Caesar
                
               doth
               ,
                
               what
                
               suitors
                
               press
                
               to
                
               him
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hark
               ,
                
               boy
               ,
                
               what
                
               noise
                
               is
                
               that
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               hear
                
               none
               ,
                
               madam
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PORTIA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Prithee
               ,
                
               listen
                
               well
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               heard
                
               a
                
               bustling
                
               rumor
                
               like
                
               a
                
               fray
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               the
                
               wind
                
               brings
                
               it
                
               from
                
               the
                
               Capitol
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Sooth
               ,
                
               madam
               ,
                
               I
                
               hear
                
               nothing
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         the
          
         Soothsayer
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PORTIA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Come
                
               hither
               ,
                
               fellow
               .
                
               Which
                
               way
                
               hast
                
               thou
                
               been
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SOOTHSAYER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               At
                
               mine
                
               own
                
               house
               ,
                
               good
                
               lady
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PORTIA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               is
                
               ’t
                
               o’clock
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SOOTHSAYER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               About
                
               the
                
               ninth
                
               hour
               ,
                
               lady
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PORTIA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Is
                
               Caesar
                
               yet
                
               gone
                
               to
                
               the
                
               Capitol
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SOOTHSAYER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Madam
               ,
                
               not
                
               yet
               .
                
               I
                
               go
                
               to
                
               take
                
               my
                
               stand
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               see
                
               him
                
               pass
                
               on
                
               to
                
               the
                
               Capitol
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PORTIA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thou
                
               hast
                
               some
                
               suit
                
               to
                
               Caesar
               ,
                
               hast
                
               thou
                
               not
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SOOTHSAYER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               I
                
               have
               ,
                
               lady
               .
                
               If
                
               it
                
               will
                
               please
                
               Caesar
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               be
                
               so
                
               good
                
               to
                
               Caesar
                
               as
                
               to
                
               hear
                
               me
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               shall
                
               beseech
                
               him
                
               to
                
               befriend
                
               himself
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PORTIA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
               ,
                
               know’st
                
               thou
                
               any
                
               harms
                
               intended
                
               towards
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               him
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-089.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-089.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-089.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 2. SC. 4</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SOOTHSAYER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               None
                
               that
                
               I
                
               know
                
               will
                
               be
               ,
                
               much
                
               that
                
               I
                
               fear
                
               may
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               chance
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Good
                
               morrow
                
               to
                
               you
               .
               —
               Here
                
               the
                
               street
                
               is
                
               narrow
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               throng
                
               that
                
               follows
                
               Caesar
                
               at
                
               the
                
               heels
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Of
                
               senators
               ,
                
               of
                
               praetors
               ,
                
               common
                
               suitors
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Will
                
               crowd
                
               a
                
               feeble
                
               man
                
               almost
                
               to
                
               death
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I’ll
                
               get
                
               me
                
               to
                
               a
                
               place
                
               more
                
               void
               ,
                
               and
                
               there
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Speak
                
               to
                
               great
                
               Caesar
                
               as
                
               he
                
               comes
                
               along
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         He
          
         exits
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PORTIA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               must
                
               go
                
               in
               .
               
                
               Aside
               .
               
                
               Ay
                
               me
               ,
                
               how
                
               weak
                
               a
                
               thing
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               heart
                
               of
                
               woman
                
               is
               !
                
               O
                
               Brutus
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               heavens
                
               speed
                
               thee
                
               in
                
               thine
                
               enterprise
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Sure
                
               the
                
               boy
                
               heard
                
               me
               .
               
                
               To
                
               Lucius
               .
               
                
               Brutus
                
               hath
                
               a
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               suit
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               Caesar
                
               will
                
               not
                
               grant
               .
               
                
               Aside
               .
               
                
               O
               ,
                
               I
                
               grow
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               faint
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Run
               ,
                
               Lucius
               ,
                
               and
                
               commend
                
               me
                
               to
                
               my
                
               lord
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Say
                
               I
                
               am
                
               merry
               .
                
               Come
                
               to
                
               me
                
               again
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               bring
                
               me
                
               word
                
               what
                
               he
                
               doth
                
               say
                
               to
                
               thee
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         They
          
         exit
          
         separately
         .
         
         
      </div>
      
   </div>
   
   <br></br>
   
   <div class="milestone page"> </div>
   
   <span class="hr"> </span>
   <span class="pageimage">
      <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-093.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-093.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
         <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-093.jpg" class="display"></img>
      </a>
   </span>
   
   <div class="act doublespace ">
      
      <h4>
         ACT
          
         3
         
      </h4>
      
      <div class="scene ">
         
         <h4>
            Scene
             
            1
            
         </h4>
         
         <br></br>
         
         
         Flourish
         .
         
          
         Enter
          
         Caesar
         ,
          
         Antony
         ,
          
         Lepidus
         ;
          
         Brutus
         ,
          
         Cassius
         ,
         
         <br></br>
         Casca
         ,
          
         Decius
         ,
          
         Metellus
         ,
          
         Trebonius
         ,
          
         Cinna
         ;
          
         Publius
         ,
         
         <br></br>
         Popilius
         ,
          
         Artemidorus
         ,
          
         the
          
         Soothsayer
         ,
          
         and
          
         other
         
         <br></br>
         Senators
          
         and
          
         Petitioners
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               ides
                
               of
                
               March
                
               are
                
               come
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SOOTHSAYER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ay
               ,
                
               Caesar
               ,
                
               but
                
               not
                
               gone
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ARTEMIDORUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hail
               ,
                
               Caesar
               .
                
               Read
                
               this
                
               schedule
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               DECIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Trebonius
                
               doth
                
               desire
                
               you
                
               to
                
               o’erread
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               At
                
               your
                
               best
                
               leisure
               ,
                
               this
                
               his
                
               humble
                
               suit
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ARTEMIDORUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               Caesar
               ,
                
               read
                
               mine
                
               first
               ,
                
               for
                
               mine’s
                
               a
                
               suit
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               touches
                
               Caesar
                
               nearer
               .
                
               Read
                
               it
               ,
                
               great
                
               Caesar
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               touches
                
               us
                
               ourself
                
               shall
                
               be
                
               last
                
               served
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ARTEMIDORUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Delay
                
               not
               ,
                
               Caesar
               ;
                
               read
                
               it
                
               instantly
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
               ,
                
               is
                
               the
                
               fellow
                
               mad
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PUBLIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Sirrah
               ,
                
               give
                
               place
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
               ,
                
               urge
                
               you
                
               your
                
               petitions
                
               in
                
               the
                
               street
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Come
                
               to
                
               the
                
               Capitol
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Caesar
          
         goes
          
         forward
         ,
          
         the
          
         rest
          
         following
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-095.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-095.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-095.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 3. SC. 1</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               POPILIUS
                
            </div>
            
            ,
             
            to
             
            Cassius
            
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               wish
                
               your
                
               enterprise
                
               today
                
               may
                
               thrive
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               enterprise
               ,
                
               Popilius
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               POPILIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Fare
                
               you
                
               well
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         He
          
         walks
          
         away
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               said
                
               Popilius
                
               Lena
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               wished
                
               today
                
               our
                
               enterprise
                
               might
                
               thrive
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               fear
                
               our
                
               purpose
                
               is
                
               discoverèd
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Look
                
               how
                
               he
                
               makes
                
               to
                
               Caesar
               .
                
               Mark
                
               him
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Casca
               ,
                
               be
                
               sudden
               ,
                
               for
                
               we
                
               fear
                
               prevention
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Brutus
               ,
                
               what
                
               shall
                
               be
                
               done
               ?
                
               If
                
               this
                
               be
                
               known
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Cassius
                
               or
                
               Caesar
                
               never
                
               shall
                
               turn
                
               back
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               I
                
               will
                
               slay
                
               myself
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Cassius
               ,
                
               be
                
               constant
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Popilius
                
               Lena
                
               speaks
                
               not
                
               of
                
               our
                
               purposes
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               look
               ,
                
               he
                
               smiles
               ,
                
               and
                
               Caesar
                
               doth
                
               not
                
               change
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Trebonius
                
               knows
                
               his
                
               time
               ,
                
               for
                
               look
                
               you
               ,
                
               Brutus
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               draws
                
               Mark
                
               Antony
                
               out
                
               of
                
               the
                
               way
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Trebonius
          
         and
          
         Antony
          
         exit
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               DECIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Where
                
               is
                
               Metellus
                
               Cimber
               ?
                
               Let
                
               him
                
               go
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               presently
                
               prefer
                
               his
                
               suit
                
               to
                
               Caesar
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               is
                
               addressed
               .
                
               Press
                
               near
                
               and
                
               second
                
               him
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CINNA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Casca
               ,
                
               you
                
               are
                
               the
                
               first
                
               that
                
               rears
                
               your
                
               hand
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Are
                
               we
                
               all
                
               ready
               ?
                
               What
                
               is
                
               now
                
               amiss
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               Caesar
                
               and
                
               his
                
               Senate
                
               must
                
               redress
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               METELLUS
                
            </div>
            
            ,
             
            kneeling
            
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Most
                
               high
               ,
                
               most
                
               mighty
               ,
                
               and
                
               most
                
               puissant
                
               Caesar
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Metellus
                
               Cimber
                
               throws
                
               before
                
               thy
                
               seat
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               An
                
               humble
                
               heart
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-097.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-097.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-097.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 3. SC. 1</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               must
                
               prevent
                
               thee
               ,
                
               Cimber
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               These
                
               couchings
                
               and
                
               these
                
               lowly
                
               courtesies
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Might
                
               fire
                
               the
                
               blood
                
               of
                
               ordinary
                
               men
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               turn
                
               preordinance
                
               and
                
               first
                
               decree
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Into
                
               the
                
               law
                
               of
                
               children
               .
                
               Be
                
               not
                
               fond
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               think
                
               that
                
               Caesar
                
               bears
                
               such
                
               rebel
                
               blood
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               will
                
               be
                
               thawed
                
               from
                
               the
                
               true
                
               quality
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               With
                
               that
                
               which
                
               melteth
                
               fools
               —
               I
                
               mean
                
               sweet
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               words
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Low-crookèd
                
               curtsies
               ,
                
               and
                
               base
                
               spaniel
                
               fawning
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thy
                
               brother
                
               by
                
               decree
                
               is
                
               banishèd
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               thou
                
               dost
                
               bend
                
               and
                
               pray
                
               and
                
               fawn
                
               for
                
               him
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               spurn
                
               thee
                
               like
                
               a
                
               cur
                
               out
                
               of
                
               my
                
               way
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Know
               :
                
               Caesar
                
               doth
                
               not
                
               wrong
               ,
                
               nor
                
               without
                
               cause
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Will
                
               he
                
               be
                
               satisfied
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               METELLUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Is
                
               there
                
               no
                
               voice
                
               more
                
               worthy
                
               than
                
               my
                
               own
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               sound
                
               more
                
               sweetly
                
               in
                
               great
                
               Caesar’s
                
               ear
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               the
                
               repealing
                
               of
                
               my
                
               banished
                
               brother
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            ,
             
            kneeling
            
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               kiss
                
               thy
                
               hand
               ,
                
               but
                
               not
                
               in
                
               flattery
               ,
                
               Caesar
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Desiring
                
               thee
                
               that
                
               Publius
                
               Cimber
                
               may
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Have
                
               an
                
               immediate
                
               freedom
                
               of
                
               repeal
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
               ,
                
               Brutus
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            ,
             
            kneeling
            
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Pardon
               ,
                
               Caesar
               ;
                
               Caesar
               ,
                
               pardon
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               low
                
               as
                
               to
                
               thy
                
               foot
                
               doth
                
               Cassius
                
               fall
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               beg
                
               enfranchisement
                
               for
                
               Publius
                
               Cimber
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               could
                
               be
                
               well
                
               moved
               ,
                
               if
                
               I
                
               were
                
               as
                
               you
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               I
                
               could
                
               pray
                
               to
                
               move
               ,
                
               prayers
                
               would
                
               move
                
               me
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               I
                
               am
                
               constant
                
               as
                
               the
                
               Northern
                
               Star
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Of
                
               whose
                
               true
                
               fixed
                
               and
                
               resting
                
               quality
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               There
                
               is
                
               no
                
               fellow
                
               in
                
               the
                
               firmament
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               skies
                
               are
                
               painted
                
               with
                
               unnumbered
                
               sparks
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-099.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-099.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-099.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 3. SC. 1</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               They
                
               are
                
               all
                
               fire
               ,
                
               and
                
               every
                
               one
                
               doth
                
               shine
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               there’s
                
               but
                
               one
                
               in
                
               all
                
               doth
                
               hold
                
               his
                
               place
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               in
                
               the
                
               world
               :
                
               ’tis
                
               furnished
                
               well
                
               with
                
               men
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               men
                
               are
                
               flesh
                
               and
                
               blood
               ,
                
               and
                
               apprehensive
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yet
                
               in
                
               the
                
               number
                
               I
                
               do
                
               know
                
               but
                
               one
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               unassailable
                
               holds
                
               on
                
               his
                
               rank
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Unshaked
                
               of
                
               motion
               ;
                
               and
                
               that
                
               I
                
               am
                
               he
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let
                
               me
                
               a
                
               little
                
               show
                
               it
               ,
                
               even
                
               in
                
               this
               :
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               I
                
               was
                
               constant
                
               Cimber
                
               should
                
               be
                
               banished
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               constant
                
               do
                
               remain
                
               to
                
               keep
                
               him
                
               so
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CINNA
                
            </div>
            
            ,
             
            kneeling
            
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               Caesar
               —
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hence
               .
                
               Wilt
                
               thou
                
               lift
                
               up
                
               Olympus
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               DECIUS
                
            </div>
            
            ,
             
            kneeling
            
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Great
                
               Caesar
               —
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Doth
                
               not
                
               Brutus
                
               bootless
                
               kneel
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Speak
               ,
                
               hands
               ,
                
               for
                
               me
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         As
          
         Casca
          
         strikes
         ,
          
         the
          
         others
          
         rise
          
         up
          
         and
