         stab
          
         Caesar
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CAESAR
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               
               <em>
                  Et
                   
                  tu
                  ,
                   
                  Brutè
                  
               </em>
               ?
               —
               Then
                
               fall
               ,
                
               Caesar
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         He
          
         dies
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CINNA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Liberty
               !
                
               Freedom
               !
                
               Tyranny
                
               is
                
               dead
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Run
                
               hence
               ,
                
               proclaim
               ,
                
               cry
                
               it
                
               about
                
               the
                
               streets
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Some
                
               to
                
               the
                
               common
                
               pulpits
                
               and
                
               cry
                
               out
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               
               <span class="inline_quote">
                  Liberty
                  ,
                   
                  freedom
                  ,
                   
                  and
                   
                  enfranchisement
                  .
                  
               </span>
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               People
                
               and
                
               Senators
               ,
                
               be
                
               not
                
               affrighted
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Fly
                
               not
               ;
                
               stand
                
               still
               .
                
               Ambition’s
                
               debt
                
               is
                
               paid
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Go
                
               to
                
               the
                
               pulpit
               ,
                
               Brutus
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               DECIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               Cassius
                
               too
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Where’s
                
               Publius
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CINNA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Here
               ,
                
               quite
                
               confounded
                
               with
                
               this
                
               mutiny
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-101.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-101.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-101.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 3. SC. 1</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               METELLUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Stand
                
               fast
                
               together
               ,
                
               lest
                
               some
                
               friend
                
               of
                
               Caesar’s
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Should
                
               chance
               —
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Talk
                
               not
                
               of
                
               standing
               .
               —
               Publius
               ,
                
               good
                
               cheer
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               There
                
               is
                
               no
                
               harm
                
               intended
                
               to
                
               your
                
               person
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Nor
                
               to
                
               no
                
               Roman
                
               else
               .
                
               So
                
               tell
                
               them
               ,
                
               Publius
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               leave
                
               us
               ,
                
               Publius
               ,
                
               lest
                
               that
                
               the
                
               people
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Rushing
                
               on
                
               us
               ,
                
               should
                
               do
                
               your
                
               age
                
               some
                
               mischief
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Do
                
               so
               ,
                
               and
                
               let
                
               no
                
               man
                
               abide
                
               this
                
               deed
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               we
                
               the
                
               doers
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         All
          
         but
          
         the
          
         Conspirators
          
         exit
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Trebonius
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Where
                
               is
                
               Antony
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               TREBONIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Fled
                
               to
                
               his
                
               house
                
               amazed
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Men
               ,
                
               wives
               ,
                
               and
                
               children
                
               stare
               ,
                
               cry
                
               out
               ,
                
               and
                
               run
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               it
                
               were
                
               doomsday
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Fates
               ,
                
               we
                
               will
                
               know
                
               your
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               pleasures
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               we
                
               shall
                
               die
                
               we
                
               know
               ;
                
               ’tis
                
               but
                
               the
                
               time
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               drawing
                
               days
                
               out
               ,
                
               that
                
               men
                
               stand
                
               upon
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASCA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
               ,
                
               he
                
               that
                
               cuts
                
               off
                
               twenty
                
               years
                
               of
                
               life
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Cuts
                
               off
                
               so
                
               many
                
               years
                
               of
                
               fearing
                
               death
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Grant
                
               that
               ,
                
               and
                
               then
                
               is
                
               death
                
               a
                
               benefit
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               are
                
               we
                
               Caesar’s
                
               friends
               ,
                
               that
                
               have
                
               abridged
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               His
                
               time
                
               of
                
               fearing
                
               death
               .
                
               Stoop
               ,
                
               Romans
               ,
                
               stoop
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               let
                
               us
                
               bathe
                
               our
                
               hands
                
               in
                
               Caesar’s
                
               blood
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Up
                
               to
                
               the
                
               elbows
                
               and
                
               besmear
                
               our
                
               swords
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Then
                
               walk
                
               we
                
               forth
               ,
                
               even
                
               to
                
               the
                
               marketplace
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
               ,
                
               waving
                
               our
                
               red
                
               weapons
                
               o’er
                
               our
                
               heads
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let’s
                
               all
                
               cry
                
               
               <span class="inline_quote">
                  Peace
                  ,
                   
                  freedom
                  ,
                   
                  and
                   
                  liberty
                  !
                  
               </span>
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-103.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-103.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-103.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 3. SC. 1</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Stoop
                
               then
               ,
                
               and
                
               wash
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               They
                
               smear
                
               their
                
               hands
                
               and
                
               swords
                
               with
                
               Caesar’s
                
               blood
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               How
                
               many
                
               ages
                
               hence
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Shall
                
               this
                
               our
                
               lofty
                
               scene
                
               be
                
               acted
                
               over
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               In
                
               states
                
               unborn
                
               and
                
               accents
                
               yet
                
               unknown
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               How
                
               many
                
               times
                
               shall
                
               Caesar
                
               bleed
                
               in
                
               sport
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               now
                
               on
                
               Pompey’s
                
               basis
                
               lies
                
               along
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               No
                
               worthier
                
               than
                
               the
                
               dust
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               oft
                
               as
                
               that
                
               shall
                
               be
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               often
                
               shall
                
               the
                
               knot
                
               of
                
               us
                
               be
                
               called
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               men
                
               that
                
               gave
                
               their
                
               country
                
               liberty
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               DECIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
               ,
                
               shall
                
               we
                
               forth
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ay
               ,
                
               every
                
               man
                
               away
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Brutus
                
               shall
                
               lead
               ,
                
               and
                
               we
                
               will
                
               grace
                
               his
                
               heels
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               With
                
               the
                
               most
                
               boldest
                
               and
                
               best
                
               hearts
                
               of
                
               Rome
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         a
          
         Servant
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Soft
               ,
                
               who
                
               comes
                
               here
               ?
                
               A
                
               friend
                
               of
                
               Antony’s
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SERVANT
                
            </div>
            
            ,
             
            kneeling
            
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thus
               ,
                
               Brutus
               ,
                
               did
                
               my
                
               master
                
               bid
                
               me
                
               kneel
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thus
                
               did
                
               Mark
                
               Antony
                
               bid
                
               me
                
               fall
                
               down
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
               ,
                
               being
                
               prostrate
               ,
                
               thus
                
               he
                
               bade
                
               me
                
               say
               :
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Brutus
                
               is
                
               noble
               ,
                
               wise
               ,
                
               valiant
               ,
                
               and
                
               honest
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caesar
                
               was
                
               mighty
               ,
                
               bold
               ,
                
               royal
               ,
                
               and
                
               loving
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Say
               ,
                
               I
                
               love
                
               Brutus
               ,
                
               and
                
               I
                
               honor
                
               him
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Say
               ,
                
               I
                
               feared
                
               Caesar
               ,
                
               honored
                
               him
               ,
                
               and
                
               loved
                
               him
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               Brutus
                
               will
                
               vouchsafe
                
               that
                
               Antony
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               May
                
               safely
                
               come
                
               to
                
               him
                
               and
                
               be
                
               resolved
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               How
                
               Caesar
                
               hath
                
               deserved
                
               to
                
               lie
                
               in
                
               death
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Mark
                
               Antony
                
               shall
                
               not
                
               love
                
               Caesar
                
               dead
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               well
                
               as
                
               Brutus
                
               living
               ,
                
               but
                
               will
                
               follow
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               fortunes
                
               and
                
               affairs
                
               of
                
               noble
                
               Brutus
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-105.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-105.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-105.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 3. SC. 1</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thorough
                
               the
                
               hazards
                
               of
                
               this
                
               untrod
                
               state
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               With
                
               all
                
               true
                
               faith
               .
                
               So
                
               says
                
               my
                
               master
                
               Antony
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thy
                
               master
                
               is
                
               a
                
               wise
                
               and
                
               valiant
                
               Roman
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               never
                
               thought
                
               him
                
               worse
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Tell
                
               him
               ,
                
               so
                
               please
                
               him
                
               come
                
               unto
                
               this
                
               place
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               shall
                
               be
                
               satisfied
                
               and
               ,
                
               by
                
               my
                
               honor
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Depart
                
               untouched
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SERVANT
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I’ll
                
               fetch
                
               him
                
               presently
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Servant
          
         exits
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               know
                
               that
                
               we
                
               shall
                
               have
                
               him
                
               well
                
               to
                
               friend
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               wish
                
               we
                
               may
               ;
                
               but
                
               yet
                
               have
                
               I
                
               a
                
               mind
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               fears
                
               him
                
               much
               ,
                
               and
                
               my
                
               misgiving
                
               still
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Falls
                
               shrewdly
                
               to
                
               the
                
               purpose
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Antony
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               here
                
               comes
                
               Antony
               .
               —
               Welcome
               ,
                
               Mark
                
               Antony
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               mighty
                
               Caesar
               ,
                
               dost
                
               thou
                
               lie
                
               so
                
               low
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Are
                
               all
                
               thy
                
               conquests
               ,
                
               glories
               ,
                
               triumphs
               ,
                
               spoils
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Shrunk
                
               to
                
               this
                
               little
                
               measure
               ?
                
               Fare
                
               thee
                
               well
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               know
                
               not
               ,
                
               gentlemen
               ,
                
               what
                
               you
                
               intend
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Who
                
               else
                
               must
                
               be
                
               let
                
               blood
               ,
                
               who
                
               else
                
               is
                
               rank
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               I
                
               myself
               ,
                
               there
                
               is
                
               no
                
               hour
                
               so
                
               fit
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               Caesar’s
                
               death’s
                
               hour
               ,
                
               nor
                
               no
                
               instrument
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Of
                
               half
                
               that
                
               worth
                
               as
                
               those
                
               your
                
               swords
                
               made
                
               rich
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               With
                
               the
                
               most
                
               noble
                
               blood
                
               of
                
               all
                
               this
                
               world
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               do
                
               beseech
                
               you
               ,
                
               if
                
               you
                
               bear
                
               me
                
               hard
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Now
               ,
                
               whilst
                
               your
                
               purpled
                
               hands
                
               do
                
               reek
                
               and
                
               smoke
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Fulfill
                
               your
                
               pleasure
               .
                
               Live
                
               a
                
               thousand
                
               years
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               shall
                
               not
                
               find
                
               myself
                
               so
                
               apt
                
               to
                
               die
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               No
                
               place
                
               will
                
               please
                
               me
                
               so
               ,
                
               no
                
               mean
                
               of
                
               death
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-107.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-107.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-107.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 3. SC. 1</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               here
                
               by
                
               Caesar
               ,
                
               and
                
               by
                
               you
                
               cut
                
               off
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               choice
                
               and
                
               master
                
               spirits
                
               of
                
               this
                
               age
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               Antony
               ,
                
               beg
                
               not
                
               your
                
               death
                
               of
                
               us
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Though
                
               now
                
               we
                
               must
                
               appear
                
               bloody
                
               and
                
               cruel
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               by
                
               our
                
               hands
                
               and
                
               this
                
               our
                
               present
                
               act
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               see
                
               we
                
               do
               ,
                
               yet
                
               see
                
               you
                
               but
                
               our
                
               hands
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               this
                
               the
                
               bleeding
                
               business
                
               they
                
               have
                
               done
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Our
                
               hearts
                
               you
                
               see
                
               not
               ;
                
               they
                
               are
                
               pitiful
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               pity
                
               to
                
               the
                
               general
                
               wrong
                
               of
                
               Rome
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               (
               As
                
               fire
                
               drives
                
               out
                
               fire
               ,
                
               so
                
               pity
                
               pity
               )
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hath
                
               done
                
               this
                
               deed
                
               on
                
               Caesar
               .
                
               For
                
               your
                
               part
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               you
                
               our
                
               swords
                
               have
                
               leaden
                
               points
               ,
                
               Mark
                
               Antony
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Our
                
               arms
                
               in
                
               strength
                
               of
                
               malice
               ,
                
               and
                
               our
                
               hearts
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Of
                
               brothers’
                
               temper
               ,
                
               do
                
               receive
                
               you
                
               in
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               With
                
               all
                
               kind
                
               love
               ,
                
               good
                
               thoughts
               ,
                
               and
                
               reverence
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Your
                
               voice
                
               shall
                
               be
                
               as
                
               strong
                
               as
                
               any
                
               man’s
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               In
                
               the
                
               disposing
                
               of
                
               new
                
               dignities
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Only
                
               be
                
               patient
                
               till
                
               we
                
               have
                
               appeased
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               multitude
               ,
                
               beside
                
               themselves
                
               with
                
               fear
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               then
                
               we
                
               will
                
               deliver
                
               you
                
               the
                
               cause
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
                
               I
               ,
                
               that
                
               did
                
               love
                
               Caesar
                
               when
                
               I
                
               struck
                
               him
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Have
                
               thus
                
               proceeded
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               doubt
                
               not
                
               of
                
               your
                
               wisdom
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let
                
               each
                
               man
                
               render
                
               me
                
               his
                
               bloody
                
               hand
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               First
               ,
                
               Marcus
                
               Brutus
               ,
                
               will
                
               I
                
               shake
                
               with
                
               you
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Next
               ,
                
               Caius
                
               Cassius
               ,
                
               do
                
               I
                
               take
                
               your
                
               hand
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Now
               ,
                
               Decius
                
               Brutus
               ,
                
               yours
               ;
               —
               now
                
               yours
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Metellus
               ;
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yours
               ,
                
               Cinna
               ;
               —
               and
               ,
                
               my
                
               valiant
                
               Casca
               ,
                
               yours
               ;
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Though
                
               last
               ,
                
               not
                
               least
                
               in
                
               love
               ,
                
               yours
               ,
                
               good
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Trebonius
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Gentlemen
                
               all
               —
               alas
               ,
                
               what
                
               shall
                
               I
                
               say
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               My
                
               credit
                
               now
                
               stands
                
               on
                
               such
                
               slippery
                
               ground
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               one
                
               of
                
               two
                
               bad
                
               ways
                
               you
                
               must
                
               conceit
                
               me
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-109.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-109.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-109.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 3. SC. 1</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Either
                
               a
                
               coward
                
               or
                
               a
                
               flatterer
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               I
                
               did
                
               love
                
               thee
               ,
                
               Caesar
               ,
                
               O
               ,
                
               ’tis
                
               true
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               then
                
               thy
                
               spirit
                
               look
                
               upon
                
               us
                
               now
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Shall
                
               it
                
               not
                
               grieve
                
               thee
                
               dearer
                
               than
                
               thy
                
               death
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               see
                
               thy
                
               Antony
                
               making
                
               his
                
               peace
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Shaking
                
               the
                
               bloody
                
               fingers
                
               of
                
               thy
                
               foes
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Most
                
               noble
               !
               —
               in
                
               the
                
               presence
                
               of
                
               thy
                
               corpse
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Had
                
               I
                
               as
                
               many
                
               eyes
                
               as
                
               thou
                
               hast
                
               wounds
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Weeping
                
               as
                
               fast
                
               as
                
               they
                
               stream
                
               forth
                
               thy
                
               blood
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               would
                
               become
                
               me
                
               better
                
               than
                
               to
                
               close
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               In
                
               terms
                
               of
                
               friendship
                
               with
                
               thine
                
               enemies
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Pardon
                
               me
               ,
                
               Julius
               !
                
               Here
                
               wast
                
               thou
                
               bayed
               ,
                
               brave
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               hart
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Here
                
               didst
                
               thou
                
               fall
               ,
                
               and
                
               here
                
               thy
                
               hunters
                
               stand
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Signed
                
               in
                
               thy
                
               spoil
                
               and
                
               crimsoned
                
               in
                
               thy
                
               Lethe
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               world
               ,
                
               thou
                
               wast
                
               the
                
               forest
                
               to
                
               this
                
               hart
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               this
                
               indeed
               ,
                
               O
                
               world
               ,
                
               the
                
               heart
                
               of
                
               thee
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               How
                
               like
                
               a
                
               deer
                
               strucken
                
               by
                
               many
                
               princes
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Dost
                
               thou
                
               here
                
               lie
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Mark
                
               Antony
               —
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Pardon
                
               me
               ,
                
               Caius
                
               Cassius
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               enemies
                
               of
                
               Caesar
                
               shall
                
               say
                
               this
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Then
               ,
                
               in
                
               a
                
               friend
               ,
                
               it
                
               is
                
               cold
                
               modesty
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               blame
                
               you
                
               not
                
               for
                
               praising
                
               Caesar
                
               so
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               what
                
               compact
                
               mean
                
               you
                
               to
                
               have
                
               with
                
               us
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Will
                
               you
                
               be
                
               pricked
                
               in
                
               number
                
               of
                
               our
                
               friends
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Or
                
               shall
                
               we
                
               on
                
               and
                
               not
                
               depend
                
               on
                
               you
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Therefore
                
               I
                
               took
                
               your
                
               hands
               ,
                
               but
                
               was
                
               indeed
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Swayed
                
               from
                
               the
                
               point
                
               by
                
               looking
                
               down
                
               on
                
               Caesar
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Friends
                
               am
                
               I
                
               with
                
               you
                
               all
                
               and
                
               love
                
               you
                
               all
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Upon
                
               this
                
               hope
               ,
                
               that
                
               you
                
               shall
                
               give
                
               me
                
               reasons
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
                
               and
                
               wherein
                
               Caesar
                
               was
                
               dangerous
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Or
                
               else
                
               were
                
               this
                
               a
                
               savage
                
               spectacle
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-111.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-111.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-111.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 3. SC. 1</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Our
                
               reasons
                
               are
                
               so
                
               full
                
               of
                
               good
                
               regard
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               were
                
               you
               ,
                
               Antony
               ,
                
               the
                
               son
                
               of
                
               Caesar
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               should
                
               be
                
               satisfied
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That’s
                
               all
                
               I
                
               seek
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               am
               ,
                
               moreover
