               ,
                
               suitor
                
               that
                
               I
                
               may
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Produce
                
               his
                
               body
                
               to
                
               the
                
               marketplace
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               in
                
               the
                
               pulpit
               ,
                
               as
                
               becomes
                
               a
                
               friend
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Speak
                
               in
                
               the
                
               order
                
               of
                
               his
                
               funeral
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               shall
               ,
                
               Mark
                
               Antony
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Brutus
               ,
                
               a
                
               word
                
               with
                
               you
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               
               Aside
                
               to
                
               Brutus
               .
                
               
               You
                
               know
                
               not
                
               what
                
               you
                
               do
               .
                
               Do
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               not
                
               consent
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               Antony
                
               speak
                
               in
                
               his
                
               funeral
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Know
                
               you
                
               how
                
               much
                
               the
                
               people
                
               may
                
               be
                
               moved
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               By
                
               that
                
               which
                
               he
                
               will
                
               utter
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            ,
             
            aside
             
            to
             
            Cassius
            
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               By
                
               your
                
               pardon
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               will
                
               myself
                
               into
                
               the
                
               pulpit
                
               first
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               show
                
               the
                
               reason
                
               of
                
               our
                
               Caesar’s
                
               death
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               Antony
                
               shall
                
               speak
                
               I
                
               will
                
               protest
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               speaks
                
               by
                
               leave
                
               and
                
               by
                
               permission
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               that
                
               we
                
               are
                
               contented
                
               Caesar
                
               shall
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Have
                
               all
                
               true
                
               rites
                
               and
                
               lawful
                
               ceremonies
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               shall
                
               advantage
                
               more
                
               than
                
               do
                
               us
                
               wrong
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            ,
             
            aside
             
            to
             
            Brutus
            
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               know
                
               not
                
               what
                
               may
                
               fall
               .
                
               I
                
               like
                
               it
                
               not
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Mark
                
               Antony
               ,
                
               here
               ,
                
               take
                
               you
                
               Caesar’s
                
               body
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               shall
                
               not
                
               in
                
               your
                
               funeral
                
               speech
                
               blame
                
               us
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               speak
                
               all
                
               good
                
               you
                
               can
                
               devise
                
               of
                
               Caesar
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               say
                
               you
                
               do
                
               ’t
                
               by
                
               our
                
               permission
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Else
                
               shall
                
               you
                
               not
                
               have
                
               any
                
               hand
                
               at
                
               all
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               About
                
               his
                
               funeral
               .
                
               And
                
               you
                
               shall
                
               speak
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               In
                
               the
                
               same
                
               pulpit
                
               whereto
                
               I
                
               am
                
               going
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               After
                
               my
                
               speech
                
               is
                
               ended
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-113.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-113.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-113.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 3. SC. 1</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Be
                
               it
                
               so
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               do
                
               desire
                
               no
                
               more
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Prepare
                
               the
                
               body
               ,
                
               then
               ,
                
               and
                
               follow
                
               us
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         All
          
         but
          
         Antony
          
         exit
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               pardon
                
               me
               ,
                
               thou
                
               bleeding
                
               piece
                
               of
                
               earth
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               I
                
               am
                
               meek
                
               and
                
               gentle
                
               with
                
               these
                
               butchers
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thou
                
               art
                
               the
                
               ruins
                
               of
                
               the
                
               noblest
                
               man
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               ever
                
               livèd
                
               in
                
               the
                
               tide
                
               of
                
               times
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Woe
                
               to
                
               the
                
               hand
                
               that
                
               shed
                
               this
                
               costly
                
               blood
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Over
                
               thy
                
               wounds
                
               now
                
               do
                
               I
                
               prophesy
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               (
               Which
                
               like
                
               dumb
                
               mouths
                
               do
                
               ope
                
               their
                
               ruby
                
               lips
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               beg
                
               the
                
               voice
                
               and
                
               utterance
                
               of
                
               my
                
               tongue
               )
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               A
                
               curse
                
               shall
                
               light
                
               upon
                
               the
                
               limbs
                
               of
                
               men
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Domestic
                
               fury
                
               and
                
               fierce
                
               civil
                
               strife
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Shall
                
               cumber
                
               all
                
               the
                
               parts
                
               of
                
               Italy
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Blood
                
               and
                
               destruction
                
               shall
                
               be
                
               so
                
               in
                
               use
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               dreadful
                
               objects
                
               so
                
               familiar
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               mothers
                
               shall
                
               but
                
               smile
                
               when
                
               they
                
               behold
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Their
                
               infants
                
               quartered
                
               with
                
               the
                
               hands
                
               of
                
               war
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               All
                
               pity
                
               choked
                
               with
                
               custom
                
               of
                
               fell
                
               deeds
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               Caesar’s
                
               spirit
               ,
                
               ranging
                
               for
                
               revenge
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               With
                
               Ate
                
               by
                
               his
                
               side
                
               come
                
               hot
                
               from
                
               hell
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Shall
                
               in
                
               these
                
               confines
                
               with
                
               a
                
               monarch’s
                
               voice
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Cry
                
               
               <span class="inline_quote">
                  Havoc
                  !
                  
               </span>
                
               and
                
               let
                
               slip
                
               the
                
               dogs
                
               of
                
               war
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               this
                
               foul
                
               deed
                
               shall
                
               smell
                
               above
                
               the
                
               earth
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               With
                
               carrion
                
               men
                
               groaning
                
               for
                
               burial
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <br></br>
               
               Enter
                
               Octavius’
                
               Servant
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               serve
                
               Octavius
                
               Caesar
               ,
                
               do
                
               you
                
               not
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SERVANT
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               do
               ,
                
               Mark
                
               Antony
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caesar
                
               did
                
               write
                
               for
                
               him
                
               to
                
               come
                
               to
                
               Rome
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SERVANT
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               did
                
               receive
                
               his
                
               letters
                
               and
                
               is
                
               coming
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-115.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-115.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">

                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 3. SC. 2</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               bid
                
               me
                
               say
                
               to
                
               you
                
               by
                
               word
                
               of
                
               mouth
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               Caesar
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thy
                
               heart
                
               is
                
               big
               .
                
               Get
                
               thee
                
               apart
                
               and
                
               weep
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Passion
               ,
                
               I
                
               see
               ,
                
               is
                
               catching
               ,
                
               for
                
               mine
                
               eyes
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Seeing
                
               those
                
               beads
                
               of
                
               sorrow
                
               stand
                
               in
                
               thine
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Began
                
               to
                
               water
               .
                
               Is
                
               thy
                
               master
                
               coming
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SERVANT
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               lies
                
               tonight
                
               within
                
               seven
                
               leagues
                
               of
                
               Rome
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Post
                
               back
                
               with
                
               speed
                
               and
                
               tell
                
               him
                
               what
                
               hath
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               chanced
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Here
                
               is
                
               a
                
               mourning
                
               Rome
               ,
                
               a
                
               dangerous
                
               Rome
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               No
                
               Rome
                
               of
                
               safety
                
               for
                
               Octavius
                
               yet
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hie
                
               hence
                
               and
                
               tell
                
               him
                
               so
               .
               —
               Yet
                
               stay
                
               awhile
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thou
                
               shalt
                
               not
                
               back
                
               till
                
               I
                
               have
                
               borne
                
               this
                
               corpse
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Into
                
               the
                
               marketplace
               .
                
               There
                
               shall
                
               I
                
               try
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               In
                
               my
                
               oration
               ,
                
               how
                
               the
                
               people
                
               take
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               cruel
                
               issue
                
               of
                
               these
                
               bloody
                
               men
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               According
                
               to
                
               the
                
               which
                
               thou
                
               shalt
                
               discourse
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               young
                
               Octavius
                
               of
                
               the
                
               state
                
               of
                
               things
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Lend
                
               me
                
               your
                
               hand
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         They
          
         exit
          
         with
          
         Caesar’s
          
         body
         .
         
         
      </div>
      
      <div class="scene ">
         
         <h4>
            Scene
             
            2
            
         </h4>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Brutus
          
         and
          
         Cassius
          
         with
          
         the
          
         Plebeians
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PLEBEIANS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               We
                
               will
                
               be
                
               satisfied
               !
                
               Let
                
               us
                
               be
                
               satisfied
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Then
                
               follow
                
               me
                
               and
                
               give
                
               me
                
               audience
               ,
                
               friends
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Cassius
               ,
                
               go
                
               you
                
               into
                
               the
                
               other
                
               street
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               part
                
               the
                
               numbers
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Those
                
               that
                
               will
                
               hear
                
               me
                
               speak
               ,
                
               let
                
               ’em
                
               stay
                
               here
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Those
                
               that
                
               will
                
               follow
                
               Cassius
               ,
                
               go
                
               with
                
               him
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-117.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-117.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-117.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 3. SC. 2</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               public
                
               reasons
                
               shall
                
               be
                
               renderèd
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Of
                
               Caesar’s
                
               death
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FIRST
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               will
                
               hear
                
               Brutus
                
               speak
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SECOND
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               will
                
               hear
                
               Cassius
               ,
                
               and
                
               compare
                
               their
                
               reasons
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               When
                
               severally
                
               we
                
               hear
                
               them
                
               renderèd
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         
         Cassius
          
         exits
          
         with
          
         some
          
         of
          
         the
          
         Plebeians
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         Brutus
          
         goes
          
         into
          
         the
          
         pulpit
         .
         
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               THIRD
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               noble
                
               Brutus
                
               is
                
               ascended
               .
                
               Silence
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Be
                
               patient
                
               till
                
               the
                
               last
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Romans
               ,
                
               countrymen
               ,
                
               and
                
               lovers
               ,
                
               hear
                
               me
                
               for
                
               my
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               cause
               ,
                
               and
                
               be
                
               silent
                
               that
                
               you
                
               may
                
               hear
               .
                
               Believe
                
               me
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               for
                
               mine
                
               honor
               ,
                
               and
                
               have
                
               respect
                
               to
                
               mine
                
               honor
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               that
                
               you
                
               may
                
               believe
               .
                
               Censure
                
               me
                
               in
                
               your
                
               wisdom
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               and
                
               awake
                
               your
                
               senses
                
               that
                
               you
                
               may
                
               the
                
               better
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               judge
               .
                
               If
                
               there
                
               be
                
               any
                
               in
                
               this
                
               assembly
               ,
                
               any
                
               dear
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               friend
                
               of
                
               Caesar’s
               ,
                
               to
                
               him
                
               I
                
               say
                
               that
                
               Brutus’
                
               love
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               to
                
               Caesar
                
               was
                
               no
                
               less
                
               than
                
               his
               .
                
               If
                
               then
                
               that
                
               friend
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               demand
                
               why
                
               Brutus
                
               rose
                
               against
                
               Caesar
               ,
                
               this
                
               is
                
               my
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               answer
               :
                
               not
                
               that
                
               I
                
               loved
                
               Caesar
                
               less
               ,
                
               but
                
               that
                
               I
                
               loved
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Rome
                
               more
               .
                
               Had
                
               you
                
               rather
                
               Caesar
                
               were
                
               living
               ,
                
               and
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               die
                
               all
                
               slaves
               ,
                
               than
                
               that
                
               Caesar
                
               were
                
               dead
               ,
                
               to
                
               live
                
               all
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               freemen
               ?
                
               As
                
               Caesar
                
               loved
                
               me
               ,
                
               I
                
               weep
                
               for
                
               him
               .
                
               As
                
               he
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               was
                
               fortunate
               ,
                
               I
                
               rejoice
                
               at
                
               it
               .
                
               As
                
               he
                
               was
                
               valiant
               ,
                
               I
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               honor
                
               him
               .
                
               But
               ,
                
               as
                
               he
                
               was
                
               ambitious
               ,
                
               I
                
               slew
                
               him
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               There
                
               is
                
               tears
                
               for
                
               his
                
               love
               ,
                
               joy
                
               for
                
               his
                
               fortune
               ,
                
               honor
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               for
                
               his
                
               valor
               ,
                
               and
                
               death
                
               for
                
               his
                
               ambition
               .
                
               Who
                
               is
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               here
                
               so
                
               base
                
               that
                
               would
                
               be
                
               a
                
               bondman
               ?
                
               If
                
               any
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               speak
               ,
                
               for
                
               him
                
               have
                
               I
                
               offended
               .
                
               Who
                
               is
                
               here
                
               so
                
               rude
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               that
                
               would
                
               not
                
               be
                
               a
                
               Roman
               ?
                
               If
                
               any
               ,
                
               speak
               ,
                
               for
                
               him
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               have
                
               I
                
               offended
               .
                
               Who
                
               is
                
               here
                
               so
                
               vile
                
               that
                
               will
                
               not
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               love
                
               his
                
               country
               ?
                
               If
                
               any
               ,
                
               speak
               ,
                
               for
                
               him
                
               have
                
               I
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               offended
               .
                
               I
                
               pause
                
               for
                
               a
                
               reply
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PLEBEIANS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               None
               ,
                
               Brutus
               ,
                
               none
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Then
                
               none
                
               have
                
               I
                
               offended
               .
                
               I
                
               have
                
               done
                
               no
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-119.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-119.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-119.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 3. SC. 2</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               more
                
               to
                
               Caesar
                
               than
                
               you
                
               shall
                
               do
                
               to
                
               Brutus
               .
                
               The
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               question
                
               of
                
               his
                
               death
                
               is
                
               enrolled
                
               in
                
               the
                
               Capitol
               ,
                
               his
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               glory
                
               not
                
               extenuated
                
               wherein
                
               he
                
               was
                
               worthy
               ,
                
               nor
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               his
                
               offenses
                
               enforced
                
               for
                
               which
                
               he
                
               suffered
                
               death
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <br></br>
               
               Enter
                
               Mark
                
               Antony
                
               and
                
               others
                
               with
                
               Caesar’s
                
               body
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Here
                
               comes
                
               his
                
               body
               ,
                
               mourned
                
               by
                
               Mark
                
               Antony
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               who
               ,
                
               though
                
               he
                
               had
                
               no
                
               hand
                
               in
                
               his
                
               death
               ,
                
               shall
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               receive
                
               the
                
               benefit
                
               of
                
               his
                
               dying
               —
               a
                
               place
                
               in
                
               the
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               commonwealth
               —
               as
                
               which
                
               of
                
               you
                
               shall
                
               not
               ?
                
               With
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               this
                
               I
                
               depart
               :
                
               that
               ,
                
               as
                
               I
                
               slew
                
               my
                
               best
                
               lover
                
               for
                
               the
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               good
                
               of
                
               Rome
               ,
                
               I
                
               have
                
               the
                
               same
                
               dagger
                
               for
                
               myself
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               when
                
               it
                
               shall
                
               please
                
               my
                
               country
                
               to
                
               need
                
               my
                
               death
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PLEBEIANS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Live
               ,
                
               Brutus
               ,
                
               live
               ,
                
               live
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FIRST
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Bring
                
               him
                
               with
                
               triumph
                
               home
                
               unto
                
               his
                
               house
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SECOND
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Give
                
               him
                
               a
                
               statue
                
               with
                
               his
                
               ancestors
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               THIRD
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let
                
               him
                
               be
                
               Caesar
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FOURTH
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caesar’s
                
               better
                
               parts
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Shall
                
               be
                
               crowned
                
               in
                
               Brutus
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FIRST
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               We’ll
                
               bring
                
               him
                
               to
                
               his
                
               house
                
               with
                
               shouts
                
               and
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               clamors
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               My
                
               countrymen
               —
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SECOND
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Peace
               ,
                
               silence
               !
                
               Brutus
                
               speaks
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FIRST
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Peace
               ,
                
               ho
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Good
                
               countrymen
               ,
                
               let
                
               me
                
               depart
                
               alone
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
               ,
                
               for
                
               my
                
               sake
               ,
                
               stay
                
               here
                
               with
                
               Antony
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Do
                
               grace
                
               to
                
               Caesar’s
                
               corpse
               ,
                
               and
                
               grace
                
               his
                
               speech
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Tending
                
               to
                
               Caesar’s
                
               glories
               ,
                
               which
                
               Mark
                
               Antony
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               (
               By
                
               our
                
               permission
               )
                
               is
                
               allowed
                
               to
                
               make
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-121.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-121.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">

                  </a>
