               <h6 class="fw">ACT 3. SC. 2</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               do
                
               entreat
                
               you
               ,
                
               not
                
               a
                
               man
                
               depart
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Save
                
               I
                
               alone
               ,
                
               till
                
               Antony
                
               have
                
               spoke
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         He
          
         descends
          
         and
          
         exits
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FIRST
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Stay
               ,
                
               ho
               ,
                
               and
                
               let
                
               us
                
               hear
                
               Mark
                
               Antony
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               THIRD
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let
                
               him
                
               go
                
               up
                
               into
                
               the
                
               public
                
               chair
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PLEBEIANS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               We’ll
                
               hear
                
               him
               .
               —
               Noble
                
               Antony
               ,
                
               go
                
               up
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               Brutus’
                
               sake
               ,
                
               I
                
               am
                
               beholding
                
               to
                
               you
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         He
          
         goes
          
         into
          
         the
          
         pulpit
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FOURTH
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               does
                
               he
                
               say
                
               of
                
               Brutus
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               THIRD
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               says
                
               for
                
               Brutus’
                
               sake
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               finds
                
               himself
                
               beholding
                
               to
                
               us
                
               all
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FOURTH
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               ’Twere
                
               best
                
               he
                
               speak
                
               no
                
               harm
                
               of
                
               Brutus
                
               here
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FIRST
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               This
                
               Caesar
                
               was
                
               a
                
               tyrant
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               THIRD
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Nay
               ,
                
               that’s
                
               certain
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               We
                
               are
                
               blest
                
               that
                
               Rome
                
               is
                
               rid
                
               of
                
               him
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SECOND
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Peace
               ,
                
               let
                
               us
                
               hear
                
               what
                
               Antony
                
               can
                
               say
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               gentle
                
               Romans
               —
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PLEBEIANS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Peace
               ,
                
               ho
               !
                
               Let
                
               us
                
               hear
                
               him
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Friends
               ,
                
               Romans
               ,
                
               countrymen
               ,
                
               lend
                
               me
                
               your
                
               ears
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               come
                
               to
                
               bury
                
               Caesar
               ,
                
               not
                
               to
                
               praise
                
               him
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               evil
                
               that
                
               men
                
               do
                
               lives
                
               after
                
               them
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               good
                
               is
                
               oft
                
               interrèd
                
               with
                
               their
                
               bones
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               let
                
               it
                
               be
                
               with
                
               Caesar
               .
                
               The
                
               noble
                
               Brutus
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hath
                
               told
                
               you
                
               Caesar
                
               was
                
               ambitious
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               it
                
               were
                
               so
               ,
                
               it
                
               was
                
               a
                
               grievous
                
               fault
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               grievously
                
               hath
                
               Caesar
                
               answered
                
               it
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Here
               ,
                
               under
                
               leave
                
               of
                
               Brutus
                
               and
                
               the
                
               rest
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               (
               For
                
               Brutus
                
               is
                
               an
                
               honorable
                
               man
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-123.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-123.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-123.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 3. SC. 2</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               are
                
               they
                
               all
               ,
                
               all
                
               honorable
                
               men
               )
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Come
                
               I
                
               to
                
               speak
                
               in
                
               Caesar’s
                
               funeral
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               was
                
               my
                
               friend
               ,
                
               faithful
                
               and
                
               just
                
               to
                
               me
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               Brutus
                
               says
                
               he
                
               was
                
               ambitious
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               Brutus
                
               is
                
               an
                
               honorable
                
               man
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               hath
                
               brought
                
               many
                
               captives
                
               home
                
               to
                
               Rome
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Whose
                
               ransoms
                
               did
                
               the
                
               general
                
               coffers
                
               fill
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Did
                
               this
                
               in
                
               Caesar
                
               seem
                
               ambitious
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               When
                
               that
                
               the
                
               poor
                
               have
                
               cried
               ,
                
               Caesar
                
               hath
                
               wept
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ambition
                
               should
                
               be
                
               made
                
               of
                
               sterner
                
               stuff
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yet
                
               Brutus
                
               says
                
               he
                
               was
                
               ambitious
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               Brutus
                
               is
                
               an
                
               honorable
                
               man
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               all
                
               did
                
               see
                
               that
                
               on
                
               the
                
               Lupercal
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               thrice
                
               presented
                
               him
                
               a
                
               kingly
                
               crown
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Which
                
               he
                
               did
                
               thrice
                
               refuse
               .
                
               Was
                
               this
                
               ambition
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yet
                
               Brutus
                
               says
                
               he
                
               was
                
               ambitious
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               sure
                
               he
                
               is
                
               an
                
               honorable
                
               man
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               speak
                
               not
                
               to
                
               disprove
                
               what
                
               Brutus
                
               spoke
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               here
                
               I
                
               am
                
               to
                
               speak
                
               what
                
               I
                
               do
                
               know
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               all
                
               did
                
               love
                
               him
                
               once
               ,
                
               not
                
               without
                
               cause
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               cause
                
               withholds
                
               you
               ,
                
               then
               ,
                
               to
                
               mourn
                
               for
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               him
               ?
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               judgment
               ,
                
               thou
                
               art
                
               fled
                
               to
                
               brutish
                
               beasts
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               men
                
               have
                
               lost
                
               their
                
               reason
               !
               —
               Bear
                
               with
                
               me
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               My
                
               heart
                
               is
                
               in
                
               the
                
               coffin
                
               there
                
               with
                
               Caesar
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               I
                
               must
                
               pause
                
               till
                
               it
                
               come
                
               back
                
               to
                
               me
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         He
          
         weeps
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FIRST
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Methinks
                
               there
                
               is
                
               much
                
               reason
                
               in
                
               his
                
               sayings
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SECOND
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               thou
                
               consider
                
               rightly
                
               of
                
               the
                
               matter
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caesar
                
               has
                
               had
                
               great
                
               wrong
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               THIRD
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Has
                
               he
               ,
                
               masters
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               fear
                
               there
                
               will
                
               a
                
               worse
                
               come
                
               in
                
               his
                
               place
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FOURTH
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Marked
                
               you
                
               his
                
               words
               ?
                
               He
                
               would
                
               not
                
               take
                
               the
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               crown
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Therefore
                
               ’tis
                
               certain
                
               he
                
               was
                
               not
                
               ambitious
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>

         <h6 class="fw">ACT 3. SC. 2</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FIRST
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               it
                
               be
                
               found
                
               so
               ,
                
               some
                
               will
                
               dear
                
               abide
                
               it
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SECOND
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Poor
                
               soul
               ,
                
               his
                
               eyes
                
               are
                
               red
                
               as
                
               fire
                
               with
                
               weeping
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               THIRD
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               There’s
                
               not
                
               a
                
               nobler
                
               man
                
               in
                
               Rome
                
               than
                
               Antony
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FOURTH
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Now
                
               mark
                
               him
               .
                
               He
                
               begins
                
               again
                
               to
                
               speak
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               yesterday
                
               the
                
               word
                
               of
                
               Caesar
                
               might
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Have
                
               stood
                
               against
                
               the
                
               world
               .
                
               Now
                
               lies
                
               he
                
               there
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               none
                
               so
                
               poor
                
               to
                
               do
                
               him
                
               reverence
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               masters
               ,
                
               if
                
               I
                
               were
                
               disposed
                
               to
                
               stir
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Your
                
               hearts
                
               and
                
               minds
                
               to
                
               mutiny
                
               and
                
               rage
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               should
                
               do
                
               Brutus
                
               wrong
                
               and
                
               Cassius
                
               wrong
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Who
               ,
                
               you
                
               all
                
               know
               ,
                
               are
                
               honorable
                
               men
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               will
                
               not
                
               do
                
               them
                
               wrong
               .
                
               I
                
               rather
                
               choose
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               wrong
                
               the
                
               dead
               ,
                
               to
                
               wrong
                
               myself
                
               and
                
               you
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Than
                
               I
                
               will
                
               wrong
                
               such
                
               honorable
                
               men
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               here’s
                
               a
                
               parchment
                
               with
                
               the
                
               seal
                
               of
                
               Caesar
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               found
                
               it
                
               in
                
               his
                
               closet
               .
                
               ’Tis
                
               his
                
               will
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let
                
               but
                
               the
                
               commons
                
               hear
                
               this
                
               testament
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Which
               ,
                
               pardon
                
               me
               ,
                
               I
                
               do
                
               not
                
               mean
                
               to
                
               read
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               they
                
               would
                
               go
                
               and
                
               kiss
                
               dead
                
               Caesar’s
                
               wounds
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               dip
                
               their
                
               napkins
                
               in
                
               his
                
               sacred
                
               blood
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yea
               ,
                
               beg
                
               a
                
               hair
                
               of
                
               him
                
               for
                
               memory
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
               ,
                
               dying
               ,
                
               mention
                
               it
                
               within
                
               their
                
               wills
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Bequeathing
                
               it
                
               as
                
               a
                
               rich
                
               legacy
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Unto
                
               their
                
               issue
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FOURTH
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               We’ll
                
               hear
                
               the
                
               will
               .
                
               Read
                
               it
               ,
                
               Mark
                
               Antony
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PLEBEIANS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               will
               ,
                
               the
                
               will
               !
                
               We
                
               will
                
               hear
                
               Caesar’s
                
               will
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Have
                
               patience
               ,
                
               gentle
                
               friends
               .
                
               I
                
               must
                
               not
                
               read
                
               it
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-127.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-127.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-127.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 3. SC. 2</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               is
                
               not
                
               meet
                
               you
                
               know
                
               how
                
               Caesar
                
               loved
                
               you
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               are
                
               not
                
               wood
               ,
                
               you
                
               are
                
               not
                
               stones
               ,
                
               but
                
               men
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
               ,
                
               being
                
               men
               ,
                
               hearing
                
               the
                
               will
                
               of
                
               Caesar
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               will
                
               inflame
                
               you
               ;
                
               it
                
               will
                
               make
                
               you
                
               mad
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               ’Tis
                
               good
                
               you
                
               know
                
               not
                
               that
                
               you
                
               are
                
               his
                
               heirs
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               if
                
               you
                
               should
               ,
                
               O
               ,
                
               what
                
               would
                
               come
                
               of
                
               it
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FOURTH
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Read
                
               the
                
               will
               !
                
               We’ll
                
               hear
                
               it
               ,
                
               Antony
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PLEBEIANS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               shall
                
               read
                
               us
                
               the
                
               will
               ,
                
               Caesar’s
                
               will
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Will
                
               you
                
               be
                
               patient
               ?
                
               Will
                
               you
                
               stay
                
               awhile
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               have
                
               o’ershot
                
               myself
                
               to
                
               tell
                
               you
                
               of
                
               it
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               fear
                
               I
                
               wrong
                
               the
                
               honorable
                
               men
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Whose
                
               daggers
                
               have
                
               stabbed
                
               Caesar
               .
                
               I
                
               do
                
               fear
                
               it
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FOURTH
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               They
                
               were
                
               traitors
               .
                
               Honorable
                
               men
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PLEBEIANS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               will
               !
                
               The
                
               testament
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SECOND
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               They
                
               were
                
               villains
               ,
                
               murderers
               .
                
               The
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               will
               !
                
               Read
                
               the
                
               will
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               will
                
               compel
                
               me
               ,
                
               then
               ,
                
               to
                
               read
                
               the
                
               will
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Then
                
               make
                
               a
                
               ring
                
               about
                
               the
                
               corpse
                
               of
                
               Caesar
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               let
                
               me
                
               show
                
               you
                
               him
                
               that
                
               made
                
               the
                
               will
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Shall
                
               I
                
               descend
               ?
                
               And
                
               will
                
               you
                
               give
                
               me
                
               leave
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PLEBEIANS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Come
                
               down
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SECOND
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Descend
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               THIRD
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               shall
                
               have
                
               leave
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Antony
          
         descends
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FOURTH
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               A
                
               ring
               ;
                
               stand
                
               round
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FIRST
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Stand
                
               from
                
               the
                
               hearse
               .
                
               Stand
                
               from
                
               the
                
               body
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SECOND
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Room
                
               for
                
               Antony
               ,
                
               most
                
               noble
                
               Antony
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Nay
               ,
                
               press
                
               not
                
               so
                
               upon
                
               me
               .
                
               Stand
                
               far
                
               off
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>

         <div class="milestone page"> </div>

         <span class="pageimage">

         <h6 class="fw">ACT 3. SC. 2</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PLEBEIANS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Stand
                
               back
               !
                
               Room
               !
                
               Bear
                
               back
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               you
                
               have
                
               tears
               ,
                
               prepare
                
               to
                
               shed
                
               them
                
               now
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               all
                
               do
                
               know
                
               this
                
               mantle
               .
                
               I
                
               remember
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               first
                
               time
                
               ever
                
               Caesar
                
               put
                
               it
                
               on
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               ’Twas
                
               on
                
               a
                
               summer’s
                
               evening
                
               in
                
               his
                
               tent
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               day
                
               he
                
               overcame
                
               the
                
               Nervii
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Look
               ,
                
               in
                
               this
                
               place
                
               ran
                
               Cassius’
                
               dagger
                
               through
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               See
                
               what
                
               a
                
               rent
                
               the
                
               envious
                
               Casca
                
               made
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Through
                
               this
                
               the
                
               well-belovèd
                
               Brutus
                
               stabbed
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
               ,
                
               as
                
               he
                
               plucked
                
               his
                
               cursèd
                
               steel
                
               away
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Mark
                
               how
                
               the
                
               blood
                
               of
                
               Caesar
                
               followed
                
               it
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               rushing
                
               out
                
               of
                
               doors
                
               to
                
               be
                
               resolved
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               Brutus
                
               so
                
               unkindly
                
               knocked
                
               or
                
               no
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               Brutus
               ,
                
               as
                
               you
                
               know
               ,
                
               was
                
               Caesar’s
                
               angel
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Judge
               ,
                
               O
                
               you
                
               gods
               ,
                
               how
                
               dearly
                
               Caesar
                
               loved
                
               him
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               This
                
               was
                
               the
                
               most
                
               unkindest
                
               cut
                
               of
                
               all
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               when
                
               the
                
               noble
                
               Caesar
                
               saw
                
               him
                
               stab
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ingratitude
               ,
                
               more
                
               strong
                
               than
                
               traitors’
                
               arms
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Quite
                
               vanquished
                
               him
               .
                
               Then
                
               burst
                
               his
                
               mighty
                
               heart
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
               ,
                
               in
                
               his
                
               mantle
                
               muffling
                
               up
                
               his
                
               face
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Even
                
               at
                
               the
                
               base
                
               of
                
               Pompey’s
                
               statue
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               (
               Which
                
               all
                
               the
                
               while
                
               ran
                
               blood
               )
                
               great
                
               Caesar
                
               fell
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
               ,
                
               what
                
               a
                
               fall
                
               was
                
               there
               ,
                
               my
                
               countrymen
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Then
                
               I
                
               and
                
               you
                
               and
                
               all
                
               of
                
               us
                
               fell
                
               down
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Whilst
                
               bloody
                
               treason
                
               flourished
                
               over
                
               us
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
               ,
                
               now
                
               you
                
               weep
               ,
                
               and
                
               I
                
               perceive
                
               you
                
               feel
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               dint
                
               of
                
               pity
               .
                
               These
                
               are
                
               gracious
                
               drops
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Kind
                
               souls
               ,
                
               what
               ,
                
               weep
                
               you
                
               when
                
               you
                
               but
                
               behold
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Our
                
               Caesar’s
                
               vesture
                
               wounded
               ?
                
               Look
                
               you
                
               here
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               Antony
                
               lifts
                
               Caesar’s
                
               cloak
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Here
                
               is
                
               himself
               ,
                
               marred
                
               as
                
               you
                
               see
                
               with
                
               traitors
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FIRST
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               piteous
                
               spectacle
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SECOND
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               noble
                
               Caesar
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               THIRD
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               woeful
                
               day
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-131.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-131.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
