         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 3. SC. 2</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FOURTH
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               traitors
               ,
                
               villains
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FIRST
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               most
                
               bloody
                
               sight
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SECOND
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               We
                
               will
                
               be
                
               revenged
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PLEBEIANS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Revenge
               !
                
               About
               !
                
               Seek
               !
                
               Burn
               !
                
               Fire
               !
                
               Kill
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Slay
               !
                
               Let
                
               not
                
               a
                
               traitor
                
               live
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Stay
               ,
                
               countrymen
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FIRST
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Peace
                
               there
               !
                
               Hear
                
               the
                
               noble
                
               Antony
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SECOND
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               We’ll
                
               hear
                
               him
               ,
                
               we’ll
                
               follow
                
               him
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               we’ll
                
               die
                
               with
                
               him
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Good
                
               friends
               ,
                
               sweet
                
               friends
               ,
                
               let
                
               me
                
               not
                
               stir
                
               you
                
               up
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               such
                
               a
                
               sudden
                
               flood
                
               of
                
               mutiny
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               They
                
               that
                
               have
                
               done
                
               this
                
               deed
                
               are
                
               honorable
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               private
                
               griefs
                
               they
                
               have
               ,
                
               alas
               ,
                
               I
                
               know
                
               not
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               made
                
               them
                
               do
                
               it
               .
                
               They
                
               are
                
               wise
                
               and
                
               honorable
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               will
                
               no
                
               doubt
                
               with
                
               reasons
                
               answer
                
               you
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               come
                
               not
               ,
                
               friends
               ,
                
               to
                
               steal
                
               away
                
               your
                
               hearts
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               am
                
               no
                
               orator
               ,
                
               as
                
               Brutus
                
               is
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
               ,
                
               as
                
               you
                
               know
                
               me
                
               all
               ,
                
               a
                
               plain
                
               blunt
                
               man
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               love
                
               my
                
               friend
               ,
                
               and
                
               that
                
               they
                
               know
                
               full
                
               well
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               gave
                
               me
                
               public
                
               leave
                
               to
                
               speak
                
               of
                
               him
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               I
                
               have
                
               neither
                
               wit
               ,
                
               nor
                
               words
               ,
                
               nor
                
               worth
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Action
               ,
                
               nor
                
               utterance
               ,
                
               nor
                
               the
                
               power
                
               of
                
               speech
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               stir
                
               men’s
                
               blood
               .
                
               I
                
               only
                
               speak
                
               right
                
               on
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               tell
                
               you
                
               that
                
               which
                
               you
                
               yourselves
                
               do
                
               know
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Show
                
               you
                
               sweet
                
               Caesar’s
                
               wounds
               ,
                
               poor
                
               poor
                
               dumb
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               mouths
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               bid
                
               them
                
               speak
                
               for
                
               me
               .
                
               But
                
               were
                
               I
                
               Brutus
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               Brutus
                
               Antony
               ,
                
               there
                
               were
                
               an
                
               Antony
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Would
                
               ruffle
                
               up
                
               your
                
               spirits
                
               and
                
               put
                
               a
                
               tongue
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               In
                
               every
                
               wound
                
               of
                
               Caesar
                
               that
                
               should
                
               move
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               stones
                
               of
                
               Rome
                
               to
                
               rise
                
               and
                
               mutiny
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PLEBEIANS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               We’ll
                
               mutiny
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FIRST
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               We’ll
                
               burn
                
               the
                
               house
                
               of
                
               Brutus
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>

         <h6 class="fw">ACT 3. SC. 2</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               THIRD
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Away
                
               then
               .
                
               Come
               ,
                
               seek
                
               the
                
               conspirators
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yet
                
               hear
                
               me
               ,
                
               countrymen
               ;
                
               yet
                
               hear
                
               me
                
               speak
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PLEBEIANS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Peace
               ,
                
               ho
               !
                
               Hear
                
               Antony
               ,
                
               most
                
               noble
                
               Antony
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
               ,
                
               friends
               ,
                
               you
                
               go
                
               to
                
               do
                
               you
                
               know
                
               not
                
               what
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Wherein
                
               hath
                
               Caesar
                
               thus
                
               deserved
                
               your
                
               loves
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Alas
               ,
                
               you
                
               know
                
               not
               .
                
               I
                
               must
                
               tell
                
               you
                
               then
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               have
                
               forgot
                
               the
                
               will
                
               I
                
               told
                
               you
                
               of
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PLEBEIANS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Most
                
               true
               .
                
               The
                
               will
               !
                
               Let’s
                
               stay
                
               and
                
               hear
                
               the
                
               will
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Here
                
               is
                
               the
                
               will
               ,
                
               and
                
               under
                
               Caesar’s
                
               seal
               :
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               every
                
               Roman
                
               citizen
                
               he
                
               gives
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               every
                
               several
                
               man
               ,
                
               seventy-five
                
               drachmas
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SECOND
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Most
                
               noble
                
               Caesar
               !
                
               We’ll
                
               revenge
                
               his
                
               death
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               THIRD
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               royal
                
               Caesar
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hear
                
               me
                
               with
                
               patience
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PLEBEIANS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Peace
               ,
                
               ho
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Moreover
               ,
                
               he
                
               hath
                
               left
                
               you
                
               all
                
               his
                
               walks
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               His
                
               private
                
               arbors
               ,
                
               and
                
               new-planted
                
               orchards
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               On
                
               this
                
               side
                
               Tiber
               .
                
               He
                
               hath
                
               left
                
               them
                
               you
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               to
                
               your
                
               heirs
                
               forever
               —
               common
                
               pleasures
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               walk
                
               abroad
                
               and
                
               recreate
                
               yourselves
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Here
                
               was
                
               a
                
               Caesar
               !
                
               When
                
               comes
                
               such
                
               another
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FIRST
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Never
               ,
                
               never
               !
               —
               Come
               ,
                
               away
               ,
                
               away
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               We’ll
                
               burn
                
               his
                
               body
                
               in
                
               the
                
               holy
                
               place
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               with
                
               the
                
               brands
                
               fire
                
               the
                
               traitors’
                
               houses
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Take
                
               up
                
               the
                
               body
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SECOND
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Go
                
               fetch
                
               fire
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               THIRD
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Pluck
                
               down
                
               benches
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-135.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-135.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-135.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 3. SC. 3</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FOURTH
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Pluck
                
               down
                
               forms
               ,
                
               windows
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               anything
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Plebeians
          
         exit
          
         with
          
         Caesar’s
          
         body
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Now
                
               let
                
               it
                
               work
               .
                
               Mischief
               ,
                
               thou
                
               art
                
               afoot
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Take
                
               thou
                
               what
                
               course
                
               thou
                
               wilt
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <br></br>
               
               Enter
                
               Servant
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               How
                
               now
               ,
                
               fellow
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SERVANT
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Sir
               ,
                
               Octavius
                
               is
                
               already
                
               come
                
               to
                
               Rome
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Where
                
               is
                
               he
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SERVANT
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               and
                
               Lepidus
                
               are
                
               at
                
               Caesar’s
                
               house
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               thither
                
               will
                
               I
                
               straight
                
               to
                
               visit
                
               him
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               comes
                
               upon
                
               a
                
               wish
               .
                
               Fortune
                
               is
                
               merry
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               in
                
               this
                
               mood
                
               will
                
               give
                
               us
                
               anything
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SERVANT
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               heard
                
               him
                
               say
                
               Brutus
                
               and
                
               Cassius
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Are
                
               rid
                
               like
                
               madmen
                
               through
                
               the
                
               gates
                
               of
                
               Rome
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Belike
                
               they
                
               had
                
               some
                
               notice
                
               of
                
               the
                
               people
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               How
                
               I
                
               had
                
               moved
                
               them
               .
                
               Bring
                
               me
                
               to
                
               Octavius
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         They
          
         exit
         .
         
         
      </div>
      
      <div class="scene ">
         
         <h4>
            Scene
             
            3
            
         </h4>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Cinna
          
         the
          
         poet
          
         and
          
         after
          
         him
          
         the
          
         Plebeians
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CINNA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               dreamt
                
               tonight
                
               that
                
               I
                
               did
                
               feast
                
               with
                
               Caesar
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               things
                
               unluckily
                
               charge
                
               my
                
               fantasy
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               have
                
               no
                
               will
                
               to
                
               wander
                
               forth
                
               of
                
               doors
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yet
                
               something
                
               leads
                
               me
                
               forth
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FIRST
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               is
                
               your
                
               name
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-137.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-137.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-137.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 3. SC. 3</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SECOND
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Whither
                
               are
                
               you
                
               going
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               THIRD
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Where
                
               do
                
               you
                
               dwell
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FOURTH
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Are
                
               you
                
               a
                
               married
                
               man
                
               or
                
               a
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               bachelor
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SECOND
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Answer
                
               every
                
               man
                
               directly
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FIRST
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ay
               ,
                
               and
                
               briefly
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FOURTH
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ay
               ,
                
               and
                
               wisely
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               THIRD
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ay
               ,
                
               and
                
               truly
               ,
                
               you
                
               were
                
               best
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CINNA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               is
                
               my
                
               name
               ?
                
               Whither
                
               am
                
               I
                
               going
               ?
                
               Where
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               do
                
               I
                
               dwell
               ?
                
               Am
                
               I
                
               a
                
               married
                
               man
                
               or
                
               a
                
               bachelor
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Then
                
               to
                
               answer
                
               every
                
               man
                
               directly
                
               and
                
               briefly
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               wisely
                
               and
                
               truly
               :
                
               wisely
                
               I
                
               say
               ,
                
               I
                
               am
                
               a
                
               bachelor
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SECOND
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That’s
                
               as
                
               much
                
               as
                
               to
                
               say
                
               they
                
               are
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               fools
                
               that
                
               marry
               .
                
               You’ll
                
               bear
                
               me
                
               a
                
               bang
                
               for
                
               that
               ,
                
               I
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               fear
               .
                
               Proceed
                
               directly
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CINNA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Directly
               ,
                
               I
                
               am
                
               going
                
               to
                
               Caesar’s
                
               funeral
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FIRST
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               a
                
               friend
                
               or
                
               an
                
               enemy
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CINNA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               a
                
               friend
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SECOND
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               matter
                
               is
                
               answered
                
               directly
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FOURTH
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               your
                
               dwelling
               —
               briefly
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CINNA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Briefly
               ,
                
               I
                
               dwell
                
               by
                
               the
                
               Capitol
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               THIRD
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Your
                
               name
               ,
                
               sir
               ,
                
               truly
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CINNA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Truly
               ,
                
               my
                
               name
                
               is
                
               Cinna
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FIRST
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Tear
                
               him
                
               to
                
               pieces
               !
                
               He’s
                
               a
                
               conspirator
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CINNA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               am
                
               Cinna
                
               the
                
               poet
               ,
                
               I
                
               am
                
               Cinna
                
               the
                
               poet
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FOURTH
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Tear
                
               him
                
               for
                
               his
                
               bad
                
               verses
               ,
                
               tear
                
               him
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               for
                
               his
                
               bad
                
               verses
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CINNA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               am
                
               not
                
               Cinna
                
               the
                
               conspirator
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FOURTH
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               is
                
               no
                
               matter
               .
                
               His
                
               name’s
                
               Cinna
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Pluck
                
               but
                
               his
                
               name
                
               out
                
               of
                
               his
                
               heart
               ,
                
               and
                
               turn
                
               him
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               going
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               THIRD
                
               PLEBEIAN
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Tear
                
               him
               ,
                
               tear
                
               him
               !
                
               Come
               ,
                
               brands
               ,
                
               ho
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               firebrands
               !
                
               To
                
               Brutus’
               ,
                
               to
                
               Cassius’
               ,
                
               burn
                
               all
               !
                
               Some
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               to
                
               Decius’
                
               house
               ,
                
               and
                
               some
                
               to
                
               Casca’s
               ,
                
               some
                
               to
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ligarius’
               .
                
               Away
               ,
                
               go
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         All
          
         the
          
         Plebeians
          
         exit
         ,
          
         carrying
          
         off
          
         Cinna
         .
         
         
      </div>
      
   </div>
   
   <br></br>
   
   <div class="milestone page"> </div>
   
   <span class="hr"> </span>
   <span class="pageimage">
      <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-141.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-141.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
         <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-141.jpg" class="display"></img>
      </a>
   </span>
   
   <div class="act doublespace ">
      
      <h4>
         ACT
          
         4
         
      </h4>
      
      <div class="scene ">
         
         <h4>
            Scene
             
            1
            
         </h4>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Antony
         ,
          
         Octavius
         ,
          
         and
          
         Lepidus
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               These
                
               many
               ,
                
               then
               ,
                
               shall
                
               die
               ;
                
               their
                
               names
                
               are
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               pricked
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               OCTAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Your
                
               brother
                
               too
                
               must
                
               die
               .
                
               Consent
                
               you
               ,
                
               Lepidus
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LEPIDUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               do
                
               consent
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               OCTAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Prick
                
               him
                
               down
               ,
                
               Antony
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LEPIDUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Upon
                
               condition
                
               Publius
                
               shall
                
               not
                
               live
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Who
                
               is
                
               your
                
               sister’s
                
               son
               ,
                
               Mark
                
               Antony
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               shall
                
               not
                
               live
               ;
                
               look
               ,
                
               with
                
               a
                
               spot
                
               I
                
               damn
                
               him
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
               ,
                
               Lepidus
               ,
                
               go
                
               you
                
               to
                
               Caesar’s
                
               house
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Fetch
                
               the
                
               will
                
               hither
               ,
                
               and
                
               we
                
               shall
                
               determine
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               How
                
               to
                
               cut
                
               off
                
               some
                
               charge
                
               in
                
               legacies
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LEPIDUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
               ,
                
               shall
                
               I
                
               find
                
               you
                
               here
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               OCTAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Or
                
               here
               ,
                
               or
                
               at
                
               the
                
               Capitol
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         Lepidus
          
         exits
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               This
                
               is
                
               a
                
               slight
               ,
                
               unmeritable
                
               man
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Meet
                
               to
                
               be
                
               sent
                
               on
                
               errands
               .
                
               Is
                
               it
                
               fit
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               threefold
                
               world
                
               divided
               ,
                
               he
                
               should
                
               stand
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               One
                
               of
                
               the
                
               three
                
               to
                
               share
                
               it
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-143.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-143.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-143.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 4. SC. 1</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               OCTAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               you
                
               thought
                
               him
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               took
                
               his
                
               voice
                
               who
                
               should
                
               be
                
               pricked
                
               to
                
               die
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               In
                
               our
                
               black
                
               sentence
                
               and
                
               proscription
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Octavius
               ,
                
               I
                
               have
                
               seen
                
               more
                
               days
                
               than
                
               you
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
               ,
                
               though
                
               we
                
               lay
                
               these
                
               honors
                
               on
                
               this
                
               man
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               ease
                
               ourselves
                
               of
                
               diverse
                
               sland’rous
                
               loads
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               shall
                
               but
                
               bear
                
               them
                
               as
                
               the
                
               ass
                
               bears
                
               gold
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               groan
                
               and
                
               sweat
                
               under
                
               the
                
               business
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Either
                
               led
                
               or
                
               driven
               ,
                
               as
                
               we
                
               point
                
               the
                
               way
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               having
                
               brought
                
               our
                
               treasure
                
               where
                
               we
                
               will
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Then
                
               take
                
               we
                
               down
                
               his
                
               load
                
               and
                
               turn
                
               him
                
               off
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               (
               Like
                
               to
                
               the
                
               empty
                
               ass
               )
                
               to
                
               shake
                
               his
                
               ears
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               graze
                
               in
                
               commons
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               OCTAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               may
                
               do
                
               your
                
               will
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               he’s
                
               a
                
               tried
                
               and
                
               valiant
                
               soldier
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               is
                
               my
                
               horse
               ,
                
               Octavius
               ,
                
               and
                
               for
                
               that
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               do
                
               appoint
                
               him
                
               store
                
               of
                
               provender
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               is
                
               a
                
               creature
                
               that
                
               I
                
               teach
                
               to
                
               fight
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               wind
               ,
                
               to
                
               stop
               ,
                
               to
                
               run
                
               directly
                
               on
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               His
                
               corporal
                
               motion
                
               governed
                
               by
                
               my
                
               spirit
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
               ,
                
               in
                
               some
                
               taste
               ,
                
               is
                
               Lepidus
                
               but
                
               so
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               must
                
               be
                
               taught
                
               and
                
               trained
                
               and
                
               bid
                
               go
                
               forth
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               A
                
               barren-spirited
                
               fellow
               ,
                
               one
