               that
                
               feeds
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               On
                
               objects
               ,
                
               arts
               ,
                
               and
                
               imitations
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Which
               ,
                
               out
                
               of
                
               use
                
               and
                
               staled
                
               by
                
               other
                
               men
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Begin
                
               his
                
               fashion
               .
                
               Do
                
               not
                
               talk
                
               of
                
               him
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               as
                
               a
                
               property
               .
                
               And
                
               now
               ,
                
               Octavius
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Listen
                
               great
                
               things
               .
                
               Brutus
                
               and
                
               Cassius
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Are
                
               levying
                
               powers
               .
                
               We
                
               must
                
               straight
                
               make
                
               head
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Therefore
                
               let
                
               our
                
               alliance
                
               be
                
               combined
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Our
                
               best
                
               friends
                
               made
               ,
                
               our
                
               means
                
               stretched
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               let
                
               us
                
               presently
                
               go
                
               sit
                
               in
                
               council
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               How
                
               covert
                
               matters
                
               may
                
               be
                
               best
                
               disclosed
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               open
                
               perils
                
               surest
                
               answerèd
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-145.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-145.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-145.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 4. SC. 2</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               OCTAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let
                
               us
                
               do
                
               so
               ,
                
               for
                
               we
                
               are
                
               at
                
               the
                
               stake
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               bayed
                
               about
                
               with
                
               many
                
               enemies
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               some
                
               that
                
               smile
                
               have
                
               in
                
               their
                
               hearts
               ,
                
               I
                
               fear
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Millions
                
               of
                
               mischiefs
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         They
          
         exit
         .
         
         
      </div>
      
      <div class="scene ">
         
         <h4>
            Scene
             
            2
            
         </h4>
         
         <br></br>
         
         
         Drum
         .
         
          
         Enter
          
         Brutus
         ,
          
         Lucilius
         ,
          
         Lucius
         ,
          
         and
          
         the
          
         Army
         .
         
         <br></br>
         Titinius
          
         and
          
         Pindarus
          
         meet
          
         them
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Stand
                
               ho
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCILIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Give
                
               the
                
               word
               ,
                
               ho
               ,
                
               and
                
               stand
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               now
               ,
                
               Lucilius
               ,
                
               is
                
               Cassius
                
               near
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCILIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               is
                
               at
                
               hand
               ,
                
               and
                
               Pindarus
                
               is
                
               come
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               do
                
               you
                
               salutation
                
               from
                
               his
                
               master
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               greets
                
               me
                
               well
               .
               —
               Your
                
               master
               ,
                
               Pindarus
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               In
                
               his
                
               own
                
               change
                
               or
                
               by
                
               ill
                
               officers
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hath
                
               given
                
               me
                
               some
                
               worthy
                
               cause
                
               to
                
               wish
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Things
                
               done
                
               undone
               ,
                
               but
                
               if
                
               he
                
               be
                
               at
                
               hand
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               shall
                
               be
                
               satisfied
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PINDARUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               do
                
               not
                
               doubt
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               that
                
               my
                
               noble
                
               master
                
               will
                
               appear
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Such
                
               as
                
               he
                
               is
               ,
                
               full
                
               of
                
               regard
                
               and
                
               honor
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               is
                
               not
                
               doubted
               .
               
               Brutus
                
               and
                
               Lucilius
                
               walk
                
               aside
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               A
                
               word
               ,
                
               Lucilius
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               How
                
               he
                
               received
                
               you
               .
                
               Let
                
               me
                
               be
                
               resolved
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCILIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               With
                
               courtesy
                
               and
                
               with
                
               respect
                
               enough
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               not
                
               with
                
               such
                
               familiar
                
               instances
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Nor
                
               with
                
               such
                
               free
                
               and
                
               friendly
                
               conference
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               he
                
               hath
                
               used
                
               of
                
               old
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-147.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-147.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-147.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 4. SC. 2</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thou
                
               hast
                
               described
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               A
                
               hot
                
               friend
                
               cooling
               .
                
               Ever
                
               note
               ,
                
               Lucilius
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               When
                
               love
                
               begins
                
               to
                
               sicken
                
               and
                
               decay
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               useth
                
               an
                
               enforcèd
                
               ceremony
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               There
                
               are
                
               no
                
               tricks
                
               in
                
               plain
                
               and
                
               simple
                
               faith
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               hollow
                
               men
               ,
                
               like
                
               horses
                
               hot
                
               at
                
               hand
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Make
                
               gallant
                
               show
                
               and
                
               promise
                
               of
                
               their
                
               mettle
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               
               Low
                
               march
                
               within
               .
               
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               when
                
               they
                
               should
                
               endure
                
               the
                
               bloody
                
               spur
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               They
                
               fall
                
               their
                
               crests
                
               and
               ,
                
               like
                
               deceitful
                
               jades
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Sink
                
               in
                
               the
                
               trial
               .
                
               Comes
                
               his
                
               army
                
               on
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCILIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               They
                
               mean
                
               this
                
               night
                
               in
                
               Sardis
                
               to
                
               be
                
               quartered
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               greater
                
               part
               ,
                
               the
                
               horse
                
               in
                
               general
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Are
                
               come
                
               with
                
               Cassius
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Cassius
          
         and
          
         his
          
         powers
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hark
               ,
                
               he
                
               is
                
               arrived
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               March
                
               gently
                
               on
                
               to
                
               meet
                
               him
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Stand
                
               ho
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Stand
                
               ho
               !
                
               Speak
                
               the
                
               word
                
               along
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FIRST
                
               SOLDIER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Stand
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SECOND
                
               SOLDIER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Stand
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               THIRD
                
               SOLDIER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Stand
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Most
                
               noble
                
               brother
               ,
                
               you
                
               have
                
               done
                
               me
                
               wrong
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Judge
                
               me
               ,
                
               you
                
               gods
               !
                
               Wrong
                
               I
                
               mine
                
               enemies
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               if
                
               not
                
               so
               ,
                
               how
                
               should
                
               I
                
               wrong
                
               a
                
               brother
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Brutus
               ,
                
               this
                
               sober
                
               form
                
               of
                
               yours
                
               hides
                
               wrongs
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               when
                
               you
                
               do
                
               them
               —
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Cassius
               ,
                
               be
                
               content
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Speak
                
               your
                
               griefs
                
               softly
               .
                
               I
                
               do
                
               know
                
               you
                
               well
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Before
                
               the
                
               eyes
                
               of
                
               both
                
               our
                
               armies
                
               here
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               (
               Which
                
               should
                
               perceive
                
               nothing
                
               but
                
               love
                
               from
                
               us
               )
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-149.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-149.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-149.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 4. SC. 3</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let
                
               us
                
               not
                
               wrangle
               .
                
               Bid
                
               them
                
               move
                
               away
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Then
                
               in
                
               my
                
               tent
               ,
                
               Cassius
               ,
                
               enlarge
                
               your
                
               griefs
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               I
                
               will
                
               give
                
               you
                
               audience
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Pindarus
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Bid
                
               our
                
               commanders
                
               lead
                
               their
                
               charges
                
               off
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               A
                
               little
                
               from
                
               this
                
               ground
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Lucius
               ,
                
               do
                
               you
                
               the
                
               like
               ,
                
               and
                
               let
                
               no
                
               man
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Come
                
               to
                
               our
                
               tent
                
               till
                
               we
                
               have
                
               done
                
               our
                
               conference
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let
                
               Lucilius
                
               and
                
               Titinius
                
               guard
                
               our
                
               door
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         All
          
         but
          
         Brutus
          
         and
          
         Cassius
          
         exit
         .
         
         
      </div>
      
      <div class="scene ">
         
         <h4>
            Scene
             
            3
            
         </h4>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               you
                
               have
                
               wronged
                
               me
                
               doth
                
               appear
                
               in
                
               this
               :
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               have
                
               condemned
                
               and
                
               noted
                
               Lucius
                
               Pella
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               taking
                
               bribes
                
               here
                
               of
                
               the
                
               Sardians
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Wherein
                
               my
                
               letters
               ,
                
               praying
                
               on
                
               his
                
               side
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Because
                
               I
                
               knew
                
               the
                
               man
               ,
                
               was
                
               slighted
                
               off
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               wronged
                
               yourself
                
               to
                
               write
                
               in
                
               such
                
               a
                
               case
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               In
                
               such
                
               a
                
               time
                
               as
                
               this
                
               it
                
               is
                
               not
                
               meet
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               every
                
               nice
                
               offense
                
               should
                
               bear
                
               his
                
               comment
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let
                
               me
                
               tell
                
               you
               ,
                
               Cassius
               ,
                
               you
                
               yourself
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Are
                
               much
                
               condemned
                
               to
                
               have
                
               an
                
               itching
                
               palm
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               sell
                
               and
                
               mart
                
               your
                
               offices
                
               for
                
               gold
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               undeservers
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               an
                
               itching
                
               palm
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               know
                
               that
                
               you
                
               are
                
               Brutus
                
               that
                
               speaks
                
               this
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Or
               ,
                
               by
                
               the
                
               gods
               ,
                
               this
                
               speech
                
               were
                
               else
                
               your
                
               last
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               name
                
               of
                
               Cassius
                
               honors
                
               this
                
               corruption
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               chastisement
                
               doth
                
               therefore
                
               hide
                
               his
                
               head
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-151.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-151.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-151.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 4. SC. 3</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Chastisement
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Remember
                
               March
               ;
                
               the
                
               ides
                
               of
                
               March
                
               remember
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Did
                
               not
                
               great
                
               Julius
                
               bleed
                
               for
                
               justice’
                
               sake
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               villain
                
               touched
                
               his
                
               body
                
               that
                
               did
                
               stab
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               not
                
               for
                
               justice
               ?
                
               What
               ,
                
               shall
                
               one
                
               of
                
               us
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               struck
                
               the
                
               foremost
                
               man
                
               of
                
               all
                
               this
                
               world
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               for
                
               supporting
                
               robbers
               ,
                
               shall
                
               we
                
               now
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Contaminate
                
               our
                
               fingers
                
               with
                
               base
                
               bribes
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               sell
                
               the
                
               mighty
                
               space
                
               of
                
               our
                
               large
                
               honors
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               so
                
               much
                
               trash
                
               as
                
               may
                
               be
                
               graspèd
                
               thus
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               had
                
               rather
                
               be
                
               a
                
               dog
                
               and
                
               bay
                
               the
                
               moon
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Than
                
               such
                
               a
                
               Roman
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Brutus
               ,
                
               bait
                
               not
                
               me
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I’ll
                
               not
                
               endure
                
               it
               .
                
               You
                
               forget
                
               yourself
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               hedge
                
               me
                
               in
               .
                
               I
                
               am
                
               a
                
               soldier
               ,
                
               I
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Older

               <h6 class="fw">ACT 4. SC. 3</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>

               and

               <h6 class="fw">ACT 4. SC. 3</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Which
                
               I
                
               respect
                
               not
               .
                
               I
                
               did
                
               send
                
               to
                
               you
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               certain

               of
                
               gold
               ,
                
               which
                
               you
                
               denied
                
               me
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               I
                
               can
                
               raise
                
               no
                
               money
                
               by
                
               vile
                
               means
               .
               
               <br></br>

               By
                
               heaven
               ,
                
               I
                
               had
                
               rather
                
               coin
                
               my
                
               heart
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               drop
                
               my
                
               blood
                
               for
                
               drachmas
                
               than
                
               to
                
               wring
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               From
                
               the
                
               hard
                
               hands
                
               of
                
               peasants
                
               their
                
               vile
                
               trash
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               By
                
               any
                
               indirection
               .
                
               I
                
               did
                
               send
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               you
                
               for
                
               gold
                
               to
                
               pay
                
               my
                
               legions
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Which
                
               you
                
               denied
                
               me
               .
                
               Was
                
               that
                
               done
                
               like
                
               Cassius
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Should
                
               I
                
               have
                
               answered
                
               Caius
                
               Cassius
                
               so
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               When
                
               Marcus
                
               Brutus
                
               grows
                
               so
                
               covetous
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               lock
                
               such
                
               rascal
                
               counters
                
               from
                
               his
                
               friends
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Be
                
               ready
               ,
                
               gods
               ,
                
               with
                
               all
                
               your
                
               thunderbolts
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Dash
                
               him
                
               to
                
               pieces
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>

               CASSIUS

               You

         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">

               Come
               ,
                
               Antony

               Octavius
               ,

               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Revenge

               on
                
               Cassius
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               Cassius
                
               is
                
               aweary
                
               of
                
               the
                
               world
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hated
                
               by
                
               one
                
               he
                
               loves
               ,
                
               braved
                
               by
                
               his
                
               brother
               ,

               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-157.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-157.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-157.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 4. SC. 3</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Checked
                
               like
                
               a
                
               bondman
               ,
                
               all
                
               his
                
               faults
                
               observed
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Set
                
               in
                
               a
                
               notebook
               ,
                
               learned
                
               and
                
               conned
                
               by
                
               rote
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               cast
                
               into
                
               my
                
               teeth
               .
                
               O
               ,
                
               I
                
               could
                
               weep
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               My
                
               spirit
                
               from
                
               mine
                
               eyes
               !
                
               There
                
               is
                
               my
                
               dagger
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               Offering
                
               his
                
               dagger
                
               to
                
               Brutus
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               here
                
               my
                
               naked
                
               breast
               ;
                
               within
               ,
                
               a
                
               heart
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Dearer
                
               than
                
               Pluto’s
                
               mine
               ,
                
               richer
                
               than
                
               gold
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               that
                
               thou
                
               be’st
                
               a
                
               Roman
               ,
                
               take
                
               it
                
               forth
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               that
                
               denied
                
               thee
                
               gold
                
               will
                
               give
                
               my
                
               heart
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Strike
                
               as
                
               thou
                
               didst
                
               at
                
               Caesar
               ,
                
               for
                
               I
                
               know
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               When
                
               thou
                
               didst
                
               hate
                
               him
                
               worst
               ,
                
               thou
                
               lovedst
                
               him
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               better
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Than
                
               ever
                
               thou
                
               lovedst
                
               Cassius
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Sheathe
                
               your
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               dagger
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Be
                
               angry
                
               when
                
               you
                
               will
               ,
                
               it
                
               shall
                
               have
                
               scope
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Do
                
               what
                
               you
                
               will
               ,
                
               dishonor
                
               shall
                
               be
                
               humor
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               Cassius
               ,
                
               you
                
               are
                
               yokèd
                
               with
                
               a
                
               lamb
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               carries
                
               anger
                
               as
                
               the
                
               flint
                
               bears
                
               fire
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Who
               ,
                
               much
                
               enforcèd
               ,
                
               shows
                
               a
                
               hasty
                
               spark
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               straight
                
               is
                
               cold
                
               again
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hath
                
               Cassius
                
               lived
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               be
                
               but
                
               mirth
                
               and
                
               laughter
                
               to
                
               his
                
               Brutus
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               When
                
               grief
                
               and
                
               blood
                
               ill-tempered
                
               vexeth
                
               him
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               When
                
               I
                
               spoke
                
               that
               ,
                
               I
                
               was
                
               ill-tempered
                
               too
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Do
                
               you
                
               confess
                
               so
                
               much
               ?
                
               Give
                
               me
                
               your
                
               hand
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               my
                
               heart
                
               too
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         They
          
         clasp
          
         hands
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               Brutus
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What’s
                
               the
                
               matter
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Have
                
               not
                
               you
                
               love
                
               enough
                
               to
                
               bear
                
               with
                
               me
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               When
                
               that
                
               rash
                
               humor
                
               which
                
               my
                
               mother
                
               gave
                
               me
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Makes
                
               me
                
               forgetful
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-159.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-159.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-159.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 4. SC. 3</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yes
               ,
                
               Cassius
               ,
                
               and
                
               from
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               henceforth
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               When
                
               you
                
               are
                
               over-earnest
                
               with
                
               your
                
               Brutus
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He’ll
                
               think
                
               your
                
               mother
                
               chides
               ,
                
               and
                
               leave
                
               you
                
               so
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         a
          
         Poet
          
         followed
          
         by
          
         Lucilius
         ,
          
         Titinius
         ,
          
         and
          
         Lucius
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               POET
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let
                
               me
                
               go
                
               in
                
               to
                
               see
                
               the
                
               Generals
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               There
                
               is
                
               some
                
               grudge
                
               between
                
               ’em
               ;
                
               ’tis
                
               not
                
               meet
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               They
                
               be
                
               alone
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCILIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               shall
                
               not
                
               come
                
               to
                
               them
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               POET
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Nothing
                
               but
                
               death
                
               shall
                
               stay
                
               me
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               How
                
               now
               ,
                
               what’s
                
               the
                
               matter
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               POET
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               shame
               ,
                
               you
                
               generals
               ,
                
               what
                
               do
                
               you
                
               mean
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Love
                
               and
                
               be
                
               friends
                
               as
                
               two
                
               such
                
               men
                
               should
                
               be
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               I
                
               have
                
               seen
                
               more
                
               years
               ,
                
               I’m
                
               sure
               ,
                
               than
                
               ye
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ha
               ,
                
               ha
               ,
                
               how
