               vilely
                
               doth
                
               this
                
               cynic
                
               rhyme
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Get
                
               you
                
               hence
               ,
                
               sirrah
               !
                
               Saucy
                
               fellow
               ,
                
               hence
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Bear
                
               with
                
               him
               ,
                
               Brutus
               .
                
               ’Tis
                
               his
                
               fashion
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I’ll
                
               know
                
               his
                
               humor
                
               when
                
               he
                
               knows
                
               his
                
               time
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               should
                
               the
                
               wars
                
               do
                
               with
                
               these
                
               jigging
                
               fools
               ?
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Companion
               ,
                
               hence
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Away
               ,
                
               away
               ,
                
               be
                
               gone
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         Poet
          
         exits
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Lucilius
                
               and
                
               Titinius
               ,
                
               bid
                
               the
                
               commanders
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Prepare
                
               to
                
               lodge
                
               their
                
               companies
                
               tonight
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               come
                
               yourselves
               ,
                
               and
                
               bring
                
               Messala
                
               with
                
               you
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Immediately
                
               to
                
               us
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         Lucilius
          
         and
          
         Titinius
          
         exit
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Lucius
               ,
                
               a
                
               bowl
                
               of
                
               wine
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         Lucius
          
         exits
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-161.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-161.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-161.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 4. SC. 3</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               did
                
               not
                
               think
                
               you
                
               could
                
               have
                
               been
                
               so
                
               angry
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               Cassius
               ,
                
               I
                
               am
                
               sick
                
               of
                
               many
                
               griefs
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Of
                
               your
                
               philosophy
                
               you
                
               make
                
               no
                
               use
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               you
                
               give
                
               place
                
               to
                
               accidental
                
               evils
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               No
                
               man
                
               bears
                
               sorrow
                
               better
               .
                
               Portia
                
               is
                
               dead
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ha
               ?
                
               Portia
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               She
                
               is
                
               dead
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               How
                
               ’scaped
                
               I
                
               killing
                
               when
                
               I
                
               crossed
                
               you
                
               so
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               insupportable
                
               and
                
               touching
                
               loss
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Upon
                
               what
                
               sickness
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Impatient
                
               of
                
               my
                
               absence
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               grief
                
               that
                
               young
                
               Octavius
                
               with
                
               Mark
                
               Antony
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Have
                
               made
                
               themselves
                
               so
                
               strong
               —
               for
                
               with
                
               her
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               death
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               tidings
                
               came
               —
               with
                
               this
                
               she
                
               fell
                
               distract
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
               ,
                
               her
                
               attendants
                
               absent
               ,
                
               swallowed
                
               fire
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               died
                
               so
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Even
                
               so
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               you
                
               immortal
                
               gods
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Lucius
          
         with
          
         wine
          
         and
          
         tapers
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Speak
                
               no
                
               more
                
               of
                
               her
               .
               —
               Give
                
               me
                
               a
                
               bowl
                
               of
                
               wine
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               In
                
               this
                
               I
                
               bury
                
               all
                
               unkindness
               ,
                
               Cassius
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         He
          
         drinks
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               My
                
               heart
                
               is
                
               thirsty
                
               for
                
               that
                
               noble
                
               pledge
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Fill
               ,
                
               Lucius
               ,
                
               till
                
               the
                
               wine
                
               o’erswell
                
               the
                
               cup
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               cannot
                
               drink
                
               too
                
               much
                
               of
                
               Brutus’
                
               love
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         He
          
         drinks
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         Lucius
          
         exits
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Titinius
          
         and
          
         Messala
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-163.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-163.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-163.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 4. SC. 3</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Come
                
               in
               ,
                
               Titinius
               .
                
               Welcome
               ,
                
               good
                
               Messala
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Now
                
               sit
                
               we
                
               close
                
               about
                
               this
                
               taper
                
               here
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               call
                
               in
                
               question
                
               our
                
               necessities
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         They
          
         sit
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Portia
               ,
                
               art
                
               thou
                
               gone
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               No
                
               more
               ,
                
               I
                
               pray
                
               you
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Messala
               ,
                
               I
                
               have
                
               here
                
               receivèd
                
               letters
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               young
                
               Octavius
                
               and
                
               Mark
                
               Antony
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Come
                
               down
                
               upon
                
               us
                
               with
                
               a
                
               mighty
                
               power
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Bending
                
               their
                
               expedition
                
               toward
                
               Philippi
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MESSALA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Myself
                
               have
                
               letters
                
               of
                
               the
                
               selfsame
                
               tenor
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               With
                
               what
                
               addition
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MESSALA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               by
                
               proscription
                
               and
                
               bills
                
               of
                
               outlawry
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Octavius
               ,
                
               Antony
               ,
                
               and
                
               Lepidus
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Have
                
               put
                
               to
                
               death
                
               an
                
               hundred
                
               senators
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Therein
                
               our
                
               letters
                
               do
                
               not
                
               well
                
               agree
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Mine
                
               speak
                
               of
                
               seventy
                
               senators
                
               that
                
               died
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               By
                
               their
                
               proscriptions
               ,
                
               Cicero
                
               being
                
               one
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Cicero
                
               one
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MESSALA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Cicero
                
               is
                
               dead
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               by
                
               that
                
               order
                
               of
                
               proscription
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Had
                
               you
                
               your
                
               letters
                
               from
                
               your
                
               wife
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               No
               ,
                
               Messala
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MESSALA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Nor
                
               nothing
                
               in
                
               your
                
               letters
                
               writ
                
               of
                
               her
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Nothing
               ,
                
               Messala
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MESSALA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               methinks
                
               is
                
               strange
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
                
               ask
                
               you
               ?
                
               Hear
                
               you
                
               aught
                
               of
                
               her
                
               in
                
               yours
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MESSALA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               No
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-165.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-165.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-165.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 4. SC. 3</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Now
               ,
                
               as
                
               you
                
               are
                
               a
                
               Roman
               ,
                
               tell
                
               me
                
               true
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MESSALA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Then
                
               like
                
               a
                
               Roman
                
               bear
                
               the
                
               truth
                
               I
                
               tell
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               certain
                
               she
                
               is
                
               dead
               ,
                
               and
                
               by
                
               strange
                
               manner
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
               ,
                
               farewell
               ,
                
               Portia
               .
                
               We
                
               must
                
               die
               ,
                
               Messala
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               With
                
               meditating
                
               that
                
               she
                
               must
                
               die
                
               once
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               have
                
               the
                
               patience
                
               to
                
               endure
                
               it
                
               now
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MESSALA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Even
                
               so
                
               great
                
               men
                
               great
                
               losses
                
               should
                
               endure
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               have
                
               as
                
               much
                
               of
                
               this
                
               in
                
               art
                
               as
                
               you
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               yet
                
               my
                
               nature
                
               could
                
               not
                
               bear
                
               it
                
               so
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Well
               ,
                
               to
                
               our
                
               work
                
               alive
               .
                
               What
                
               do
                
               you
                
               think
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Of
                
               marching
                
               to
                
               Philippi
                
               presently
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               do
                
               not
                
               think
                
               it
                
               good
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Your
                
               reason
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               This
                
               it
                
               is
               :
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               ’Tis
                
               better
                
               that
                
               the
                
               enemy
                
               seek
                
               us
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               shall
                
               he
                
               waste
                
               his
                
               means
               ,
                
               weary
                
               his
                
               soldiers
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Doing
                
               himself
                
               offense
               ,
                
               whilst
                
               we
               ,
                
               lying
                
               still
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Are
                
               full
                
               of
                
               rest
               ,
                
               defense
               ,
                
               and
                
               nimbleness
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Good
                
               reasons
                
               must
                
               of
                
               force
                
               give
                
               place
                
               to
                
               better
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               people
                
               ’twixt
                
               Philippi
                
               and
                
               this
                
               ground
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Do
                
               stand
                
               but
                
               in
                
               a
                
               forced
                
               affection
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               they
                
               have
                
               grudged
                
               us
                
               contribution
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               enemy
               ,
                
               marching
                
               along
                
               by
                
               them
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               By
                
               them
                
               shall
                
               make
                
               a
                
               fuller
                
               number
                
               up
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Come
                
               on
                
               refreshed
               ,
                
               new-added
               ,
                
               and
                
               encouraged
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               From
                
               which
                
               advantage
                
               shall
                
               we
                
               cut
                
               him
                
               off
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               at
                
               Philippi
                
               we
                
               do
                
               face
                
               him
                
               there
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               These
                
               people
                
               at
                
               our
                
               back
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hear
                
               me
               ,
                
               good
                
               brother
               —
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-167.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-167.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-167.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 4. SC. 3</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Under
                
               your
                
               pardon
               .
                
               You
                
               must
                
               note
                
               besides
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               we
                
               have
                
               tried
                
               the
                
               utmost
                
               of
                
               our
                
               friends
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Our
                
               legions
                
               are
                
               brim
                
               full
               ,
                
               our
                
               cause
                
               is
                
               ripe
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               enemy
                
               increaseth
                
               every
                
               day
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               We
               ,
                
               at
                
               the
                
               height
               ,
                
               are
                
               ready
                
               to
                
               decline
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               There
                
               is
                
               a
                
               tide
                
               in
                
               the
                
               affairs
                
               of
                
               men
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Which
               ,
                
               taken
                
               at
                
               the
                
               flood
               ,
                
               leads
                
               on
                
               to
                
               fortune
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Omitted
               ,
                
               all
                
               the
                
               voyage
                
               of
                
               their
                
               life
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Is
                
               bound
                
               in
                
               shallows
                
               and
                
               in
                
               miseries
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               On
                
               such
                
               a
                
               full
                
               sea
                
               are
                
               we
                
               now
                
               afloat
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               we
                
               must
                
               take
                
               the
                
               current
                
               when
                
               it
                
               serves
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Or
                
               lose
                
               our
                
               ventures
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Then
               ,
                
               with
                
               your
                
               will
               ,
                
               go
                
               on
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               We’ll
                
               along
                
               ourselves
                
               and
                
               meet
                
               them
                
               at
                
               Philippi
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               deep
                
               of
                
               night
                
               is
                
               crept
                
               upon
                
               our
                
               talk
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               nature
                
               must
                
               obey
                
               necessity
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Which
                
               we
                
               will
                
               niggard
                
               with
                
               a
                
               little
                
               rest
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               There
                
               is
                
               no
                
               more
                
               to
                
               say
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               No
                
               more
               .
                
               Good
                
               night
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               They
                
               stand
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Early
                
               tomorrow
                
               will
                
               we
                
               rise
                
               and
                
               hence
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Lucius
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <br></br>
               
               Enter
                
               Lucius
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               My
                
               gown
               .
               
               Lucius
                
               exits
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Farewell
               ,
                
               good
                
               Messala
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Good
                
               night
               ,
                
               Titinius
               .
               —
               Noble
               ,
                
               noble
                
               Cassius
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Good
                
               night
                
               and
                
               good
                
               repose
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               my
                
               dear
                
               brother
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               This
                
               was
                
               an
                
               ill
                
               beginning
                
               of
                
               the
                
               night
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Never
                
               come
                
               such
                
               division
                
               ’tween
                
               our
                
               souls
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let
                
               it
                
               not
               ,
                
               Brutus
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Lucius
          
         with
          
         the
          
         gown
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>

         <span class="hr"> </span>
