         <h6 class="fw">ACT 4. SC. 3</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Everything
                
               is
                
               well
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Good
                
               night
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Good
                
               night
               ,
                
               good
                
               brother
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               TITINIUS
               /
               MESSALA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Good
                
               night
               ,
                
               Lord
                
               Brutus
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Farewell
               ,
                
               everyone
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               All
                
               but
                
               Brutus
                
               and
                
               Lucius
                
               exit
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Give
                
               me
                
               the
                
               gown
               .
                
               Where
                
               is
                
               thy
                
               instrument
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Here
                
               in
                
               the
                
               tent
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
               ,
                
               thou
                
               speak’st
                
               drowsily
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Poor
                
               knave
               ,
                
               I
                
               blame
                
               thee
                
               not
               ;
                
               thou
                
               art
                
               o’erwatched
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Call
                
               Claudius
                
               and
                
               some
                
               other
                
               of
                
               my
                
               men
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I’ll
                
               have
                
               them
                
               sleep
                
               on
                
               cushions
                
               in
                
               my
                
               tent
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Varro
                
               and
                
               Claudius
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Varro
          
         and
          
         Claudius
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               VARRO
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Calls
                
               my
                
               lord
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               pray
                
               you
               ,
                
               sirs
               ,
                
               lie
                
               in
                
               my
                
               tent
                
               and
                
               sleep
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               may
                
               be
                
               I
                
               shall
                
               raise
                
               you
                
               by
                
               and
                
               by
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               On
                
               business
                
               to
                
               my
                
               brother
                
               Cassius
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               VARRO
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               please
                
               you
               ,
                
               we
                
               will
                
               stand
                
               and
                
               watch
                
               your
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               pleasure
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               will
                
               not
                
               have
                
               it
                
               so
               .
                
               Lie
                
               down
               ,
                
               good
                
               sirs
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               may
                
               be
                
               I
                
               shall
                
               otherwise
                
               bethink
                
               me
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               They
                
               lie
                
               down
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Look
               ,
                
               Lucius
               ,
                
               here’s
                
               the
                
               book
                
               I
                
               sought
                
               for
                
               so
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               put
                
               it
                
               in
                
               the
                
               pocket
                
               of
                
               my
                
               gown
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               was
                
               sure
                
               your
                
               lordship
                
               did
                
               not
                
               give
                
               it
                
               me
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Bear
                
               with
                
               me
               ,
                
               good
                
               boy
               ,
                
               I
                
               am
                
               much
                
               forgetful
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-171.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-171.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-171.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 4. SC. 3</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Canst
                
               thou
                
               hold
                
               up
                
               thy
                
               heavy
                
               eyes
                
               awhile
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               touch
                
               thy
                
               instrument
                
               a
                
               strain
                
               or
                
               two
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ay
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               ,
                
               an
                
               ’t
                
               please
                
               you
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               does
               ,
                
               my
                
               boy
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               trouble
                
               thee
                
               too
                
               much
               ,
                
               but
                
               thou
                
               art
                
               willing
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               is
                
               my
                
               duty
               ,
                
               sir
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               should
                
               not
                
               urge
                
               thy
                
               duty
                
               past
                
               thy
                
               might
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               know
                
               young
                
               bloods
                
               look
                
               for
                
               a
                
               time
                
               of
                
               rest
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               have
                
               slept
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               ,
                
               already
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               was
                
               well
                
               done
               ,
                
               and
                
               thou
                
               shalt
                
               sleep
                
               again
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               will
                
               not
                
               hold
                
               thee
                
               long
               .
                
               If
                
               I
                
               do
                
               live
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               will
                
               be
                
               good
                
               to
                
               thee
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               
               
               Music
                
               and
                
               a
                
               song
               .
               
               
                
               
               Lucius
                
               then
                
               falls
                
               asleep
               .
               
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               This
                
               is
                
               a
                
               sleepy
                
               tune
               .
                
               O
                
               murd’rous
                
               slumber
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Layest
                
               thou
                
               thy
                
               leaden
                
               mace
                
               upon
                
               my
                
               boy
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               plays
                
               thee
                
               music
               ?
               —
               Gentle
                
               knave
               ,
                
               good
                
               night
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               will
                
               not
                
               do
                
               thee
                
               so
                
               much
                
               wrong
                
               to
                
               wake
                
               thee
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               thou
                
               dost
                
               nod
               ,
                
               thou
                
               break’st
                
               thy
                
               instrument
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I’ll
                
               take
                
               it
                
               from
                
               thee
                
               and
               ,
                
               good
                
               boy
               ,
                
               good
                
               night
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               He
                
               moves
                
               the
                
               instrument
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let
                
               me
                
               see
               ,
                
               let
                
               me
                
               see
               ;
                
               is
                
               not
                
               the
                
               leaf
                
               turned
                
               down
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Where
                
               I
                
               left
                
               reading
               ?
                
               Here
                
               it
                
               is
               ,
                
               I
                
               think
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               How
                
               ill
                
               this
                
               taper
                
               burns
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <br></br>
               
               Enter
                
               the
                
               Ghost
                
               of
                
               Caesar
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ha
               ,
                
               who
                
               comes
                
               here
               ?
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               think
                
               it
                
               is
                
               the
                
               weakness
                
               of
                
               mine
                
               eyes
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               shapes
                
               this
                
               monstrous
                
               apparition
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               comes
                
               upon
                
               me
               .
               —
               Art
                
               thou
                
               any
                
               thing
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Art
                
               thou
                
               some
                
               god
               ,
                
               some
                
               angel
               ,
                
               or
                
               some
                
               devil
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               mak’st
                
               my
                
               blood
                
               cold
                
               and
                
               my
                
               hair
                
               to
                
               stare
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Speak
                
               to
                
               me
                
               what
                
               thou
                
               art
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-173.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-173.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-173.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 4. SC. 3</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               GHOST
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thy
                
               evil
                
               spirit
               ,
                
               Brutus
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
                
               com’st
                
               thou
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               GHOST
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               tell
                
               thee
                
               thou
                
               shalt
                
               see
                
               me
                
               at
                
               Philippi
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Well
               ,
                
               then
                
               I
                
               shall
                
               see
                
               thee
                
               again
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               GHOST
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ay
               ,
                
               at
                
               Philippi
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
               ,
                
               I
                
               will
                
               see
                
               thee
                
               at
                
               Philippi
               ,
                
               then
               .
               
               Ghost
                
               exits
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Now
                
               I
                
               have
                
               taken
                
               heart
               ,
                
               thou
                
               vanishest
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ill
                
               spirit
               ,
                
               I
                
               would
                
               hold
                
               more
                
               talk
                
               with
                
               thee
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Boy
               ,
                
               Lucius
               !
               —
               Varro
               ,
                
               Claudius
               ,
                
               sirs
               ,
                
               awake
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Claudius
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               strings
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               ,
                
               are
                
               false
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               thinks
                
               he
                
               still
                
               is
                
               at
                
               his
                
               instrument
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Lucius
               ,
                
               awake
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               My
                
               lord
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Didst
                
               thou
                
               dream
               ,
                
               Lucius
               ,
                
               that
                
               thou
                
               so
                
               criedst
                
               out
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               My
                
               lord
               ,
                
               I
                
               do
                
               not
                
               know
                
               that
                
               I
                
               did
                
               cry
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yes
               ,
                
               that
                
               thou
                
               didst
               .
                
               Didst
                
               thou
                
               see
                
               anything
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Nothing
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Sleep
                
               again
               ,
                
               Lucius
               .
               —
               Sirrah
                
               Claudius
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               
               To
                
               Varro
               .
                
               
               Fellow
                
               thou
               ,
                
               awake
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         They
          
         rise
          
         up
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               VARRO
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               My
                
               lord
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CLAUDIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               My
                
               lord
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
                
               did
                
               you
                
               so
                
               cry
                
               out
               ,
                
               sirs
               ,
                
               in
                
               your
                
               sleep
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BOTH
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Did
                
               we
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ay
               .
                
               Saw
                
               you
                
               anything
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               VARRO
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               No
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               ,
                
               I
                
               saw
                
               nothing
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-175.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-175.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-175.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 4. SC. 3</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CLAUDIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Nor
                
               I
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Go
                
               and
                
               commend
                
               me
                
               to
                
               my
                
               brother
                
               Cassius
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Bid
                
               him
                
               set
                
               on
                
               his
                
               powers
                
               betimes
                
               before
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               we
                
               will
                
               follow
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BOTH
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               shall
                
               be
                
               done
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         They
          
         exit
         .
         
         
      </div>
      
   </div>
   
   <br></br>
   
   <div class="milestone page"> </div>
   
   <span class="hr"> </span>
   <span class="pageimage">
      <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-179.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-179.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
         <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-179.jpg" class="display"></img>
      </a>
   </span>
   
   <div class="act doublespace ">
      
      <h4>
         ACT
          
         5
         
      </h4>
      
      <div class="scene ">
         
         <h4>
            Scene
             
            1
            
         </h4>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Octavius
         ,
          
         Antony
         ,
          
         and
          
         their
          
         army
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               OCTAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Now
               ,
                
               Antony
               ,
                
               our
                
               hopes
                
               are
                
               answerèd
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               said
                
               the
                
               enemy
                
               would
                
               not
                
               come
                
               down
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               keep
                
               the
                
               hills
                
               and
                
               upper
                
               regions
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               proves
                
               not
                
               so
               ;
                
               their
                
               battles
                
               are
                
               at
                
               hand
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               They
                
               mean
                
               to
                
               warn
                
               us
                
               at
                
               Philippi
                
               here
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Answering
                
               before
                
               we
                
               do
                
               demand
                
               of
                
               them
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Tut
               ,
                
               I
                
               am
                
               in
                
               their
                
               bosoms
               ,
                
               and
                
               I
                
               know
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Wherefore
                
               they
                
               do
                
               it
               .
                
               They
                
               could
                
               be
                
               content
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               visit
                
               other
                
               places
               ,
                
               and
                
               come
                
               down
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               With
                
               fearful
                
               bravery
               ,
                
               thinking
                
               by
                
               this
                
               face
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               fasten
                
               in
                
               our
                
               thoughts
                
               that
                
               they
                
               have
                
               courage
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               ’tis
                
               not
                
               so
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         a
          
         Messenger
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MESSENGER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Prepare
                
               you
               ,
                
               generals
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               enemy
                
               comes
                
               on
                
               in
                
               gallant
                
               show
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Their
                
               bloody
                
               sign
                
               of
                
               battle
                
               is
                
               hung
                
               out
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               something
                
               to
                
               be
                
               done
                
               immediately
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Octavius
               ,
                
               lead
                
               your
                
               battle
                
               softly
                
               on
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Upon
                
               the
                
               left
                
               hand
                
               of
                
               the
                
               even
                
               field
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-181.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-181.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-181.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 5. SC. 1</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               OCTAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Upon
                
               the
                
               right
                
               hand
               ,
                
               I
               ;
                
               keep
                
               thou
                
               the
                
               left
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
                
               do
                
               you
                
               cross
                
               me
                
               in
                
               this
                
               exigent
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               OCTAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               do
                
               not
                
               cross
                
               you
               ,
                
               but
                
               I
                
               will
                
               do
                
               so
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         
         March
         .
         
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         
         Drum
         .
         
          
         Enter
          
         Brutus
         ,
          
         Cassius
         ,
          
         and
          
         their
          
         army
          
         including
         
         <br></br>
         Lucilius
         ,
          
         Titinius
         ,
          
         and
          
         Messala
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               They
                
               stand
                
               and
                
               would
                
               have
                
               parley
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Stand
                
               fast
               ,
                
               Titinius
               .
                
               We
                
               must
                
               out
                
               and
                
               talk
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               OCTAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Mark
                
               Antony
               ,
                
               shall
                
               we
                
               give
                
               sign
                
               of
                
               battle
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               No
               ,
                
               Caesar
               ,
                
               we
                
               will
                
               answer
                
               on
                
               their
                
               charge
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Make
                
               forth
               .
                
               The
                
               Generals
                
               would
                
               have
                
               some
                
               words
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               OCTAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            ,
             
            to
             
            his
             
            Officers
            
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Stir
                
               not
                
               until
                
               the
                
               signal
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         The
          
         Generals
          
         step
          
         forward
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Words
                
               before
                
               blows
               ;
                
               is
                
               it
                
               so
               ,
                
               countrymen
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               OCTAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Not
                
               that
                
               we
                
               love
                
               words
                
               better
               ,
                
               as
                
               you
                
               do
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Good
                
               words
                
               are
                
               better
                
               than
                
               bad
                
               strokes
               ,
                
               Octavius
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               In
                
               your
                
               bad
                
               strokes
               ,
                
               Brutus
               ,
                
               you
                
               give
                
               good
                
               words
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Witness
                
               the
                
               hole
                
               you
                
               made
                
               in
                
               Caesar’s
                
               heart
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Crying
                
               
               <span class="inline_quote">
                  Long
                   
                  live
                  ,
                   
                  hail
                  ,
                   
                  Caesar
                  !
                  
               </span>
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Antony
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               posture
                
               of
                
               your
                
               blows
                
               are
                
               yet
                
               unknown
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
               ,
                
               for
                
               your
                
               words
               ,
                
               they
                
               rob
                
               the
                
               Hybla
                
               bees
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               leave
                
               them
                
               honeyless
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Not
                
               stingless
                
               too
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               yes
               ,
                
               and
                
               soundless
                
               too
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-183.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-183.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
