               <h6 class="fw">ACT 5. SC. 1</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               you
                
               have
                
               stolen
                
               their
                
               buzzing
               ,
                
               Antony
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               very
                
               wisely
                
               threat
                
               before
                
               you
                
               sting
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Villains
               ,
                
               you
                
               did
                
               not
                
               so
                
               when
                
               your
                
               vile
                
               daggers
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hacked
                
               one
                
               another
                
               in
                
               the
                
               sides
                
               of
                
               Caesar
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               showed
                
               your
                
               teeth
                
               like
                
               apes
                
               and
                
               fawned
                
               like
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               hounds
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               bowed
                
               like
                
               bondmen
               ,
                
               kissing
                
               Caesar’s
                
               feet
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Whilst
                
               damnèd
                
               Casca
               ,
                
               like
                
               a
                
               cur
               ,
                
               behind
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Struck
                
               Caesar
                
               on
                
               the
                
               neck
               .
                
               O
                
               you
                
               flatterers
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Flatterers
               ?
               —
               Now
               ,
                
               Brutus
               ,
                
               thank
                
               yourself
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               This
                
               tongue
                
               had
                
               not
                
               offended
                
               so
                
               today
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               Cassius
                
               might
                
               have
                
               ruled
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               OCTAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Come
               ,
                
               come
               ,
                
               the
                
               cause
               .
                
               If
                
               arguing
                
               make
                
               us
                
               sweat
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               proof
                
               of
                
               it
                
               will
                
               turn
                
               to
                
               redder
                
               drops
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Look
               ,
                
               I
                
               draw
                
               a
                
               sword
                
               against
                
               conspirators
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               He
                
               draws
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               When
                
               think
                
               you
                
               that
                
               the
                
               sword
                
               goes
                
               up
                
               again
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Never
               ,
                
               till
                
               Caesar’s
                
               three
                
               and
                
               thirty
                
               wounds
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Be
                
               well
                
               avenged
               ,
                
               or
                
               till
                
               another
                
               Caesar
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Have
                
               added
                
               slaughter
                
               to
                
               the
                
               sword
                
               of
                
               traitors
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caesar
               ,
                
               thou
                
               canst
                
               not
                
               die
                
               by
                
               traitors’
                
               hands
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Unless
                
               thou
                
               bring’st
                
               them
                
               with
                
               thee
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               OCTAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               I
                
               hope
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               was
                
               not
                
               born
                
               to
                
               die
                
               on
                
               Brutus’
                
               sword
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
               ,
                
               if
                
               thou
                
               wert
                
               the
                
               noblest
                
               of
                
               thy
                
               strain
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Young
                
               man
               ,
                
               thou
                
               couldst
                
               not
                
               die
                
               more
                
               honorable
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               A
                
               peevish
                
               schoolboy
               ,
                
               worthless
                
               of
                
               such
                
               honor
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Joined
                
               with
                
               a
                
               masker
                
               and
                
               a
                
               reveler
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Old
                
               Cassius
                
               still
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               OCTAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Come
               ,
                
               Antony
               ,
                
               away
               !
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-185.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-185.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">

                  </a>

               <h6 class="fw">ACT 5. SC. 1</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Defiance
               ,
                
               traitors
               ,
                
               hurl
                
               we
                
               in
                
               your
                
               teeth
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               you
                
               dare
                
               fight
                
               today
               ,
                
               come
                
               to
                
               the
                
               field
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               not
               ,
                
               when
                
               you
                
               have
                
               stomachs
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Octavius
         ,
          
         Antony
         ,
          
         and
          
         their
          
         army
          
         exit
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
                
               now
               ,
                
               blow
                
               wind
               ,
                
               swell
                
               billow
               ,
                
               and
                
               swim
                
               bark
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               storm
                
               is
                
               up
               ,
                
               and
                
               all
                
               is
                
               on
                
               the
                
               hazard
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ho
               ,
                
               Lucilius
               ,
                
               hark
               ,
                
               a
                
               word
                
               with
                
               you
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Lucilius
          
         and
          
         Messala
          
         stand
          
         forth
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCILIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               My
                
               lord
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Brutus
          
         and
          
         Lucilius
          
         step
          
         aside
          
         together
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Messala
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MESSALA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               says
                
               my
                
               general
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Messala
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               This
                
               is
                
               my
                
               birthday
               ,
                
               as
                
               this
                
               very
                
               day
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Was
                
               Cassius
                
               born
               .
                
               Give
                
               me
                
               thy
                
               hand
               ,
                
               Messala
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Be
                
               thou
                
               my
                
               witness
                
               that
                
               against
                
               my
                
               will
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               (
               As
                
               Pompey
                
               was
               )
                
               am
                
               I
                
               compelled
                
               to
                
               set
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Upon
                
               one
                
               battle
                
               all
                
               our
                
               liberties
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               know
                
               that
                
               I
                
               held
                
               Epicurus
                
               strong
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               his
                
               opinion
               .
                
               Now
                
               I
                
               change
                
               my
                
               mind
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               partly
                
               credit
                
               things
                
               that
                
               do
                
               presage
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Coming
                
               from
                
               Sardis
               ,
                
               on
                
               our
                
               former
                
               ensign
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Two
                
               mighty
                
               eagles
                
               fell
               ,
                
               and
                
               there
                
               they
                
               perched
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Gorging
                
               and
                
               feeding
                
               from
                
               our
                
               soldiers’
                
               hands
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Who
                
               to
                
               Philippi
                
               here
                
               consorted
                
               us
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               This
                
               morning
                
               are
                
               they
                
               fled
                
               away
                
               and
                
               gone
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               in
                
               their
                
               steads
                
               do
                
               ravens
               ,
                
               crows
               ,
                
               and
                
               kites
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Fly
                
               o’er
                
               our
                
               heads
                
               and
                
               downward
                
               look
                
               on
                
               us
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               we
                
               were
                
               sickly
                
               prey
               .
                
               Their
                
               shadows
                
               seem
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               A
                
               canopy
                
               most
                
               fatal
               ,
                
               under
                
               which
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Our
                
               army
                
               lies
               ,
                
               ready
                
               to
                
               give
                
               up
                
               the
                
               ghost
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MESSALA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Believe
                
               not
                
               so
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-187.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-187.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-187.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 5. SC. 1</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               but
                
               believe
                
               it
                
               partly
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               I
                
               am
                
               fresh
                
               of
                
               spirit
                
               and
                
               resolved
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               meet
                
               all
                
               perils
                
               very
                
               constantly
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Even
                
               so
               ,
                
               Lucilius
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         Brutus
          
         returns
          
         to
          
         Cassius
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Now
               ,
                
               most
                
               noble
                
               Brutus
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               gods
                
               today
                
               stand
                
               friendly
                
               that
                
               we
                
               may
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Lovers
                
               in
                
               peace
               ,
                
               lead
                
               on
                
               our
                
               days
                
               to
                
               age
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               since
                
               the
                
               affairs
                
               of
                
               men
                
               rests
                
               still
                
               incertain
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let’s
                
               reason
                
               with
                
               the
                
               worst
                
               that
                
               may
                
               befall
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               we
                
               do
                
               lose
                
               this
                
               battle
               ,
                
               then
                
               is
                
               this
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               very
                
               last
                
               time
                
               we
                
               shall
                
               speak
                
               together
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               are
                
               you
                
               then
                
               determinèd
                
               to
                
               do
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Even
                
               by
                
               the
                
               rule
                
               of
                
               that
                
               philosophy
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               By
                
               which
                
               I
                
               did
                
               blame
                
               Cato
                
               for
                
               the
                
               death
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Which
                
               he
                
               did
                
               give
                
               himself
                
               (
               I
                
               know
                
               not
                
               how
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               I
                
               do
                
               find
                
               it
                
               cowardly
                
               and
                
               vile
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               fear
                
               of
                
               what
                
               might
                
               fall
               ,
                
               so
                
               to
                
               prevent
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               time
                
               of
                
               life
               )
               ,
                
               arming
                
               myself
                
               with
                
               patience
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               stay
                
               the
                
               providence
                
               of
                
               some
                
               high
                
               powers
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               govern
                
               us
                
               below
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Then
               ,
                
               if
                
               we
                
               lose
                
               this
                
               battle
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               You
                
               are
                
               contented
                
               to
                
               be
                
               led
                
               in
                
               triumph
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thorough
                
               the
                
               streets
                
               of
                
               Rome
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               No
               ,
                
               Cassius
               ,
                
               no
               .
                
               Think
                
               not
               ,
                
               thou
                
               noble
                
               Roman
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               ever
                
               Brutus
                
               will
                
               go
                
               bound
                
               to
                
               Rome
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               bears
                
               too
                
               great
                
               a
                
               mind
               .
                
               But
                
               this
                
               same
                
               day
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Must
                
               end
                
               that
                
               work
                
               the
                
               ides
                
               of
                
               March
                
               begun
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               whether
                
               we
                
               shall
                
               meet
                
               again
               ,
                
               I
                
               know
                
               not
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Therefore
                
               our
                
               everlasting
                
               farewell
                
               take
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Forever
                
               and
                
               forever
                
               farewell
               ,
                
               Cassius
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               we
                
               do
                
               meet
                
               again
               ,
                
               why
                
               we
                
               shall
                
               smile
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               not
               ,
                
               why
                
               then
                
               this
                
               parting
                
               was
                
               well
                
               made
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">

         <h6 class="fw">ACT 5. SC. 3</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Forever
                
               and
                
               forever
                
               farewell
               ,
                
               Brutus
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               we
                
               do
                
               meet
                
               again
               ,
                
               we’ll
                
               smile
                
               indeed
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               If
                
               not
               ,
                
               ’tis
                
               true
                
               this
                
               parting
                
               was
                
               well
                
               made
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
                
               then
               ,
                
               lead
                
               on
               .
               —
               O
               ,
                
               that
                
               a
                
               man
                
               might
                
               know
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               end
                
               of
                
               this
                
               day’s
                
               business
                
               ere
                
               it
                
               come
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               it
                
               sufficeth
                
               that
                
               the
                
               day
                
               will
                
               end
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               then
                
               the
                
               end
                
               is
                
               known
               .
               —
               Come
                
               ho
               ,
                
               away
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         They
          
         exit
         .
         
         
      </div>
      
      <div class="scene ">
         
         <h4>
            Scene
             
            2
            
         </h4>
         
         <br></br>
         
         
         Alarum
         .
         
          
         Enter
          
         Brutus
          
         and
          
         Messala
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ride
               ,
                
               ride
               ,
                
               Messala
               ,
                
               ride
               ,
                
               and
                
               give
                
               these
                
               bills
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Unto
                
               the
                
               legions
                
               on
                
               the
                
               other
                
               side
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               He
                
               hands
                
               Messala
                
               papers
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               
               Loud
                
               alarum
               .
               
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Let
                
               them
                
               set
                
               on
                
               at
                
               once
               ,
                
               for
                
               I
                
               perceive
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               cold
                
               demeanor
                
               in
                
               Octavius’
                
               wing
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               sudden
                
               push
                
               gives
                
               them
                
               the
                
               overthrow
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ride
               ,
                
               ride
               ,
                
               Messala
               !
                
               Let
                
               them
                
               all
                
               come
                
               down
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         They
          
         exit
         .
         
         
      </div>
      
      <div class="scene ">
         
         <h4>
            Scene
             
            3
            
         </h4>
         
         <br></br>
         
         
         Alarums
         .
         
          
         Enter
          
         Cassius
          
         carrying
          
         a
          
         standard
          
         and
         
         <br></br>
         Titinius
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
               ,
                
               look
               ,
                
               Titinius
               ,
                
               look
               ,
                
               the
                
               villains
                
               fly
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Myself
                
               have
                
               to
                
               mine
                
               own
                
               turned
                
               enemy
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               This
                
               ensign
                
               here
                
               of
                
               mine
                
               was
                
               turning
                
               back
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               slew
                
               the
                
               coward
                
               and
                
               did
                
               take
                
               it
                
               from
                
               him
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-191.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-191.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">

         <h6 class="fw">ACT 5. SC. 3</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               TITINIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               Cassius
               ,
                
               Brutus
                
               gave
                
               the
                
               word
                
               too
                
               early
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Who
               ,
                
               having
                
               some
                
               advantage
                
               on
                
               Octavius
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Took
                
               it
                
               too
                
               eagerly
               .
                
               His
                
               soldiers
                
               fell
                
               to
                
               spoil
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Whilst
                
               we
                
               by
                
               Antony
                
               are
                
               all
                
               enclosed
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Pindarus
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PINDARUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Fly
                
               further
                
               off
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               ,
                
               fly
                
               further
                
               off
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Mark
                
               Antony
                
               is
                
               in
                
               your
                
               tents
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Fly
                
               therefore
               ,
                
               noble
                
               Cassius
               ,
                
               fly
                
               far
                
               off
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               This
                
               hill
                
               is
                
               far
                
               enough
               .
               —
               Look
               ,
                
               look
               ,
                
               Titinius
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Are
                
               those
                
               my
                
               tents
                
               where
                
               I
                
               perceive
                
               the
                
               fire
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               TITINIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               They
                
               are
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Titinius
               ,
                
               if
                
               thou
                
               lovest
                
               me
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Mount
                
               thou
                
               my
                
               horse
                
               and
                
               hide
                
               thy
                
               spurs
                
               in
                
               him
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Till
                
               he
                
               have
                
               brought
                
               thee
                
               up
                
               to
                
               yonder
                
               troops
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               here
                
               again
               ,
                
               that
                
               I
                
               may
                
               rest
                
               assured
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Whether
                
               yond
                
               troops
                
               are
                
               friend
                
               or
                
               enemy
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               TITINIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               will
                
               be
                
               here
                
               again
                
               even
                
               with
                
               a
                
               thought
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         He
          
         exits
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Go
               ,
                
               Pindarus
               ,
                
               get
                
               higher
                
               on
                
               that
                
               hill
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               My
                
               sight
                
               was
                
               ever
                
               thick
               .
                
               Regard
                
               Titinius
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               tell
                
               me
                
               what
                
               thou
                
               not’st
                
               about
                
               the
                
               field
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               Pindarus
                
               goes
                
               up
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               This
                
               day
                
               I
                
               breathèd
                
               first
               .
                
               Time
                
               is
                
               come
                
               round
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               where
                
               I
                
               did
                
               begin
               ,
                
               there
                
               shall
                
               I
                
               end
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               My
                
               life
                
               is
                
               run
                
               his
                
               compass
               .
               —
               Sirrah
               ,
                
               what
                
               news
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PINDARUS
                
            </div>
            
            ,
             
            above
            .
            
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               my
                
               lord
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               news
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PINDARUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Titinius
                
               is
                
               enclosèd
                
               round
                
               about
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-193.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-193.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-193.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 5. SC. 3</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               With
                
               horsemen
                
               that
                
               make
                
               to
                
               him
                
               on
                
               the
                
               spur
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yet
                
               he
                
               spurs
                
               on
               .
                
               Now
                
               they
                
               are
                
               almost
                
               on
                
               him
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Now
                
               Titinius
               !
                
               Now
                
               some
                
               light
               .
                
               O
               ,
                
               he
                
               lights
                
               too
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He’s
                
               ta’en
               .
               
               Shout
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               hark
               ,
                
               they
                
               shout
                
               for
                
               joy
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CASSIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Come
                
               down
               ,
                
               behold
                
               no
                
               more
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
               ,
                
               coward
                
               that
                
               I
                
               am
                
               to
                
               live
                
               so
                
               long
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               see
                
               my
                
               best
                
               friend
                
               ta’en
                
               before
                
               my
                
               face
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               Pindarus
                
               comes
                
               down
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Come
                
               hither
               ,
                
               sirrah
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               In
                
               Parthia
                
               did
                
               I
                
               take
                
               thee
                
               prisoner
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               then
                
               I
                
               swore
                
               thee
               ,
                
               saving
                
               of
                
               thy
                
               life
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               whatsoever
                
               I
                
               did
                
               bid
                
               thee
                
               do
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thou
                
               shouldst
                
               attempt
                
               it
               .
                
               Come
                
               now
               ,
                
               keep
                
               thine
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               oath
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Now
                
               be
                
               a
                
               freeman
               ,
                
               and
                
               with
                
               this
                
               good
                
               sword
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               ran
                
               through
                
               Caesar’s
                
               bowels
               ,
                
               search
                
               this
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               bosom
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Stand
                
               not
                
               to
                
               answer
               .
                
               Here
               ,
                
               take
                
               thou
                
               the
                
               hilts
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
               ,
                
               when
                
               my
                
               face
                
               is
                
               covered
               ,
                
               as
                
               ’tis
                
               now
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Guide
                
               thou
                
               the
                
               sword
               .
               
               Pindarus
                
               stabs
                
               him
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caesar
               ,
                
               thou
                
               art
                
               revenged
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Even
                
               with
                
               the
                
               sword
                
               that
                
               killed
                
               thee
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         He
          
         dies
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               PINDARUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               I
                
               am
                
               free
               ,
                
               yet
                
               would
                
               not
                
               so
                
               have
                
               been
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Durst
                
               I
                
               have
                
               done
                
               my
                
               will
               .
               —
               O
                
               Cassius
               !
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Far
                
               from
                
               this
                
               country
                
               Pindarus
                
               shall
                
               run
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Where
                
               never
                
               Roman
                
               shall
                
               take
                
               note
                
               of
                
               him
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         He
          
         exits
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Titinius
          
         and
          
         Messala
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MESSALA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               is
                
               but
                
               change
               ,
                
               Titinius
               ,
                
               for
                
               Octavius
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Is
                
               overthrown
                
               by
                
               noble
                
               Brutus’
                
               power
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               Cassius’
                
               legions
                
               are
                
               by
                
               Antony
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-195.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-195.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-195.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 5. SC. 3</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               TITINIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               These
                
               tidings
                
               will
                
               well
                
               comfort
                
               Cassius
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MESSALA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Where
                
               did
                
               you
                
               leave
                
               him
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
