            <div class="speaker">
               TITINIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               All
                
               disconsolate
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               With
                
               Pindarus
                
               his
                
               bondman
               ,
                
               on
                
               this
                
               hill
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MESSALA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Is
                
               not
                
               that
                
               he
                
               that
                
               lies
                
               upon
                
               the
                
               ground
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               TITINIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               lies
                
               not
                
               like
                
               the
                
               living
               .
                
               O
                
               my
                
               heart
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MESSALA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Is
                
               not
                
               that
                
               he
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               TITINIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               No
               ,
                
               this
                
               was
                
               he
               ,
                
               Messala
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               Cassius
                
               is
                
               no
                
               more
               .
                
               O
                
               setting
                
               sun
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               in
                
               thy
                
               red
                
               rays
                
               thou
                
               dost
                
               sink
                
               to
                
               night
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               in
                
               his
                
               red
                
               blood
                
               Cassius’
                
               day
                
               is
                
               set
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               sun
                
               of
                
               Rome
                
               is
                
               set
               .
                
               Our
                
               day
                
               is
                
               gone
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Clouds
               ,
                
               dews
               ,
                
               and
                
               dangers
                
               come
               .
                
               Our
                
               deeds
                
               are
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               done
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Mistrust
                
               of
                
               my
                
               success
                
               hath
                
               done
                
               this
                
               deed
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MESSALA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Mistrust
                
               of
                
               good
                
               success
                
               hath
                
               done
                
               this
                
               deed
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               hateful
                
               error
               ,
                
               melancholy’s
                
               child
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
                
               dost
                
               thou
                
               show
                
               to
                
               the
                
               apt
                
               thoughts
                
               of
                
               men
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               things
                
               that
                
               are
                
               not
               ?
                
               O
                
               error
               ,
                
               soon
                
               conceived
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thou
                
               never
                
               com’st
                
               unto
                
               a
                
               happy
                
               birth
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               kill’st
                
               the
                
               mother
                
               that
                
               engendered
                
               thee
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               TITINIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
               ,
                
               Pindarus
               !
                
               Where
                
               art
                
               thou
               ,
                
               Pindarus
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MESSALA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Seek
                
               him
               ,
                
               Titinius
               ,
                
               whilst
                
               I
                
               go
                
               to
                
               meet
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               noble
                
               Brutus
               ,
                
               thrusting
                
               this
                
               report
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Into
                
               his
                
               ears
               .
                
               I
                
               may
                
               say
                
               
               <span class="inline_quote">
                  thrusting
                   
                  it
                  ,
                  
               </span>
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               piercing
                
               steel
                
               and
                
               darts
                
               envenomèd
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Shall
                
               be
                
               as
                
               welcome
                
               to
                
               the
                
               ears
                
               of
                
               Brutus
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               As
                
               tidings
                
               of
                
               this
                
               sight
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-197.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-197.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-197.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 5. SC. 3</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               TITINIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hie
                
               you
               ,
                
               Messala
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               I
                
               will
                
               seek
                
               for
                
               Pindarus
                
               the
                
               while
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               Messala
                
               exits
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
                
               didst
                
               thou
                
               send
                
               me
                
               forth
               ,
                
               brave
                
               Cassius
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Did
                
               I
                
               not
                
               meet
                
               thy
                
               friends
               ,
                
               and
                
               did
                
               not
                
               they
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Put
                
               on
                
               my
                
               brows
                
               this
                
               wreath
                
               of
                
               victory
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               bid
                
               me
                
               give
                
               it
                
               thee
               ?
                
               Didst
                
               thou
                
               not
                
               hear
                
               their
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               shouts
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Alas
               ,
                
               thou
                
               hast
                
               misconstrued
                
               everything
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               But
                
               hold
                
               thee
               ,
                
               take
                
               this
                
               garland
                
               on
                
               thy
                
               brow
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               Laying
                
               the
                
               garland
                
               on
                
               Cassius’
                
               brow
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thy
                
               Brutus
                
               bid
                
               me
                
               give
                
               it
                
               thee
               ,
                
               and
                
               I
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Will
                
               do
                
               his
                
               bidding
               .
               —
               Brutus
               ,
                
               come
                
               apace
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               see
                
               how
                
               I
                
               regarded
                
               Caius
                
               Cassius
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               By
                
               your
                
               leave
               ,
                
               gods
               ,
                
               this
                
               is
                
               a
                
               Roman’s
                
               part
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Come
               ,
                
               Cassius’
                
               sword
               ,
                
               and
                
               find
                
               Titinius’
                
               heart
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         He
          
         dies
          
         on
          
         Cassius’
          
         sword
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         
         Alarum
         .
         
          
         Enter
          
         Brutus
         ,
          
         Messala
         ,
          
         young
          
         Cato
         ,
          
         Strato
         ,
         
         <br></br>
         Volumnius
         ,
          
         and
          
         Lucilius
         ,
          
         Labeo
         ,
          
         and
          
         Flavius
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Where
               ,
                
               where
               ,
                
               Messala
               ,
                
               doth
                
               his
                
               body
                
               lie
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MESSALA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Lo
               ,
                
               yonder
               ,
                
               and
                
               Titinius
                
               mourning
                
               it
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Titinius’
                
               face
                
               is
                
               upward
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CATO
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               is
                
               slain
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               Julius
                
               Caesar
               ,
                
               thou
                
               art
                
               mighty
                
               yet
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thy
                
               spirit
                
               walks
                
               abroad
                
               and
                
               turns
                
               our
                
               swords
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               In
                
               our
                
               own
                
               proper
                
               entrails
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         
         Low
          
         alarums
         .
         
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CATO
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Brave
                
               Titinius
               !
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Look
                
               whe’er
                
               he
                
               have
                
               not
                
               crowned
                
               dead
                
               Cassius
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Are
                
               yet
                
               two
                
               Romans
                
               living
                
               such
                
               as
                
               these
               ?
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               last
                
               of
                
               all
                
               the
                
               Romans
               ,
                
               fare
                
               thee
                
               well
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-199.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-199.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-199.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 5. SC. 4</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               is
                
               impossible
                
               that
                
               ever
                
               Rome
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Should
                
               breed
                
               thy
                
               fellow
               .
               —
               Friends
               ,
                
               I
                
               owe
                
               more
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               tears
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               this
                
               dead
                
               man
                
               than
                
               you
                
               shall
                
               see
                
               me
                
               pay
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               shall
                
               find
                
               time
               ,
                
               Cassius
               ;
                
               I
                
               shall
                
               find
                
               time
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Come
               ,
                
               therefore
               ,
                
               and
                
               to
                
               Thasos
                
               send
                
               his
                
               body
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               His
                
               funerals
                
               shall
                
               not
                
               be
                
               in
                
               our
                
               camp
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Lest
                
               it
                
               discomfort
                
               us
               .
               —
               Lucilius
               ,
                
               come
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               come
               ,
                
               young
                
               Cato
               .
                
               Let
                
               us
                
               to
                
               the
                
               field
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Labeo
                
               and
                
               Flavius
               ,
                
               set
                
               our
                
               battles
                
               on
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               ’Tis
                
               three
                
               o’clock
               ,
                
               and
               ,
                
               Romans
               ,
                
               yet
                
               ere
                
               night
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               We
                
               shall
                
               try
                
               fortune
                
               in
                
               a
                
               second
                
               fight
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         They
          
         exit
         .
         
         
      </div>
      
      <div class="scene ">
         
         <h4>
            Scene
             
            4
            
         </h4>
         
         <br></br>
         
         
         Alarum
         .
         
          
         Enter
          
         Brutus
         ,
          
         Messala
         ,
          
         Cato
         ,
          
         Lucilius
         ,
          
         and
         
         <br></br>
         Flavius
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yet
               ,
                
               countrymen
               ,
                
               O
               ,
                
               yet
                
               hold
                
               up
                
               your
                
               heads
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Brutus
         ,
          
         Messala
         ,
          
         and
          
         Flavius
          
         exit
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CATO
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               bastard
                
               doth
                
               not
               ?
                
               Who
                
               will
                
               go
                
               with
                
               me
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               will
                
               proclaim
                
               my
                
               name
                
               about
                
               the
                
               field
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               am
                
               the
                
               son
                
               of
                
               Marcus
                
               Cato
               ,
                
               ho
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               A
                
               foe
                
               to
                
               tyrants
                
               and
                
               my
                
               country’s
                
               friend
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               am
                
               the
                
               son
                
               of
                
               Marcus
                
               Cato
               ,
                
               ho
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         
         Enter
          
         Soldiers
         
          
         
         and
          
         fight
         .
         
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCILIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               I
                
               am
                
               Brutus
               ,
                
               Marcus
                
               Brutus
               ,
                
               I
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Brutus
               ,
                
               my
                
               country’s
                
               friend
               !
                
               Know
                
               me
                
               for
                
               Brutus
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               Cato
                
               is
                
               killed
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               young
                
               and
                
               noble
                
               Cato
               ,
                
               art
                
               thou
                
               down
               ?
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-201.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-201.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-201.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 5. SC. 4</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
               ,
                
               now
                
               thou
                
               diest
                
               as
                
               bravely
                
               as
                
               Titinius
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               mayst
                
               be
                
               honored
               ,
                
               being
                
               Cato’s
                
               son
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FIRST
                
               SOLDIER
                
            </div>
            
            ,
             
            seizing
             
            Lucilius
            
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Yield
               ,
                
               or
                
               thou
                
               diest
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCILIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Only
                
               I
                
               yield
                
               to
                
               die
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               There
                
               is
                
               so
                
               much
                
               that
                
               thou
                
               wilt
                
               kill
                
               me
                
               straight
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               Offering
                
               money
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Kill
                
               Brutus
                
               and
                
               be
                
               honored
                
               in
                
               his
                
               death
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FIRST
                
               SOLDIER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               We
                
               must
                
               not
               .
                
               A
                
               noble
                
               prisoner
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Antony
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               SECOND
                
               SOLDIER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Room
               ,
                
               ho
               !
                
               Tell
                
               Antony
                
               Brutus
                
               is
                
               ta’en
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               FIRST
                
               SOLDIER
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I’ll
                
               tell
                
               the
                
               news
               .
                
               Here
                
               comes
                
               the
                
               General
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Brutus
                
               is
                
               ta’en
               ,
                
               Brutus
                
               is
                
               ta’en
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Where
                
               is
                
               he
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCILIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Safe
               ,
                
               Antony
               ,
                
               Brutus
                
               is
                
               safe
                
               enough
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               dare
                
               assure
                
               thee
                
               that
                
               no
                
               enemy
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Shall
                
               ever
                
               take
                
               alive
                
               the
                
               noble
                
               Brutus
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               gods
                
               defend
                
               him
                
               from
                
               so
                
               great
                
               a
                
               shame
               !
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               When
                
               you
                
               do
                
               find
                
               him
               ,
                
               or
                
               alive
                
               or
                
               dead
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               will
                
               be
                
               found
                
               like
                
               Brutus
               ,
                
               like
                
               himself
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               This
                
               is
                
               not
                
               Brutus
               ,
                
               friend
               ,
                
               but
                
               I
                
               assure
                
               you
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               A
                
               prize
                
               no
                
               less
                
               in
                
               worth
               .
                
               Keep
                
               this
                
               man
                
               safe
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Give
                
               him
                
               all
                
               kindness
               .
                
               I
                
               had
                
               rather
                
               have
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Such
                
               men
                
               my
                
               friends
                
               than
                
               enemies
               .
                
               Go
                
               on
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               see
                
               whe’er
                
               Brutus
                
               be
                
               alive
                
               or
                
               dead
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               bring
                
               us
                
               word
                
               unto
                
               Octavius’
                
               tent
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               How
                
               everything
                
               is
                
               chanced
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         They
          
         exit
          
         in
          
         different
          
         directions
         .
         
         
      </div>
      
      <br></br>
      
      <div class="milestone page"> </div>
      
      <span class="hr"> </span>
      <span class="pageimage">
         <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-203.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-203.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
            <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-203.jpg" class="display"></img>
         </a>
      </span>
      
      <h6 class="fw">ACT 5. SC. 5</h6>
      
      <div class="scene ">
         
         <h4>
            Scene
             
            5
            
         </h4>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Enter
          
         Brutus
         ,
          
         Dardanus
         ,
          
         Clitus
         ,
          
         Strato
         ,
          
         and
          
         Volumnius
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Come
               ,
                
               poor
                
               remains
                
               of
                
               friends
               ,
                
               rest
                
               on
                
               this
                
               rock
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         He
          
         sits
          
         down
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CLITUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Statilius
                
               showed
                
               the
                
               torchlight
               ,
                
               but
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               came
                
               not
                
               back
               .
                
               He
                
               is
                
               or
                
               ta’en
                
               or
                
               slain
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Sit
                
               thee
                
               down
               ,
                
               Clitus
               .
                
               Slaying
                
               is
                
               the
                
               word
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               is
                
               a
                
               deed
                
               in
                
               fashion
               .
                
               Hark
                
               thee
               ,
                
               Clitus
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         He
          
         whispers
          
         to
          
         Clitus
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CLITUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
               ,
                
               I
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               ?
                
               No
               ,
                
               not
                
               for
                
               all
                
               the
                
               world
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Peace
               ,
                
               then
               ,
                
               no
                
               words
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CLITUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I’ll
                
               rather
                
               kill
                
               myself
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hark
                
               thee
               ,
                
               Dardanus
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         He
          
         whispers
          
         to
          
         Dardanus
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               DARDANUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Shall
                
               I
                
               do
                
               such
                
               a
                
               deed
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CLITUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               Dardanus
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               DARDANUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               O
                
               Clitus
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         Dardanus
          
         and
          
         Clitus
          
         step
          
         aside
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CLITUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               ill
                
               request
                
               did
                
               Brutus
                
               make
                
               to
                
               thee
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               DARDANUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               kill
                
               him
               ,
                
               Clitus
               .
                
               Look
               ,
                
               he
                
               meditates
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CLITUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Now
                
               is
                
               that
                
               noble
                
               vessel
                
               full
                
               of
                
               grief
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               it
                
               runs
                
               over
                
               even
                
               at
                
               his
                
               eyes
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Come
                
               hither
               ,
                
               good
                
               Volumnius
               .
                
               List
                
               a
                
               word
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               VOLUMNIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               says
                
               my
                
               lord
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Why
                
               this
               ,
                
               Volumnius
               :
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-205.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-205.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-205.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 5. SC. 5</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               ghost
                
               of
                
               Caesar
                
               hath
                
               appeared
                
               to
                
               me
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Two
                
               several
                
               times
                
               by
                
               night
               —
               at
                
               Sardis
                
               once
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               this
                
               last
                
               night
                
               here
                
               in
                
               Philippi
                
               fields
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               know
                
               my
                
               hour
                
               is
                
               come
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               VOLUMNIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Not
                
               so
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Nay
               ,
                
               I
                
               am
                
               sure
                
               it
                
               is
               ,
                
               Volumnius
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thou
                
               seest
                
               the
                
               world
               ,
                
               Volumnius
               ,
                
               how
                
               it
                
               goes
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Our
                
               enemies
                
               have
                
               beat
                
               us
                
               to
                
               the
                
               pit
               .
               
               
               Low
                
               alarums
               .
               
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               It
                
               is
                
               more
                
               worthy
                
               to
                
               leap
                
               in
                
               ourselves
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Than
                
               tarry
                
               till
                
               they
                
               push
                
               us
               .
                
               Good
                
               Volumnius
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thou
                
               know’st
                
               that
                
               we
                
               two
                
               went
                
               to
                
               school
                
               together
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Even
                
               for
                
               that
                
               our
                
               love
                
               of
                
               old
               ,
                
               I
                
               prithee
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hold
                
               thou
                
               my
                
               sword
                
               hilts
                
               whilst
                
               I
                
               run
                
               on
                
               it
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               VOLUMNIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That’s
                
               not
                
               an
                
               office
                
               for
                
               a
                
               friend
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         
         Alarum
          
         continues
         .
         
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CLITUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Fly
               ,
                
               fly
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               !
                
               There
                
               is
                
               no
                
               tarrying
                
               here
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Farewell
                
               to
                
               you
               —
               and
                
               you
               —
               and
                
               you
               ,
                
               Volumnius
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Strato
               ,
                
               thou
                
               hast
                
               been
                
               all
                
               this
                
               while
                
               asleep
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Farewell
                
               to
                
               thee
               ,
                
               too
               ,
                
               Strato
               .
               —
               Countrymen
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               My
                
               heart
                
               doth
                
               joy
                
               that
                
               yet
                
               in
                
               all
                
               my
                
               life
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               found
                
               no
                
               man
                
               but
                
               he
                
               was
                
               true
                
               to
                
               me
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               shall
                
               have
                
               glory
                
               by
                
               this
                
               losing
                
               day
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               More
                
               than
                
               Octavius
                
               and
                
               Mark
                
               Antony
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               By
                
               this
                
               vile
                
               conquest
                
               shall
                
               attain
                
               unto
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               fare
                
               you
                
               well
                
               at
                
               once
               ,
                
               for
                
               Brutus’
                
               tongue
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hath
                
               almost
                
               ended
                
               his
                
               life’s
                
               history
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Night
                
               hangs
                
               upon
                
               mine
                
               eyes
               ;
                
               my
                
               bones
                
               would
                
               rest
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               have
                
               but
                
               labored
                
               to
                
               attain
                
               this
                
               hour
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         
         Alarum
         .
         
          
         Cry
          
         within
          
         
         <span class="inline_quote">
            Fly
            ,
             
            fly
            ,
             
            fly
            !
            
         </span>
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               CLITUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Fly
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               ,
                
               fly
               !
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hence
               .
                
               I
                
               will
                
               follow
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               All
                
               exit
                
               but
                
               Brutus
                
               and
                
               Strato
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone page"> </div>
               
               <span class="hr"> </span>
               <span class="pageimage">
                  <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-207.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-207.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
                     <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-207.jpg" class="display"></img>
                  </a>
               </span>
               
               <h6 class="fw">ACT 5. SC. 5</h6>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               prithee
               ,
                
               Strato
               ,
                
               stay
                
               thou
                
               by
                
               thy
                
               lord
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thou
                
               art
                
               a
                
               fellow
                
               of
                
               a
                
               good
                
               respect
               ;
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Thy
                
               life
                
               hath
                
               had
                
               some
                
               smatch
                
               of
                
               honor
                
               in
                
               it
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Hold
               ,
                
               then
               ,
                
               my
                
               sword
               ,
                
               and
                
               turn
                
               away
                
               thy
                
               face
               
               <br></br>
