               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               While
                
               I
                
               do
                
               run
                
               upon
                
               it
               .
                
               Wilt
                
               thou
               ,
                
               Strato
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               STRATO
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Give
                
               me
                
               your
                
               hand
                
               first
               .
                
               Fare
                
               you
                
               well
               ,
                
               my
                
               lord
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               BRUTUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Farewell
               ,
                
               good
                
               Strato
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               Brutus
                
               runs
                
               on
                
               his
                
               sword
               .
               
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Caesar
               ,
                
               now
                
               be
                
               still
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               killed
                
               not
                
               thee
                
               with
                
               half
                
               so
                
               good
                
               a
                
               will
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         He
          
         dies
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         
         Alarum
         .
          
         Retreat
         .
         
          
         Enter
          
         Antony
         ,
          
         Octavius
         ,
          
         Messala
         ,
         
         <br></br>
         Lucilius
         ,
          
         and
          
         the
          
         army
         .
         
         
         <br></br>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               OCTAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               What
                
               man
                
               is
                
               that
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MESSALA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               My
                
               master’s
                
               man
               .
               —
               Strato
               ,
                
               where
                
               is
                
               thy
                
               master
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               STRATO
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Free
                
               from
                
               the
                
               bondage
                
               you
                
               are
                
               in
               ,
                
               Messala
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               The
                
               conquerors
                
               can
                
               but
                
               make
                
               a
                
               fire
                
               of
                
               him
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               For
                
               Brutus
                
               only
                
               overcame
                
               himself
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               no
                
               man
                
               else
                
               hath
                
               honor
                
               by
                
               his
                
               death
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               LUCILIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               Brutus
                
               should
                
               be
                
               found
               .
               —
               I
                
               thank
                
               thee
               ,
                
               Brutus
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               thou
                
               hast
                
               proved
                
               Lucilius’
                
               saying
                
               true
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               OCTAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               All
                
               that
                
               served
                
               Brutus
               ,
                
               I
                
               will
                
               entertain
                
               them
               .
               —
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Fellow
               ,
                
               wilt
                
               thou
                
               bestow
                
               thy
                
               time
                
               with
                
               me
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               STRATO
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Ay
               ,
                
               if
                
               Messala
                
               will
                
               prefer
                
               me
                
               to
                
               you
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               OCTAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Do
                
               so
               ,
                
               good
                
               Messala
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MESSALA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               How
                
               died
                
               my
                
               master
               ,
                
               Strato
               ?
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               STRATO
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               I
                
               held
                
               the
                
               sword
               ,
                
               and
                
               he
                
               did
                
               run
                
               on
                
               it
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="milestone page"> </div>
         
         <span class="hr"> </span>
         <span class="pageimage">
            <a href="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-209.jpg" rel="prettyPhoto[pp_gal]" title="&lt;a href=&#34;http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/large/pb-209.jpg&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34; &gt;open image in new window&lt;/a&gt;">
               <img src="http://rosie.unl.edu/data_images/projects/example/figures/thumbnails/pb-209.jpg" class="display"></img>
            </a>
         </span>
         
         <h6 class="fw">ACT 5. SC. 5</h6>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               MESSALA
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Octavius
               ,
                
               then
                
               take
                
               him
                
               to
                
               follow
                
               thee
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               That
                
               did
                
               the
                
               latest
                
               service
                
               to
                
               my
                
               master
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               ANTONY
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               This
                
               was
                
               the
                
               noblest
                
               Roman
                
               of
                
               them
                
               all
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               All
                
               the
                
               conspirators
                
               save
                
               only
                
               he
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Did
                
               that
                
               they
                
               did
                
               in
                
               envy
                
               of
                
               great
                
               Caesar
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               He
                
               only
                
               in
                
               a
                
               general
                
               honest
                
               thought
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               common
                
               good
                
               to
                
               all
                
               made
                
               one
                
               of
                
               them
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               His
                
               life
                
               was
                
               gentle
                
               and
                
               the
                
               elements
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               mixed
                
               in
                
               him
                
               that
                
               nature
                
               might
                
               stand
                
               up
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               And
                
               say
                
               to
                
               all
                
               the
                
               world
                
               
               <span class="inline_quote">
                  This
                   
                  was
                   
                  a
                   
                  man
                  .
                  
               </span>
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         <div class="sp">
            
            <div class="speaker">
               OCTAVIUS
                
            </div>
            
            <div class="ab">
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               According
                
               to
                
               his
                
               virtue
               ,
                
               let
                
               us
                
               use
                
               him
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               With
                
               all
                
               respect
                
               and
                
               rites
                
               of
                
               burial
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Within
                
               my
                
               tent
                
               his
                
               bones
                
               tonight
                
               shall
                
               lie
               ,
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               Most
                
               like
                
               a
                
               soldier
               ,
                
               ordered
                
               honorably
               .
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               So
                
               call
                
               the
                
               field
                
               to
                
               rest
               ,
                
               and
                
               let’s
                
               away
               
               <br></br>
               
               <div class="milestone ftln"> </div>
               To
                
               part
                
               the
                
               glories
                
               of
                
               this
                
               happy
                
               day
               .
                
            </div>
             
         </div>
         
         <br></br>
         
         They
          
         all
          
         exit
         .
         
         
      </div>
      
   </div>
   
   <br></br>
   
   <div class="milestone page"> </div>
   
   
   
   all or part of a full metrical line
   all or part of a prose speech
   a short line which cannot be joined with other lines to form a
   full metrical line, or which may not be definitively identified as verse or prose
   
   
   editorial emendation
